K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:1b-0: @1b #// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:1b-1: sangs rgyas phal po che las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:1b-2: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul @2a #//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-1: ba de la yongs su bsgom zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-2: yid ches par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-4: shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-5: yongs su khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-6: rab tu mchod par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2a-9: yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-0: mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gang na ba der phyin te mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong @2b du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par zhugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs te byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nan tan du bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'tshal na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-8: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:2b-9: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3a-1: mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3a-3: de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa de'i yul ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-0: @3b sems dang bsam pa rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i mnyam pa nyid du zhugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-1: 'jig rten gyi rdul dang dri ma thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i mi phyed pas brgyan pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-3: mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-4: rin po che'i ri bo ltar yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i sems mi sgul ba dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-5: mi gnas mi rten pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-6: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i sems can dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-7: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bas mi ngoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-9: dran pa'i rgya mtsho ye shes kyi snang ba chen pos brgyan pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-10: sems can thams cad mya ngan gyi dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-11: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-12: yid mi bde ba las rnam par zlog pa la mngon par brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-13: sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:3b-17: reg yongs su rgyu ba rnam par zlog pa la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-0: sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang bral @4a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-1: zhing phrad pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-2: sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rkyen las byung bas mgo rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par zlog pa la rab tu brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-3: log par ltung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-4: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal las 'byung ba yang dag par ston pa la mngon par brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-5: sems can thams cad kyi rga shi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-10: 'khrug pa rnam par zlog pa la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-11: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba bla na med pa yongs su sgrub par zhugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-17: rgyal po'i gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar rim gror bya bas nyams dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-18: de dag la chos dang mthun par bsrung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-20: rim gro bya ba yang legs par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-21: de dag rim pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4a-24: gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi mngon par chags pa med pa yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-0: yid @4b mi bde ba de dang de dag kyang rnam par sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-1: mngon par zhen pa thams cad rgyun gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-2: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to; ;pha ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-6: 'grogs pa'i sems can yun ring po nas bshes shing mdza' bar gyur pa dag las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phrad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-7: bu smad dang 'grogs pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i sred pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-8: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems su bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-9: snying rje chen po rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-10: tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar bya ba la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-12: longs spyod kyi dregs pas myos pa'i sems can rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:4b-15: rol mo la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la chos kyi dga' ba la mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-0: yul gyi dga' ba la chags pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la yang dag par gzhol @5a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-1: bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-2: khro bas yongs su non pa'i sems can rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to; ;sems can le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-3: sems rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-4: lta ba'i rnam pa thibs por zhugs pa'i sems can ma rig pa'i mun nag tu 'thom pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-5: ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-6: shes rab 'chal ba can gyi sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-7: khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba las 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-8: dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5a-9: bdag la phan par brtson pa'i sems can rnams la sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-0: @5b bsam pa nyam chung ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-1: ma rig pa'i mun pas sems blong ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-2: gzugs mi sdug pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-3: lus kyi dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi sku bla na med pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-4: kha dog mi sdug pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-5: shin tu 'jam zhing ka tsa linda ka ltar reg na bde ba'i lus rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-6: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba dam pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-7: bde ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:5b-8: nad pa na ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs brnyan lta bu yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-0: dga' ba sna tshogs la brtson pa'i sems can @6a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-1: rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dga' ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-2: phongs pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter dang mdzod rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-3: bza' shing gi ra ba na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'i rgyu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-4: lam du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-5: grong na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-6: yul gyi 'dabs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rnag byang chub kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-8: grong rdal na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6a-9: phyogs mtshams na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-0: phyogs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par shes @6b par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-1: 'dod chags la gcig tu dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mi sdug pa'i sgos 'khor ba'i sred pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-2: zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-3: gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi sgo rgya mtsho rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-4: cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshos khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-5: 'khor ba'i yul gyi dga' ba'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i yul dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-6: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mi skye ba'i gnas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:6b-8: phung po la gnas pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la gzhi med pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la rnam par spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-0: bsam pa zhum pa'i sems can rnams la lam gyi @7a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-1: rgyan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-2: mtho ba'i nga rgyal can gyi sems can rnams la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-3: g-yo sgyu'i yul gyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-6: sems can thams cad chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus shing ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud sdug bsngal ba thams cad nas rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-7: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-8: bde ba yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-9: khams gsum pa las gyen du bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-11: thabs sna tshogs kyis yongs su smin par byed byed pas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob pas dga' zhing spro la yid bde bar gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7a-14: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rnam par lta zhing smon lam rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus sna tshogs rnam par dag pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-0: 'od zer dang 'od kyi @7b dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa'i ye shes snang ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-2: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa; rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-4: skad rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-5: rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par klubs pa'i lus can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-7: zhing rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa sna tshogs su zhugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-8: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-9: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-11: ye shes kyi yul sna tshogs kyis snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-12: ye shes rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-13: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi tshul la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-14: chos sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par rtse ba'i yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo sna tshogs le mngon du gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-16: chos kyi dbyings sna tshogs kyi nam mkha'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-17: rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-18: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:7b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs 'byams @8a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-2: phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs nas yongs su 'dus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pas bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-6: rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya mtsho sna tshogs la rnam pa spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-9: ye shes sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-10: rgyan gyi snying po sna tshogs can gyi stan la 'khod pa rnams kyi dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-11: de dag dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-12: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa rjes su sems pas kyang dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-15: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyi sku yongs su dag pa mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8a-16: mos shing nyams bde ba rab tu 'thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-0: sems kyi skad cig re re @8b la'ang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-1: kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par snang ba la lta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-2: sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-4: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer chen po sangs rgya kyi zhing mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-5: 'od zer re re zhing yang 'od zer rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-6: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa mthong zhing sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-8: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-9: sku phrag pa gnyis kyi lhun las sems kyi skad cig re re la rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:8b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung zhing chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad @9a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-1: kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas sems kyis skad cig re re la kha dog dri zhim po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-2: 'od zer sna tshogs can gyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-5: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-6: sems kyi skad cig re re la mtshan re re nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-9: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyi sku'i dpe byad bzang po re re las sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'i 'brug @9b sgra 'byin pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-4: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ba mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-7: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las sems kyi skad cig re re la lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:9b-8: lha'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste lha'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku @10a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-1: las sems kyi skad cig re re la klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-2: klu'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste klu'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-4: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-5: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-6: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-8: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10a-9: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas dri za'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10b-0: dri za'i @10b dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste dri za'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10b-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin; lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon par gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10b-5: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:10b-6: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-0: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rnam pa 'phrul ba dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin @11a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-1: tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-4: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-5: mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-6: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11a-7: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lto 'phye chen po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-0: lto 'phye chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par @11b bkang ste lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam pa bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-4: mi'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mi'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-6: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:11b-7: sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-0: tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du @12a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-1: gnas shing tshangs pa'i sgra skad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-2: dbyangs kyis chos ston pa mthong nas sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che zhing shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-3: sngon thob par gyur pa 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-4: sngon khong du chud pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-5: sngon zhugs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-6: sngon khyab par gyur pa khyab par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-7: sngon mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-8: sngon thos pa thos par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-10: chos kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ltar na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-11: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ci rob ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-12: dus gsum gyi tshul 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-13: chos thams cad kyang mtha' dang dbus med par bstan du yod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-15: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i snang ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-16: rigs kyi bu; rnam par thar pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12a-17: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i phyir mtha' dang dbus med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems @12b bskyed pa dang tha mi dad pas zad mi shes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin pas mu med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-4: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis gtan du rgyas par 'gengs pas gting med ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-6: dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su 'du bar byed pas sgo thams cad dang ldan pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-8: chos thams cad kyi lus dang mi gnyis par spyod pas don yod pa'o; ;rnam par thar pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-9: sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pas ma skyes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi gzugs brnyan du byung bas gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas shin tu sprul pa'i phyir sprul pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-15: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas sa chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-17: 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos mngon par rlan par byed pas chu'i phung po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:12b-18: rnam par thar pa 'di ni; sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan yongs su skem pas me'i phung po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-0: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du @13a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-1: rab tu ston pa'i phyir rlung gi phung po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi gzhi yin pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-5: chos thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags pas ri rab ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-7: chos thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par skyod pa'i phyir rnam par skyod pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-9: dus gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi go 'byed pas nam mkha' lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-11: sems can thams cad la chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon du 'bebs pas sprin chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-13: sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun nag rnam par sel pas nyi ma lta bu'o; ;rnam par thar pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen pos shin tu sgrub pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-16: thams cad du song ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13a-18: las kyi chos kyis shin tu sprul pa'i phyir rang gi grib ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-0: sems can gyi @13b mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgra rab tu sgrog pas brag ca lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-2: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i phyir shing gi rgyal po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-6: mi shigs pa'i chos can yin pas rdo rje lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-8: rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pas nor bu yid bzhin rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-10: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la sgrib pa med pas rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mnyam pa nyid du sgrog pas nor bu rin po che dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan lta bu ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs shin tu yangs pa 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:13b-15: dpe tshad med pa rnam par dgod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi pa dang ldan @14a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-1: pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-3: ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-4: byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa de yongs su 'grub par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs chen po chos yangs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-14: rnam par dbye ba chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-16: phun sum tshogs pa chen po ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-17: de dag la nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa sems can rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par byed pa la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par brtsams @14b pa las phyir mi ldog pa la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chos rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:14b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-1: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya chen po'i chos tshogs chen po dang ldan pa rnams te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-2: de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par thar pa de lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-5: yang dag par 'phel bar 'gyur ro; ;kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-14: khyod yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi me tog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di'i shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho stong phrag bcu 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od du rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15a-18: de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-0: smon lam gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba yod @15b do; ;de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi sprin sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-1: 'jig rten gyi 'og gi mtshams nas rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dra ba rgya mtshos brtan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-2: rin po che'i rgyal po spos kyi rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan gyi lhun dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-3: khang pa brtsegs pa rgya'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-4: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa; lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang gnas kyi sprin gyis kun tu gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-5: gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yod pa der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams de na snying po byang chub rin po che thams cad kyi snying po 'od sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-7: der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na kho mo yang snying po byang chub kyi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 'od ces bya ba zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:15b-10: byang chub kyi shing de la 'dug 'dug nas der kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-1: bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-2: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid kyi rgyal po'i gnas kun nas yongs su rgyas pa'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-4: de nas shi 'phos te snying po byang chub de nyid du ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo zhig tu gyur cing 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-5: kho mos der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'gro ba thams cad du yongs su ston pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi 'od kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-6: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gsung gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad kyi yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-0: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer sgron ma'i @16b rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-2: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-4: de'i 'og tu kho mo lha'i bu mo zhig tu gyur te snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi par byed pa'i sgron ma snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-6: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:16b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'jug pa'i snying po'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-0: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa @17a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-1: zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ye shes thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-3: de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyi ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi sems can gyi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-5: dbang po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-6: de ltar kho mos 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-8: lha'i dbang por gyur te bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-10: klu'i dbang por gyur te bsnyen bkur to; ;la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-11: gnod sbyin gyi dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-13: dri za'i dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-17: nam mkha' lding gi dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-19: mi 'am ci'i dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17a-21: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-1: tshangs pa'i dbang por gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-13: bu mor gyur pas bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mched pa'i yo byad ci bdog pas mchod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rim gror byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-17: de nas kho mo shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-18: de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-19: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos mun pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:17b-21: de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos zhing rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba rjes su 'phro bar bya bas @18a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-1: rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-2: de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa bsod skyabs bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-4: de'i 'og tu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-5: de snying po byang chub la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo rgya mtsho sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa mdzad pa mthong nas kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18a-6: de thob ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-0: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag la rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra @18b ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs te mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad snying po byang chub tu gshegs te sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston par mdzad cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-2: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung na yang bdag mngon du 'dug par shes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang thos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa rgya mtsho byung ste chos kyi sprin rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-6: rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa mdzad cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:18b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad @19a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-1: 'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa dag gi nang na sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-2: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-3: nges par rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-6: yi ge 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzungs kyi mthus yongs su 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-7: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po khong du chud pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su sbyong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-8: chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa'i rigs pas khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-9: dus gsum ltar rnam par yangs pa'i blos rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyis mnyam par byed cing chos kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-11: tshul thams cad la mdo sde'i sprin mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-12: mdo sde'i sprin thams cad las chos rgya mtsho yongs su gzhog par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-13: chos rgya mtsho thams cad la chos kyi rgyud thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-14: chos kyi rgyud thams cad la chos kyi sprin yongs su shes par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19a-15: chos kyi sprin thams cad la chos kyi rlabs yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-0: chos kyi rlabs @19b thams cad la chos kyi dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-1: chos kyi dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho thams cad las rab tu thob par bya ba'i shugs mngon par sgrub bo; ;sa'i shugs thams cad la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i shugs mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-2: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad la sangs rgyas mthong ba rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-3: sangs rgyas mthong ba rgya mtsho thams cad la snang ba rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-4: snang ba rgya mtsho thams cad la dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su gzhog par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-5: phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' ba tshad med pa yongs su btang ba'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su dag pa snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:19b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa'i sa tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs tshad med pa rnam par 'phel bar @20a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-1: bya ba'i mthu'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-3: bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i sbyor bas snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-5: rnam par dmigs pa snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-9: ye shes kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa la gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-10: yongs su 'phel bar bya ba'i ye shes rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la rnam par spyad pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i ye shes yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa mdzad pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i @20b tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i mtshams kyi rnam par 'phrul ba tshad med pas bskal pa rgya mtshor gnas par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su gnon pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa tshad med pa la gnas par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa tshad med pa ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba tshad med pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas ma lus par gzigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-8: rjes su 'brang ba mdzad pa tshad med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:20b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus par gzigs shing bskal pa rgya mtshor bzhugs bzhugs pa tshad med pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas zhing rgya mtsho ma lus pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sku mngon par sgrub pa tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba rab @21a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-1: tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad med pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa rgyas par dga' ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-3: rnam par gdul bar mdzad pa tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad du rab tu 'phro ba tshad med pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur pa rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sa tshad med pa yongs su gnon pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21a-9: chos kyi sprin tshad med pa thams cad ma lus par yang dag par blangs shing yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgya @21b mtsho tshad med pa rnam par dmigs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho'i rgyud tshad med pa rnam par dmigs pa'i snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thog ma thugs bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang 'jug cing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-3: de skad du khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di thob nas ji srid cig lon zhes zer ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-4: de ltar kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od du byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 'od ces bya bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:21b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis chos bstan pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-0: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i @22a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-1: spyod pa spyad nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-2: log par dad sel la sogs pa tha ma sh'akya thub pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po pa dag kyang bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-3: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang bsnyen bkur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud ma byon pa rnams yongs su bsnyen cing bkur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-7: da dung du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od de yang yod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-8: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang rgyun ma chad kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-11: tshul 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa chen pos brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-12: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa; rnam thar dge 'di ji ltar thob gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-13: kho mo'i tshig 'di nor bzang khyod nyon cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22a-14: thos nas dga' ba'i stobs kyang yongs bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-0: rnam thar tshul 'di la @22b ni 'jug par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-1: bdag gi sems dang bsam pa yongs sbyong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-2: mos pa'i shugs yangs yongs su bskyed byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grong 'dun pas; ;bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-4: bde gshegs dus gsum byung ba thos nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-5: de dag kun la mos pa yangs bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-6: bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sgo kun tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-7: de dag 'khor dang bcas par kho mos bkur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-8: sngon gyi bde gshegs kho mos mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-9: 'gro la phan phyir yun ring mchod byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-10: spro ba'i stobs ni rnam yangs yongs bskyed nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-11: bdag gis gdung ba med pa'i chos kyang thos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-12: rnam par thar pa 'di la 'jug pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-13: pha dang ma dang bla ma'i skye bo la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-14: de tshe bdag gis phan bdes bsti stang byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-15: bsnyen bkur sri zhur gnas pa kun kyang byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-16: rgas pa nad pa nor med mi rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-17: dbang po ma tshang sdug bsngal mgon med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-18: mang po bdag gis byams sems bde bkod nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-19: tshe rabs brgyar yang nor phyug mgon yod byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-20: rgyal po me dang rkun chom rkyen gyur dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-21: sengge glang po pha rol dgras 'jigs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-22: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs dngos sna tshogs las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-23: sngon tshe spyod pa'i dus na bdag gis bskyabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:22b-24: rtag tu srid gsum nyon mongs gdungs gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-2: 'khor ba'i ri gzar g-yang du lhung ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-3: skye bo 'gro ba'i rgyud du bdag gis bskyabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-4: sdug bsngal ngan song g-yang sas 'jigs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-5: rtag tu mi bde shin tu mi bzad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-6: skye rga na zhing 'chi ba'i 'jigs mang kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-7: bdag gis 'jig rten spyod tshe zhi bar byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-8: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-9: sems can kun gyi bde ba yongs bskyed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-10: sangs rgyas bde ba dam pa bskyed pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-11: bskal pa phyi mar kho mo'i smon lam mo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-12: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na; kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-13: phyi nang gi sdug bsngal ma lus pa las rnam par grol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-14: bskal pa'i ming du bya ba thams cad shes par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-16: 'jig pa'i rgyus la mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23a-17: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-0: snying po byang chub 'di nyid na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na mtshan mo'i @23b lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-1: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-2: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la tshul dang 'dra pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-4: dge ba'i bshes kyis ma nor mthun bstan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-5: lha mo khyod kyi drung du nye bar mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-6: mtha' dang dbus mi mnga' ba'i sku tshul du; ;khyod ni gdan la bzhugs pa bdag gis mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-7: kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma'i spyod yul ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-8: srid la gnas dang dngos por 'du shes dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-9: 'du shes dma' dang log par lta ba yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-10: khyod kyi spyod yul 'tshal bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-11: khyod kyi sku gzugs blta na mtha' yas pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-12: khyod kyi sku gzugs mdog gi mtshan min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-13: bskal pa mtha' yas dag tu yongs brtags kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-14: lha dang 'jig rten bcas pas shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-15: lha mo khyod ni phung po'i gnas las 'phags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-16: skye mched rnams la'ang de bzhin mi gnas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-17: 'jig rten rnam par 'das pas the tshom bral //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-18: 'jig rten dag tu rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:23b-19: g-yo ba mi mnga' skyon bral chags pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-2: rdul gyi go la thams cad rdul tshad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-3: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa mang po gzigs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-4: khyod kyi sku ni chos sku'i snying po can; ;khyod kyi thugs kyang ye shes chags pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-5: khyod ni kun tu 'od kyis snang mdzad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-6: 'jig rten skye bo rnams la mtha' yas snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-7: sems las mtha' yas las rnams yongs su 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-8: 'jig rten thams cad las kyis rnam par bris //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-9: 'gro ba sems kyi dngos su mkhyen gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-10: rang gi sku yang 'gro ba snyed du bstan; ;'jig rten du ni rmi lam 'drar mkhyen nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-11: sangs rgyas kun kyang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-12: ma lus chos rnams sgra brnyan 'drar mkhyen pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-13: chags pa mi mnga' 'gro ba kun tu spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-14: dus gsum gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-15: skad cig re rer rang gi sku ston kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-16: khyod kyi thugs la gnyis su mi rgyu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-17: phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyang rab tu bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-18: rdul la 'gro ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-19: de bzhin sems can mtsho chen dpag yas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-20: mtha' dbus med pa'i bde gshegs gang chen mtsho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24a-21: kun kyang khyod kyi rnam thar dam pa'i yul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la @24b tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-1: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-2: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-3: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa de ni; sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-8: yang dag par sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-9: mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-10: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-11: rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-13: tshig dang yi ge re re la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-14: tshul du ma dang bsam pa tshad med pas chos nyid kyi tshul shes pa rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-15: dren pas rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-16: blo gros kyis rnam par dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-17: rigs pas khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-18: blos shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:24b-19: lus kyis reg par byas te rnam par spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-0: mthar gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gang @25a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-1: na ba der phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-2: mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal padmo'i khri chen po nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po grong khyer dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-3: gnas thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa'i snying po can la phyogs thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-4: 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-5: 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-6: sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-8: 'gro ba thams cad dang rang bzhin mnyam pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-9: 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-10: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-11: gdul ba la mthun pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-12: 'gro ba thams cad du sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-13: 'gro ba thams cad du 'pho ba med pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-14: sgrib pa thams cad shin tu bcom pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-15: de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25a-16: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba mthar phyin par byed pa'i lus su 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-0: mtshan mo'i lha mo brjod du med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te 'dug pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba @25b 'byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-2: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su bslab na sems can la sman par 'gyur ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-6: sems can bla na med pa yongs su bsdu bas yongs su sdud par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-9: ji ltar brtson par bgyis na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-10: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal por nye bar 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-11: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-12: mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-14: khyod de ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:25b-15: rnam par gdul ba'i mthar phyin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-1: pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par bzung ba'i sbyor ba mthar phyin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-2: phyogs 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes rab tu sbyar ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-4: shes bya nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa mtha' yas pa rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu blang zhing yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa'i spyod pa'i tshul yongs su 'dri ba legs [?] so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-10: rnam par 'grul ba zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-11: de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa de dang ldan pas chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang thogs pa med pa la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod yongs su btang ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-13: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26a-14: byams pa chen po'i stobs rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-0: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la dgod pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la zhugs @26b pa; byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-1: tshogs rab tu bsags pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kha lo sgyur ba'i sa la yang dag par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-2: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sprin thams cad las chos kyi nyi ma yongs su dbyung ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bskyed pas 'jig rten thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba yongs su sgrub pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-4: dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad mthun par sgrub pas sems can thams cad kyi ded dpon du zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-5: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad rab tu spangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-6: sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos la rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-7: sems can thams cad la lam bde ba yongs su ston pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-8: sems can thams cad kyi theg pa'i rgyan gyi thog mar 'dren pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:26b-9: dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la mi @27a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-1: phyed par bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-2: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-3: chos kyi sbyin pa'i sngon 'den cing chos dkar po thams cad yang dag par brtsams pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas mngon par byung bas bsam pa brten zhing mi shigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-5: rdo rje mthu bo che ltar brtan zhing sra bas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa'i sems rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten cing rnam par spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-8: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rtsom pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-10: dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' dang dbus med pa la mngon par 'dun cing dmigs pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-0: de ltar kho mo chos snang ba'i sgo sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa rnam pa de lta bu yongs su sbyong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i tshogs la sta gon du gnas pas rnam pa bcus chos kyi @27b dbyings la rnam par lta zhing khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-1: rjes su gzhal bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-4: ye shes snang ba shin tu yangs pa thob pas chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-5: tshad med pa khong du chung par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-7: mtha' dang dbus med par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su gnan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-10: mu med par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-12: sa mtshams med par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-14: ris tshad med par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-15: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:27b-16: rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-0: 'gro ba thams cad rnam par gdul ba'i mthar phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mtha @28a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-1: thug pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-2: rang bzhin gyis rgya che bar khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'byams klas pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-4: 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-5: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-6: rgyan gcig tu gyur par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-7: dge ba thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang zhing rnam par dag par bya ba chud mi za ba'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-8: thug pa med par khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-10: de ltar kho mo rnam pa bcu po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-11: tshogs thams cad yongs su bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-12: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-13: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings thams cad la rnam par blta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28a-15: rjes su gzhol bar byed do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-0: gzhan yang kho mo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i yid la bya ba dang ldan pas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor @28b gyi rgyud stong phrag bcus sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-2: 'di ltar chos rgya mtsho thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-3: chos thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-4: chos kyi sprin thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa sgron ma'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-6: sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byed pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-7: theg pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dri ma med pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-8: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgron ma'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i glong rab tu sgrog pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-10: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-11: chos thams cad la mngon par 'khyil ba'i shugs drag po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:28b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-0: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu po de dag la sogs pa @29a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-1: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud stong phrag bcus sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-4: thos pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-6: bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-7: srid pa'i rgyud gcig las kyang brtsams shing sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-8: srid pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang brtsams shing sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to; ;'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-12: sangs rgyas gcig gis lung bstan pa las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil @29b 'khor rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-3: mdo sde gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo la yang dag par gzhol ba'i mdo sde las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
