K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus pa las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus pa rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-9: theg pa gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-10: theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:29b-12: de ltar kho mos bstan pa'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa brjod du med pas sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-0: de ltar kho mo chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la @30a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-1: 'jug cing sems can thams cad la chos ston pas bla na med pa'i yongs su bsdu ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-2: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa rgya mtshor gnas par bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-3: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing rnam par 'phel ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sgom pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sgom ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-4: rnam par thar pa'i yul sgom pa'i tshul re res kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de de ltar zab pa ngo mtshar chen /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-9: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-12: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal ba 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i grong khyer dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba rin po che'i spos thams cad dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30a-13: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin la blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi @30b smon lam dbyangs su sgrog pa'i padmos mtshams rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-1: lhun sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtshos byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-2: padmo chen po'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-3: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-4: me tog gi khor yug ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-5: spos kyi rin po che ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyan ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-6: gling bzhi pa chen po ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-7: gling bzhi pa re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang ldan pa byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bskal pa mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-10: bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i grong khyer dpal gyi sprin gyi gling bzhi pa dbu ma rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-12: de'i dbus na rgyal po'i gnas rin chan me tog kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:30b-13: rgyal po'i gnas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na snying po byang chub chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-0: snying po byang chub de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi @31a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-1: rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gi bskal pa'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-2: de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung nas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po las mdo sde chos thams cad kyi glong rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yongs su bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-3: bzung nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rab tu byung ste bstan pa yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-5: bstan pa nub tu cha ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-6: bstan pa yang stong du gyes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-7: chos bstan pa shin tu bstan pa'i tshul ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-9: rnyog pa'i bskal pa bar ma ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-10: nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i che sems can las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-13: dkrugs ma la zhugs par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-14: dge slong sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer cing yul gyi dga' ba lhur len par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-15: rgyal po dang rkun po'i gtam la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31a-18: rgya mtsho'i gtam la mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-0: 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i tshig la zhugs pa rnams yongs su skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir @31b kye ma'o; ;bskal pa du mar yongs su bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-1: nub par gyur ma khad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-2: zhes chos dang ldan pa'i 'o dod bos te yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas de steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings su ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin rab tu bkye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-3: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan chen po kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa bkye nas 'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byas te sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa de yang phyir gsal bar byas te lo stong phrag drug cur gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-5: de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa de nyid kyi bu mo dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba dge slong ma brgya phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-6: des yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgra de thos nas cho 'phrul chen po de mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:31b-7: 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dge slong ma brgya phrag stong po de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu @32a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-3: chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-4: dge slong mchos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa las byung ba'i 'od kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-6: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di yang shin tu phra zhing 'jam pa'i tshul du rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-7: de thob pas de la de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag thams cad kyang mngon du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-9: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-0: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bstan pa nub tu cha ba'i che dang dus na bstan pa yongs su 'dzin cing chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar @32b bar byed pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-2: khyod kyis de lta mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-6: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa'i bu mo dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-8: dge slong ma brgya phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni; de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-11: dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-12: de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa'ang yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-13: dge slong ma brgya phrag stong po de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od kyi gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:32b-16: chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'og tu @33a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-1: kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos dri ma med pa'i ri bo ye shes kyi rtse mo'i 'od cas bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to; ;de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi tshul zab mo dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes yang dag par byung ba kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i dbang po dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po zhes bya @33b ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-1: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas mkhyen pa'i ri bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi brtson 'grus drag po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rin po che'i me tog dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zab mo zhi ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi tshul rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'u tshugs kyi phyogs ye shes kyi snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sengge'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:33b-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od nyi ma kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa @34a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-1: mtshan rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma rnam par gnon pas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dra ba rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi padmo rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi nyi ma'i 'khor lo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyengs pa'i rdo rje sengge mthu bo che zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal mtshan kun tu dpa' ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku chos kyi padmo'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyig ri bo snang ba'i phung po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34a-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos 'od 'phro sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas @34b chos ston pa'i ri bo'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-1: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i ri bo dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to; ;de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i gzi brjid snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad du snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan padmo dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:34b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-1: tu de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu padmo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi ri bo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa kun tu rnam par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang ba'i ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer rab tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i nga ro rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi gnas bsgrub pa yongs su sgrub pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang ba'i dam pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35a-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs kyis dpa' ba'i @35b rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-1: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yon tan bya ba [?] dpan ye shes dang shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo zla bas 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi padmo rnam par snang bas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen padmo snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyi rtse mo'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog kun nas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpal gyi ri po'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dkyil 'khor spo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sna tshogs kyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:35b-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ri bo rgyal mtshan gyi sprin zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-1: bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri bo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin snyan pa rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor na bun sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin po che'i ri bo gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi sgra kun nas 'byung ba'i sprin cas bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs kyi dpal brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36a-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od 'bro ba'i sprin phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs @36b pa gser rin po che'i ri'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-1: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor gyi mdzod chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya shin tu yangs pa'i cod pan shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma rin chen bla re'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' la sengge'i 'od shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:36b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi ri bo rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-1: gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi yan lag shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-3: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po dam pa'i 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-5: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo'i dbyangs mang po'i mdzod ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-7: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum gyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi ri bo snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi sengge'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37a-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi ri rab ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad snang bar @37b mdzad pa'i sengge zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-1: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi 'od kun tu gsal ba chos kyi grong khyer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-4: sangs rgyas brgya po 'di dag la sogs pa bskal pa mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-7: de ltar rigs kyi bu; kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings kyi 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa tha ma chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyis rab tu snang ba'i bar de dag thams cad kho mos mchod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la kho mos rim gror byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-9: thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:37b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bstan pa la yang kho mo rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi @38a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-1: bstan pa yang kho mos yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-3: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las thob pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu thob bo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du'ang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-5: de tshun chad du bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-6: kho mos chos kyi nan tan gyis mchod pa byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-8: de phyin chad du kho mos sems can 'khor ba'i mun pa na 'khod cing mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa rnams kyi mel tshe byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-9: de dag gi sems kyi grong khyer yang yongs su bsrungs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-10: de dag khams gsum gyi grong khyer nas gyen du bskyod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong rdal du'ang rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-12: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-13: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi tshig kyal ba rnam par zlog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38a-14: gnyis su smra ba med pa la rab tu 'god pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-0: bden pa la rab @38b tu gzhog pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-1: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lam gyi rang bzhin thams cad thogs pa med par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-2: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-3: sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang tshig rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-4: skad rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-5: chos thams cad kyi grangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-6: ming rgya mtsho'i tshul dang chog la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-7: chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs rgya mtsho la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-8: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar spyod pa'i mthar phyin par byed pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-11: sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nan tan shes par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i lam bla na med par brtsams pa'i sbyor ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba khong du chud pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-15: mdzod rnam par 'byed pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:38b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gtam la sengge'i khri yongs su gnan par bya ba shes par nus re ska na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-0: @39a *// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-1: chos thams cad kyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs yongs su gnon pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di nyid du mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-4: kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-5: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-6: ji ltar nan tan du byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-7: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'god par byed pa dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-8: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-9: rnam par 'phrul ba zab mo la 'jug pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-10: rnam thar gang gis dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-11: chos dbyings kun tu 'byams klas mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-12: shes byed mtshan nyid kun gyi gzhir thug rtogs pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-13: rgyal sras rnams kyi rnam thar zab cing blta bar dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-14: tshogs las byung ba'i rnam thar tshul ni mtha' yas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39a-15: chos nyid thob pas tshad med bsam du med pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-0: yongs su 'phel zhing @39b kun tu chags med shugs drag par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-1: dus gsum byams pa'i tshul gyi lam la 'jug par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-2: 'di ltar sangs rgyas zhing rgyud rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-3: bskal pa 'das pa'i snga rol sngon gyi zhing byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-4: 'jig rten khams ni chos 'od sprin gyi grong khyer dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-5: bskal pa byung ba dri med mdog tu 'od chen no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-6: bskal pa de gcig rgyal ba'i gdung ni rgyud ma chad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-7: sangs rgyas ri rab rdul phran rab snyed byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-8: bde gshegs chos kyi rgya mtsho 'od dbyangs rgyal po ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-9: thog mar byung ste de dag bskal pa dang po pa; ;rgyal ba chos sprin grong khyer 'od snang rgyal po ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-10: bde gshegs de dag kun gyi tha mar 'jig rten byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-11: de dag kun gyi spyan sngar phyin te kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-12: de dag kun las chos kyang dga' ba chen pos thos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-13: kho mos thog mar mthong ba gser mdog 'od mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-14: rgya mtsho'i chos 'od sgrog pa'i gsung gi rgyal po ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-15: mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis yongs brgyan ri bo 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-16: mthong nas bdag ni bde gshegs 'gyur snyam blo gros gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho mos mthong mod la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-18: thams cad mkhyen nyid 'byams klas 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-19: mkha' dbyings rnam yangs de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:39b-20: rgyal ba'i sems kyi dang po stobs ldan rab tu skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-0: snying rje bdud rtsi rgya mtsho che las @40a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-2: dus gsum gshegs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-3: rgyal sras rgya mtshos bskor ba ma lus thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-4: sems can rgya mtshor bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i zhing yang rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-5: lus kyis zhing rnams thams cad ma lus khyab bya dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-6: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bzhin du lus bstan phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-7: zhing rnams ma lus bskyod cing snang bar bya ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-8: 'gro ba smin bya'i don du bdag gis sems kyang bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-9: rgyal ba gnyis pa'i spyan sngar kho mo phyin nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-10: zhing rnams rgya mtsho bcu bzhugs rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-11: rgyal ba tha ma mthong nas zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-12: rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed bzhugs pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-13: de yi tshu rol bskal pa zhing rgyud rdul snyed du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-14: rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sgron ma ji snyed skyes gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-15: de dag thams cad spyan sngar kho mo phyin gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-16: rnam thar rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di sbyong tshe mchod pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-17: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-18: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-19: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40a-20: gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho rgya chen po las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i snang ba chen po @40b rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-1: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-2: dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa nges mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-3: khyod kyi shes rab chos yangs rgya mtsho kun la spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-4: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dbus med par khyod kyis spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-5: ye shes lus mchog snying po tshe ring snyun bral ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-6: lha mo khyod ni 'khor 'dir byon cing rnam par mdzes; ;chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur thugs chud de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-7: dus gsum kun gyi tshul yang chags med thugs chud mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-8: thugs kyi skad cig gcig la tshad med bsam yas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-9: dmigs pa thams cad rtog pa mi mngar 'jal ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-10: ye shes spyan mnga' chos nyid sems can med gzigs kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-11: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas thugs rjes gzigs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-12: thugs kyi rnam thar shin tu yangs la 'jug mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-13: sems can tshad med 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-14: khyod ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dpyad tshul mkhyen te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-15: chos kyi rang bzhin shes bya'i tshul la rnam sangs rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:40b-16: 'phags lam dri ma med pa thams cad yongs bsgoms te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-0: 'gro ba ma lus rnam par sbyong zhing @41a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri med rtogs mdzad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-3: khyod ni sems can rgya mtsho'i mchog las mngon par skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-4: khyod ni chos dbyings khong chud sems can kun khyab par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-5: chos rab bstan cing 'jig rten 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-6: khyod ni rnam par snang mdzad smon lam lam tshul gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-7: yang dag bzhud cing chags med blo yangs dri med ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-8: thams cad bgod pa'i rgyal ba'i stobs ni thugs chud cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-9: zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa gzigs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-10: khyod kyi thugs ni mkha' 'dra thub par dka' ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-11: nyon mongs kun gyi dri mas ma gos snga nas dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-12: der ni dus gsum byung ba'i zhing rnams thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-13: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa sems can kun bcas 'dus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-14: skad cig gcig gis nyin mtshan yud du zla ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-15: skad cig yud tsam lo dang 'du 'jig bskal pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-16: bskal pa rgya mtsho ming grangs rgya mtshor bcas pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-17: 'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rgya mtsho'ang thugs su chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-18: phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can skye 'chi ji snyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-19: gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-20: rnam spyod bden pa'i tshul ni thugs su chud mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41a-21: de dag lam bstan byang chub mchog tu 'god pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-0: rnam par @41b snang mdzad smon lam dra ba'i rigs las byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-1: bde gshegs kun gyi sku gcig tshul las yang dag 'khrungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-2: khyod ni chos sku yongs dag thugs la chags mi mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-3: 'jig rten kun tu sku gzugs yid bzhin ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-5: mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang bltas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-6: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-7: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las; sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-10: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-11: de bas kyang rgya cher sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-12: yid ches par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:41b-13: shin tu rgyas par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-0: mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas @42a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-1: pas bde bar gnas pa gang na ba der phyin nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa spos rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi yal ga'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na sengge'i khri rin po che'i shing gi myu gu'i snying po can zhig la 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-2: mtshan mo'i lha mo stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-5: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-6: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-8: ji ltar spyod ji ltar slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-9: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-10: mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42a-13: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma nub tu cha ba'i tshe padmo shin tu rgyas pa rnams kyang rnam par 'dzum par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-0: @42b skyes pa dang bud med bza' shing gi ra ba na gnas shing dga' bar rtse ba la brtson pa dag kyang khyim du 'dong pa'i blo skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-1: lam dang srang na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams kyang zhag gi gnas sems shing tshol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-2: 'gro ba'i gnas thams cad du mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-5: phug la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyang nags tshal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-8: shing la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang shing gi gnas la brten par mngon par gzhol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-9: khung na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang khung du 'dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-13: yul la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang grong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-17: chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang chur 'dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-18: phyogs gzhan gyi yul du phyin pa'i sems can rnams kyang nub mo bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa'i don du rang rang gi yul gyi phyogs kyi bsam pa skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-22: bud med gzhon nu dar la bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-23: dar ba'i nyams drod kyis myos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-26: rol mo'i dga' bas myos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:42b-27: 'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' zhing brtson pa rnams la skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-0: gti mug gi mun pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i gnyen por dag @43a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-1: ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi legs pa'i bsngags pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-2: sems can ser sna dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-3: sbyin pa la rab tu sbyor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-4: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-5: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-6: ngan sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-7: byams pa'i legs pa rjod par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-8: sems 'khrugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-9: bzod pa la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-10: le lo can gyi sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-12: sems rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-13: bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-14: shes rab 'chal ba can gyi sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su sbyor ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-16: theg pa dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-17: theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-18: khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor la spyod pa la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43a-20: dmigs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can las dang nyon mongs pas rab tu mnar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-0: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs med pa rnams @43b ni; byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-1: mi shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i sems can bdag tu bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-2: bdag gir bya bas ma rig pa'i mun nag tu 'thom pa rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-12: rnam par thar pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyis sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes dang thabs snang ba dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-16: sems can rnams kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gi tshul gyis byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pas byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:43b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-1: gshegs pas bstan pa'i lam la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dang tshul 'dra ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i mthun pa'i rgyus byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma snang bas byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-7: sems can rnams kyi bde ba yongs su 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-10: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di la 'jug pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-11: 'jug pa dang khong du chud par byed pa'i tshe 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pas sems can bdag tu bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-12: bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-13: ma rig pa'i mun pas 'thom pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-14: lta ba thibs po'i lta bas dgon par 'khyams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-15: sred pa'i dbang du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44a-16: 'dod chags kyi bcings pas glags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-0: zhe sdang gis khong khro @44b ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-1: gti mug gis sems kyi rgyud 'khrugs par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-2: phrag dog dang ser sna kun nas 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-3: nyon mongs pas rab tu dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa; 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-4: 'khor ba na phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-5: sangs rgyas blta ba las phyir phyogs par gyur pa thams cad gzigs nas thugs rje chen po'i thugs skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-6: sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gro ba thams cad la yo byad dang rin po ches yongs su bsdu zhing yongs su sdud pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-7: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i yo byad yongs su sgrub pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-8: dngos po thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-9: yul thams cad la ye rngam pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-10: dga' ba thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-11: longs spyod thams cad la yongs su ma zhen pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-12: sbyin pa thams cad la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-13: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la bzhed pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-14: rgyu dang rkyen la ma rmongs pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:44b-15: legs par btsal ba'i chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i thugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-1: don la gzhol bar bya ba mngon par sgrub pa'i thugs yang dag par skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-2: de de ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag par zhugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-3: sems can gyi khams thams cad du byams pa chen pos snyoms par zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-4: 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sbyor ba mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-5: sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad kun nas khebs pa'i chos kyi gdugs chen po'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-6: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i mtshon cha mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su sgrub pas dgyes pa'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-8: sems can thams cad la bde ba phul du phyin par mngon par sgrub pa'i smon lam gyi thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-9: bsam pa dang smon pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la nor gyi char rab tu dbab pa'i thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-10: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing snyoms par sbyor ba'i thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-11: 'phags pa'i nor gyis sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'i thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45a-12: stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che phul du dri ma med pa thob par mdzad pa'i thugs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-0: byang @45b chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang shugs rab tu brnyes pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin chen pos sems can gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-2: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can thams cad la mngon par gyur par bzhugs shing sbyin pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char chen po rnam pa thams cad du dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-3: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pa mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-4: 'di ltar sems can thams cad so so'i tshul dang ji ltar mthun pas longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-5: yo byad rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa la spyad par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-6: sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-7: dngos po yongs su gtang ba rnam pa du ma la yongs su spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-8: yo byad kyi rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-9: rgyan gyi 'du byed brjod du med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-10: sbyin pa'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:45b-11: sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i tshul mtha' yas pa thugs su chud pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-0: mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dngos po @46a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i tshul du bya ba rnams sems can thams cad la lan la re ba mi mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-5: 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'byung ba'i thugs mnga' bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongs su sbyong ba mdzad cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi char dbab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-7: 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pas thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-8: gdul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46a-9: thugs kyi skad cig re re zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med cing bla na med pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par klubs shing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-0: thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi @46b tshul rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang bar rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-1: thugs kyi skad cig re re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gtos ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-2: thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can dang dus ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-3: thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-4: thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus ma lus pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-5: thugs kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa ma lus par yongs su bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-6: thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grangs su bya ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sna tshogs brjod du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:46b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyis mtshams rnam par 'dul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-2: rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-3: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-4: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-5: gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-6: gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-13: gzhi mnyam pa dang snrel zhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-15: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mngon par bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-16: phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su yongs su gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-17: sgo sna tshogs nas bstan cing sgo mtha' yas pa'i dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i rnam par phye ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongs su mnan nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-19: rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47a-20: thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-0: mngon par sgrub @47b pa mdzad par gyur pas mngon par shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-3: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gnas pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-4: sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-5: mi shes pa'i mun pas chod pa; bdag tu bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-6: bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-7: ma rig pa'i mun pa rab rib kyis bsgribs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-8: tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la zhugs pa; lta ba thibs po bas dgon par mgo brlags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-9: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-10: nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-11: 'khor ba'i mya ngam chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa'i 'og tu lhung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-12: phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa sbyang ba'i sprin chen po mngon par bsgrubs te dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-14: yongs su bsngags pa dang sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-15: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la mngon par mos par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:47b-16: rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mngon par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-1: ba'i phyogs rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdu ba'i phyogs snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-3: sems can thams cad kyi mos pa'i phyogs rab tu brjod par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-4: sems can thams cad kyi zhing yongs su sgrub pa'i phyogs legs par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i phyogs yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-7: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi phyogs yongs su brjod pa mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mngon par bsgrubs nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can tshim par 'gyur bar chos kyis shin tu bsdu ba la sems can rab tu dgod par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la yang dag par bskul to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la rab tu btsud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48a-12: 'phags pa'i nor thams cad rab tu thob par bya bas nye bar bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dun pa'i shugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho rnam par @48b 'phags par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgor yang de dag rab tu btsud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-2: phung po shin tu zhi ba'i bde bas yongs su bsdu ba bsdus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba la mngon du mos par byas nas byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba'i ye shes la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-5: 'phags ma khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-9: yid ches par dka' ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-14: khong du chud par dka' ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-16: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-17: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-18: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-20: sems can 'khor ba'i bde ba thams cad la mngon par 'dod pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba la lhag par dmigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-22: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:48b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la mngon par mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-0: @49a *// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-1: nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-2: mos pa yangs pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-3: 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir phyogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon par mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-5: chos kyi grong khyer du 'gro bar gcig tu chad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-7: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rgyud rnam par gnon pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mngon par mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-9: stobs bcu rab tu thob par bya ba'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-10: ye shes kyi tshogs yangs pas nye bar bsten pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-11: bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang ma zhum pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-12: nyon mongs pa med pa dang ma yo ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-15: mun pa med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-16: ye shes kyi snang ba kun tu snang bas snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-17: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya bar shin tu 'dun pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49a-18: bdud kyi 'khor dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par bya bar skabs phye ba'i sems kyis kyang khong du @49b chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-2: yid ches par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-5: shes par bya ba mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su ma non na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-11: sems can gzhan thams cad kyis lta ci zhig smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-12: 'on kyang sems can cang shes rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-14: khyod kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su dris pa'i lung bstan pa'i chos nyid rab tu 'byung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-15: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe don de nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-16: sangs rgyas sras po khyod kyis gang dris pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-17: de ni bsam yas zab mo sangs rgyas yul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-18: bsam yas zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-19: bskal pa mang pos de kun brjod mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:49b-20: sems can 'dod pa'i sems ldan sdang ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-1: gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-2: 'chab dang dregs pas bsam pa nyams gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-3: rgyal ba'i chos nyid zhi ba shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-4: phrag dog 'jungs pa'i dbang gi rjes 'brang dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-5: g-yo sgyus bsam pa rnyog par gyur pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-6: nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-7: sangs rgyas yul 'di shes par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-8: phung po khams dang skye mched gnas pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-9: 'jig tshogs mang la gnas par gyur pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-10: lta sems 'du shes phyin ci log gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-11: zhi ba'i sa 'di shes par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-12: rgyal ba'i yul ni shes dka' zhi ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-13: rang bzhin dri med rnam par rtog pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-14: srid par brten cing 'khor la chags pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-15: chos 'di yang dag shes par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-16: sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-18: chos kyi rgyal po'i gdung rabs yongs 'dzin pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-19: drang srong de dag yul ni 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-20: dkar chos rgya mtshos mi ngoms sems ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-21: gang rnams dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs bzung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-22: thub pa'i stobs la dmigs pa'i sems sprin can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-23: de dag 'di thos bzod pa thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50a-24: gang rnams bsam pa dri med rnams rtog med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-0: bar snang @50b mkha' bzhin phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-1: mun pa rnam bsal blo gros sgron ma'i sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-2: dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-3: snying rje'i bsam pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-4: dus gsum byung ba gang rnams rgyas byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-5: sems can ma lus rjes 'brang byams pa can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-6: de dag rgyal ba'i tshul 'dir 'jug par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-7: gang rnams 'dzin med dga' ba'i sems ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-8: rtag par bdog pa thams cad sbyin brtson la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-9: sems can kun la mnyam par zhugs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-10: chags med de dag spyod yul sa 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-11: nyon mongs med sems bskyod med spyod ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-12: gang rnams 'gyod pa rnams bsal la sems ldan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-13: sangs rgyas gdams ngag nan tan byed ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-14: dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no; ;gang rnams mi sgul sems ldan mi bskyod sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-15: chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sems ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-16: las kyi rgya mtshor mi 'gal sems ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-17: mi bzad de dag rnam thar 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-18: gang rnams mi skyo'i sems dang mi ldog sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-19: brtson 'grus mthu dang rtsal du ldan pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-20: thams cad mkhyen tshogs brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-21: brtul zhugs bzang ldan de dag yul 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-22: zhi ba'i sems ldan mnyam par bzhag pa gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:50b-23: shin tu zhir gyur rim dang bral ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-1: mkhyen bsam gtan yan lag mchor spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-2: rab tu zhi ba de dag tshul 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-3: gang rnams chags pa kun las sems grol zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-4: chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud sems can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-5: rgyal ba'i chos dbyings rtogs par khong chud pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-6: shes rab sgron ma de dag tshul 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-7: sems can rang bzhin rtogs sems ldan gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-8: gang rnams srid pa'i mtsho la chags med sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-9: sems can sems la gzugs brnyan zla 'char ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-10: lam mkhan de dag rnam thar 'di yin no; ;dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-11: smon lam gang chen mtsho rgyud skyes pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-12: zhing rnams kun tu phyi ma'i mthar spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-13: kun tu bzang po de dag tshul 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-14: gang rnams chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-15: 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'du dang 'jig pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-16: bskal par bcas pa khong du chud pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-17: rtog med de dag rnam thar 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-18: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran thams cad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-19: sangs rgyas grangs med shing rgyal drung bzhugs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-20: byang chub 'tshang rgya 'gro 'dul mthong ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-21: chags med dmigs can de dag tshul 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-22: khyod ni bskal pa rgya mtsho rgya chen du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51a-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bsnyen bkur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-0: chos @51b 'dod chos tshol mi skyo 'dir phyin pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-1: thos nas de ni yongs su gzung bar nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-2: khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-3: bde gshegs byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-4: rnam par snang mdzad tshad med yul 'di yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-5: kho mo'i tshig las chags pa med par 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-7: sngon byung ba'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i 'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi ri bo'i 'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-11: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:51b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa dang ri rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa bstan du yod pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re zhing yang bskal pa'i grangs shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang @52a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-1: ldan pa; bskal pa re re zhing yang bskal pa bar ma shin tu bstan pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-2: bskal pa bar ma re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad du bya ba bstan pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-4: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba re re zhing yang mdo sde yang dag par bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-6: mdo sde re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bstan du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-7: sems can 'dul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa shin tu bstan pa tha dad pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-8: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-9: cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dul ba dang ldan pa yongs su sbyangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba der 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa'i sgo rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba byung ste; rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu sgo mngon par bltas pa rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa der 'jig rten gyi khams rin @52b po che thams cad kyi mdog kun tu snang ba'i dpal yon bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-1: mtshams kyi rgyan rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-2: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog rgya mtsho la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-3: lhun rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa las bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-4: lha'i grong khyer gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-5: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa byang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams der gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-7: gling bzhi pa'i ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gi gling bzhi pa dbu ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-8: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan der gling mchu zhang du dpag tshad brgya phrag stong yod pa bzhi byung nas gling re re la yang grong khyer chen po stong phrag re re byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:52b-9: gling bzhi pa de'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-0: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling de'i mi rnams kyang tshe'i tshad lo @53a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-1: stong phrag bcu thub par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-2: rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i blon po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-10: yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa; blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-12: stobs che ba brgya phrag bdun byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-13: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i tshe la dzambu'i gling thams cad kyang gdugs gcig gis bskyangs par gyur te pha rol gyi 'khor dang dgra thams cad kyang shin tu chom par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-14: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams der bskal pa bar ma ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-16: rnyog pa lnga 'jig rten du byung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-17: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-18: nub par gyur nas sems can mi dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa phal cher ngan song du yang 'dong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53a-19: de dag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyus tshe thung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-1: kha dog mi sdug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-3: bde ba'i rnam pa nyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-4: sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa mang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-5: phan tshun slu zhing 'drid pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-6: phan tshun dbye ba la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-7: zhe gcod pa'i tshig la spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-8: 'chal ba'i tshig tu smra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-9: 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-10: zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rtog pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-11: lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs kyi mya ngan du 'khyams par gyur nas de dag chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen cing 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-12: log pa'i chos kyis kun nas 'khor bas sa la shing rtsi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-13: lo zas skye bar 'gyur ba'i char yang dus su mi 'bab par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-14: sems can de dag kyang rtsva dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-18: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-19: sdong po dag kyang bskams par gyur nas nad sna tshogs kyis thebs shing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su skyabs med pas phan tshun khod mi myong zhing g-yen spyo bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:53b-20: de dag kun kyang gcig tu 'dus nas rgyal ba'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma gang na ba der dong ste kun tu bskor nas la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-5: lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-9: lag pa nam mkha'i dbyings su g-yo ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-13: kha mig mi sdug par gyur cing rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la mngon du bltas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-14: snying rje rje skad du 'o dod chen po 'bod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-18: bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-19: 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis g-yen spyo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-20: bdag cag la skyabs su yang ma mchis so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-21: bdag cag la mgon dang dpung gnyen ma mchis so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-22: sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis 'khor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-26: smre sngags sna tshogs su bla zhing dbyangs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-27: tshig sna tshogs kyis kha gdong mi sdug par gyur par 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-28: tshig sna tshogs kyi tha snyad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-30: skad kyi gdangs don sna tshogs rjod pa'i tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54a-32: rgyal po'i gnas de'i skyes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-3: sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la mi dga' ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-6: brla khyer nas rgyal po shes pa'i skyes bu chen po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de la bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-7: sdug bsngal thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-8: 'tsho ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gter thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-9: mu stegs mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-10: lam chen po la nan tan du bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-12: ye shes kyi gling chen po'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-13: don chen po rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-14: mtho ris kyi dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-15: bde ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes kyis mgon dang skyabs tshol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:54b-16: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas 'khor kun nas slong ba mang po snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i 'o dod chen po de thos nas de snying rje chen po'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu la zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-0: de snying rje chen po'i tshul yid la bab pa'i sems su gyur nas yud tsam zhig rtse gcig tu bsam ste snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig @55a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-3: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-4: 'khor ba'i g-yang sa chen por lhung yang skyabs med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-5: bdag nam zhig 'khor ba'i g-yang sa chen por lhung ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'god pas gnas su 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-6: kyi hud kyi sems can 'di dag ni /
