K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-7: nyon mongs pa'i gnod pas gtses shing skyabs med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-8: nam zhig bdag sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pas gtses te skyabs med pa rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las kyi mtha' la 'god pas skyabs su 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-9: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-10: 'jig rten na rga shi'i 'jigs pas tshar chod cing mgon med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-11: nam zhig bdag sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sel bas mgon du 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-12: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-13: 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses te rten med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-14: nam zhig bdag sems can 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams shin tu bde zhing skyon med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la dgod pas rten du 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-15: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55a-16: ma rig pa'i mun par 'thom ste the tshom dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-0: yid gnyis kyi rab @55b rib kyis bsgribs pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-1: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel bas sgron mar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-2: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-3: snang ba dang bral ba lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-4: nam zhig bdag ye shes kyi sgo rab rib med pa yongs su ston pas ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'byin par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-5: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-9: sgyu'i rnyog pas bsam pa rnyog pa can du gyur te ye shes kyi mdog gsal ba med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-10: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa la rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-11: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-12: 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yul gyi rgyud du zhugs shing 'dren pa med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-13: nam zhig bdag sems can chos thams cad chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'dzud par gyur cing 'dren par 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-14: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-15: ma dul zhing rnam par 'dren pa med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-16: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-17: rnam par gdul ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dus las mi 'da' zhing rnam par 'dren par 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-18: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:55b-19: dmus long du gyur te yongs su 'dren pa med pa lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-0: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i thams @56a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-1: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la 'dzud cing yongs su 'dren par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-2: de skad du des snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig rnam pa bcu brjod nas rgyal po'i gnas der dril chen po brdungs te gtong ba chen po'i rnga bo che'ang yongs su brdungs nas su ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su tshim par bya'o; ;zhes sgra brjod nas des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-8: grong rdal thams cad du yo byad thams cad kyi mdzod phye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-11: srang thams cad du'ang yo byad sna tshogs kyi rnam pa mang po bkod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-12: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bstabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-13: mdzod dang bang ba thams cad kyang phye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-14: rin po che'i gter chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-15: tshogs kyang yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-16: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po du ma yang spungs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-26: gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi mdzod phye nas khang pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56a-28: khyim mang po mal cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-0: gos kyis yongs su brgyan te nor dang dbyig thams cad @56b phun sum tshogs par byas nas nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid rnam par bkod pas mun pa rnam par sel ba bshams nas des sems can de dag ci 'dod pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir khyim de dag re rer yang rang gi lus dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i lus mngon par sprul te kun tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-1: sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir sman pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-4: 'tsho ba'i yo byad sna tshogs kyi rkyen phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bshams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnam pa tha dad pa yo byad sna tshogs kyis ci rigs su bkang pa dag kyang nye bar bkod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-6: 'di ltar rin po che rdo rje'i snod ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-7: spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-8: spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-9: gos kha dog dam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-10: shing rta mang po dbyibs dang mdog sna tshogs su 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-11: rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-12: rta dang glang po dang ba lang cang shes la bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-13: rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs rgyal po'i rkyen du rung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-14: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-16: rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-17: bla re sna tshogs bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:56b-18: rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-2: ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa dag gis kyang yul gyi phyogs gang bar bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-6: yul thams cad sbyin par yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-7: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-9: dka' thub kyi nags tshal sna tshogs yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-12: bu mo thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-13: rin po che rin thang med pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-27: mgo yongs su gtang ba nas phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bar yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-28: des yo byad de lta bu yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa mang po bshams te bsags nas rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin gyi sgron ma de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer rin chen rtse mo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i mdun rol nas gzhi mnyam pa'i phyogs yangs pa mchu zheng du rgya che zhing mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57a-30: rnam par dag cing gzhi mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-0: sdong dum @57b dang; tsher ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-2: gyo mo thams cad med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-3: rin po che thams cad kyi khams las grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-4: gzhi rin po che thams cad las byas shing rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad bkram pa; nor bu rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa du mas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-5: rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-6: phye ma sna tshogs dri shin tu zhim pa'i rdul ldang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-7: bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-8: rin po che'i sgron ma dpal gyi gzi brjid can rab tu 'bar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-9: spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-10: sprin gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa; rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-13: khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-17: rin po che'i snam bu lding ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-19: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra bas kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-20: rin po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-21: gser gyi dra ba las rin po che'i dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-22: bla re rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par byas pas khebs par bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-23: spos kyi rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phye ma rnam par bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:57b-24: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas dga' dga' ltar gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-0: @58a *// rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-1: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam par dag pas rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa zhig yod pa de'i dbus su sengge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bcu las grub pa'i sa'i gzhi sna tshogs la gnas pas rin po che'i khri 'phang sna tshogs bcu'i 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-3: rin po che'i shing yal ga can bcus stegs bu'i mtshams rnam par klubs pa'i rgyan mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-4: rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i sa'i gzhi mi shigs pa la rkang pa rab tu brten pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-5: rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs dang mdog yongs su 'dzin pa'i stan gyi 'khor lo can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-6: rin po che du ma las byas pa'i bog re'i rgyan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-7: rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshom bu rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-8: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan kun nas rnam par phye ste 'phel ba bsgreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-9: rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba dan dbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-10: rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-11: rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-12: gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58a-13: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-0: rin po che'i rgyal @58b po chen po'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-1: gos rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-2: rin po che'i dra ba ci rigs su kun nas bkab cing mdzes par byas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-3: spos rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs las snyim pas bcus shing sprin mngon par gtor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba'i dbyibs yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-5: spos thams cad kyi na bun dang sprin 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-6: gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-7: lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i stan reg na bde ba kha dog bzang po du ma can legs par bting ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-8: lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang glu snyan pa yid du 'ong pa brgya stong du ma'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-9: rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi phreng ba gdan gyis rnam par klubs pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-10: rin po che'i 'bru'i gzugs rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-11: rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par grub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-12: de la rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa gzugs bzang pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-14: blta na sdug pa; kha dog bzang po dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-15: mi chen po'i mtshan rnam par dag pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:58b-16: rin po che rnam par snang ba'i cod pan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-0: rdo rje mthu bo che ltar mkhregs @59a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-1: shing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-2: rtsib ma'i mtshams thags bzang zhing brtan par 'brel ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-3: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-7: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-8: chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i rigs su byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-9: yo byad thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-10: chos kyi dbang shin tu rnam par dag pas rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-11: tshig gi dkyil 'khor kha ma bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-12: mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-13: chos kyi sbyor ba ma nor ba shin tu brtan par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-14: yon tan dang legs pa mtha' yas par brjod du yod pa de 'dug par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-15: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de sengge'i khri chen po la 'dug pa dang steng gi spyi bo'i thad ka'i bar snang la gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rin po che sna tshogs rnam par 'brel ba'i yu ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-16: nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod kyi snying po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-17: rin po che sna tshogs kyi shar bu brgya stong legs par bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59a-18: rin po che du ma'i 'od 'phro ba dpal gyi gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-0: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser 'od 'tsher zhing gsal la rnam par dag pas bla nas @59b bkab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-1: rin po che sna tshogs spa bar spel bas spras pa'i gser gyi dra bas nang shun gyi rgyan byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-2: mu tig sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par dpyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-3: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas bkab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-4: rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba las gser rin po che'i dril chen rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi la brgyus pa mngon par dpyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-5: nor bu rin po che dam pa'i phreng ba kun nas mngon par dpyangs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-6: lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i gdangs grags par 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-7: sems can thams cad dag pa'i las kyi lam la skul ba'i dril gyi sgra rnam par grags pa byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-8: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-9: rin po che'i rdul yab kyis mngon par g-yab cing lha'i dbang po brgya byin bas kyang lhag par gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas shin tu mdzes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-10: de sengge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu 'gro ba mang po de dag thams cad mngon du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-11: de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i drung du slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sna tshogs dngos po sna tshogs yongs su len pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-12: yo byad sna tshogs la mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-13: rigs sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:59b-14: 'gro ba'i rgyun sna tshogs su gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-1: pa sna tshogs kyi sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-2: smon pa dang bsam pa sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-4: yul gyi spyod pa sna tshogs la gnas pa; longs spyod sna tshogs la mngon par smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-5: bsam pa dang yongs su rtog pa sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-6: mi'i ris sna tshogs su gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-7: rigs kyi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-9: sgra skad dang tshig gi 'du byed sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-10: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-11: dngos po sna tshogs kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-12: tshig dang ngag sna tshogs brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-13: bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po de 'ba' zhig gi gdong du lta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-14: 'di 'ba' zhig shes pa'i skyes bu chen po yin zhes nges par sems ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-15: bsod nams chen pos brtan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-16: skyes bu chen po'i zla ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-17: gtong ba chen po'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-18: zhes bya bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis rtog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sems kyis 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sems kyis sprul pa'i slong mo pa'i tshogs chen po de mthong nas slong mo ba de dag la sems dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i 'du shes su @60b gyur to; ;snying rje chen po'i shugs drag po shin tu yangs pa yang byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-1: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par slong mo ba thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po yang skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-2: 'gro ba thams cad du snyoms pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtang ba'i sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sprin kyang mngon par byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-3: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa des slong mo ba de dag mthong ba'i mod la de'i rgyus ches dga' bar gyur gyi; bskal pas mtshams med pa'i mthas klas par stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-5: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par brgya byin gyi dbang la gnas pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-7: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas ba thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-9: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:60b-11: bskal pa tshad med pa'i mthas klas par rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi dbang la gnas pa thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-0: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i @61a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-1: mthas klas par dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang rab tu thob ste lha'i bu mo bzhin bzang mo yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-3: bskal pa brjod du med pa'i mthas klas par tshangs pa'i gnas kyi bde bas tshangs pa'i thabs la gnas pa thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-5: bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i mthas klas par gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bde ba thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-7: bskal pa dpag tu med cing mi zad par dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-9: bskal pa mu med pa'i mthas klas par gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa thob pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-14: skyes bu sred pa la spyod pa pha ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-23: yun ring mo zhig tu bral la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-25: de dag mthong bar 'dod 'dod pa las de dag dang phrad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-26: de dag mthong bas mi ngoms shing dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61a-27: chags pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-0: de bzhin du rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas slong mo ba de dag mthong par gyur pa'i mod la dga' ba'i shugs @61b chen po skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-1: sems kyi dga' ba'i ro ba de ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-2: sems spro ba'i shugs rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-3: rab tu dga' ba chen po'i shugs yongs su skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-4: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu dad pa dang mos pa'i shugs kyi stobs rgya chen po 'phel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsa ba brtan pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs mngon par 'phel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po las su rung ba yongs su byung ngo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-8: sems dga' bas rgyas pas mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-9: sems spro ba'i shugs yangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dbang po dang bsam pa shin tu gus par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-11: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam dang sgo la mngon du bltas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-14: 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par bya ba'i yid la bya ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la 'dun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:61b-16: bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par blang ba la @62a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho sgra kun nas yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-3: mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-4: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-5: chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i spyod yul can des slong mo pa de dag la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-7: sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-10: dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-11: mang po byas pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-12: phan 'dogs pa dam pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-13: byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-15: ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-16: de ltar des slong mo pha de dag don ci la 'ongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-17: don ci la phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-18: dus ci tsam na 'dus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-19: yul gang dang gang na gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-20: dngos po ci dang ci slong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-23: ci dang ci la smon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62a-25: dngos po gang dang gang tshol ba de dag thams cad tshul bzhin du mi dga' ba med pa'i byams pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-0: slong mo pa'i 'gro ba las phyin @62b phyogs su ma bltas pa'i gtong ba chen po'i 'od zer dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-1: sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba'i gtong ba'i sgos yongs su tshim par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-2: des zas 'dod pa la ni; zas byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-25: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-27: dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-43: dngul dag kyang byin par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-48: rgyal po'i mdzod thams cad kyang phye ste bgos nas rab tu btang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-49: su ci 'dod pa de dag de khyer cig ces nas yul 'dod pa dag kyang yul byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:62b-50: grong 'dod pa dag kyang grong byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-0: grong khyer 'dod pa dag kyang gron @63a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-2: sems can thams cad la snyoms par zhugs pa des slong mo pa de dag thams cad la ci bdog pa yongs su btang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-3: dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas mngon par bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-4: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-5: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-6: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-8: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin cen 'od ces bya ba bu mo drug cu'i 'khor dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-9: gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-10: kha dog bzang po'i dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-11: mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-14: dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa; tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-16: rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-24: cha lugs phun sum tshogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-25: bla ma la sri zhu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-26: shes bzhin gyi dam pas spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-30: khong du chud par bya ba la yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63a-31: sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-0: chos kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems kyi rgyud rab tu @63b dang ba; dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-3: gzhan la phan par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-4: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la rnam par bltas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon par 'dun pa zhig mchod sbyin gyi rab chen po der 'ongs te tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin cen 'od ces bya ba de rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i sengge'i khri chen po'i g-yas rol ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-6: rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal nas phar ci la'ang len pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-7: de phyogs gcig na 'dug cing sems 'di ltar bskyed par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-8: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di lta bu mthong zhing 'grogs su yod pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-9: bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-11: des rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-13: snying brtse bar byed pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-15: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed de g-yo sgyu med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:63b-17: spro ba'i shugs rab tu yangs pa thob pas rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-1: cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa gang na ba der mngon par bltas te gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-3: khri'i 'phang gi sa'i steng du bkram par 'gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-4: de rgyan de dag de ltar gtor nas smon lam btab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-5: ji ltar rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa 'di sems can mgon med cing mun pa'i nang na 'thom pa rnams kyi mgon skyabs su gyur pa de ltar bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'gyur bar shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-6: 'di chos gang shes pa de dag kyang bdag gis kyang shes par shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-7: 'di theg pa gang gis 'byung ba des bdag kyang 'byung bar shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-8: 'di lam gang na zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang 'jug par shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-9: ji ltar 'di gzugs blta na btang mi bral zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod dang ldan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-10: g-yog 'khor mtha' yas la gzhan gyis mi thub cing thub par dka' ste thub pa med pa de bzhin bdag kyang shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64a-11: 'di gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der bdag kyang skye bar 'gyur bar shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-0: de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson pa rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas shes nas de la @64b bltas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-2: khyod la ci dgos pa khyer cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-5: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-6: sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-7: de skad ces byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-9: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas thugs su chud par gyur to; ;snyam nas de bas kyang mos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-10: de de ltar yod pa'i sems su gyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i shugs yongs su skyes nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-11: sngon chad sa las rnam brgyan sprin 'di ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-12: rgyal po sengge khyod 'khrungs ma gyur tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-13: mdangs dgar ma gyur gzi brjid ma mchis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-14: yi dvags 'jigs pa'i gnas dang ci mi 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-15: mi rnams kun kyang srog gcod mos par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-16: ma byin len la tshul dang sbyor ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-17: brdzun du smra zhing brlang ba'i tshig kyang brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-18: phra ma kyal ba'i tshig kyang rab tu smra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-19: gzhan gyi nor la chags pa'i sems dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-20: gang zag gzhan la kun kyang ngan du sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-21: lta ba'i rnam gnas sdig to'i spyod yul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:64b-22: log pa'i sbyor bas ngan pa'i 'gro bar ltung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-0: chos ngan chos la spyod pa'i mi yi @65a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-1: rnams; ;ma rig gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-2: lta ba log zhugs phyin ci log mthong bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-3: dgung lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-4: dgung char ma bab sa bon chab 'tshal te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-5: lo tog mi 'khrungs zhugs shing 'khrungs ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-6: mtsho dang lu ma chu bran rgyud kyang bskams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-7: nags tshal rtsi shing kun kyang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-8: rnam dag spyan khyod 'khrungs par ma gyur bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-9: chab klung kun kyang ma lus bskams par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-10: bza' shing ra ba kun kyang ri dgon 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-11: rus pa dkar pos dogs bltams par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-12: gang tshe khyod la slong ba mang 'dus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-13: slong ba thams cad yongs su tshim mdzad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-14: phyogs bzhi kun nas sprin chen 'dus par gyur; ;thang dang gshong rnams kun kyang ngoms par bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-15: slan chad rkun chom g-yon can chad par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-16: dgum pa ma mchis su yang gzung ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-17: mgon med gang yang 'gum par mi 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-18: khyod ni 'gro ba mngon med kun gyi skyabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-19: srog gcod pa la mngon par mos pa'i mi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-20: gzhan rnams bkum zhing de yi khrag 'tshal la; ;gcig la gcig gi sha 'tshal gyur ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-21: khyod kyi sbyin pa chen pos byams sems gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65a-22: brgya stong grangs su bgrang bar gyur pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-0: de tshe 'ga' zhig rad pa @65b 'tshal gyur gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-1: gzhan ni rtsva dang lo ma rad pa 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-2: de tshe kun kyang yi dvags bkres mnar bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-3: 'gro ba mgon med mgon du khyod 'khrungs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-4: sa bon ma btab ma rmos 'bras kyang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-5: dpag bsam shing las mdzod rnams rnam par thon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-6: skyes pa bud med mkhas pa gda' bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-7: zla ba zla phyed don du sngon chad ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-8: lam nor gnas pa gsog cing sri zhu ra bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-9: deng sang rad pa rab 'tshal rgyan mang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-10: dga' ba'i gnas na rtse ba'i lha yang 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-11: sngon chad log pa rnams la mi bzad zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-12: chos ngan 'dod chags mi rnams zhen cing chags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-13: na chung gzhon nu gzhan gyis bsrungs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-14: nan gyis 'phrog rlom chab 'tshal ma rung bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-15: lha mo bzang mo'i kha dog gzugs ldan pa; ;gos bzang rgyan ldan deng sang mthong 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-16: gzhan gyi bud med spos dri gda' mchis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-17: dga' ldan ji bzhin mchis brang rgyan gyis 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-18: sho be brlang pa phra ma rkyal ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-19: sngon chad g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis ngag tu brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-20: deng yang tshig gi nongs pa bzhi spangs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-21: lta ba ngan spangs chos la kun kyang spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-22: tshangs dbyangs ka la pingka'i sgra byung ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-23: khyod kyi gsung mchog 'di yi cha shas la'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-24: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:65b-25: lha rdzas glu dbyangs 'di dag nyer mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-1: gtsug dbu steng gdugs lding ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-2: rin chen brgyus bgyis gser gyi dra bas bkab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-3: dpal gyi snying mdzod yu ba bee d'urya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-4: kun nas rin chen mchog gi dril gyis 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-5: dril las byung ba'i sgras kyang ma lus pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-6: 'jig rten sgra dbyangs ma lus zil mnan cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-7: sangs rgyas gsung gi yan lag 'dra bar 'khrol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-8: dam pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhi ba sgrog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-9: de thos sems can nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-10: ma lus phyogs kyi zhing rnams brgyud pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-11: bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bde gshegs rgya mtsho dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-12: blo ldan rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-13: sngon mtha'i zhing rnams gcig nas gcig brgyud du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-14: gang mtshan gang dang gang lags rim bzhin dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-15: ma lus phyogs su dam chos 'khor lo yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-16: khyod kyi byin gyis dril rnams rab tu sgrog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-17: khyod kyi dril sgra thogs pa ma mchis par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-18: tshangs dbang lha dbang 'gro ba'i bdag po rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-19: rang rang las kyi tshul ni kun rjod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-20: 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan khyab par kun tu sgrog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-21: dril gyi sgra las lha dang mi rnams kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-22: rang rang las kyi tshul rgyud thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-23: sdig to rnam spangs dge ba spyod par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la kun kyang gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66a-25: khyod kyi yab ni mi bdag skar ma'i 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-0: de yi @66b btsun mo padmo khyod kyi yum //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-1: rnyog pa lnga rnams shin tu rgyas gyur du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-2: chos 'grib rgyal srid des ni bzhes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-3: de yi bza' shing ra ba yangs byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-4: me tog rgyas brgyan rin chen sgron ma ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-5: shing mang brgyas bskor rdzing bu lnga brgya yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-6: de ni shin tu brgyan pa byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-7: de dag so so re re'i dogs su yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-8: ka ba stong ldan gzhal med khang bzang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-9: stegs bu bzang po sna tshogs stong gis brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-10: zla gam dra bas kun nas mdzes par bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-11: chos ngan stobs ni rab tu 'phel gyur bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-12: dgung lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-13: rdzing bu kun gyi chab dang zhugs shing rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-14: de tshe lo ma mdog dang bcas te bskams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-15: dgung bdun na ni khyod bltams 'gyur ba'i tshe; ;de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ltas byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-16: de dag mthong nas sems can nges rtogs par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-17: bdag cag skyob pa nges par 'byung zhes mchi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-18: dgung gi gung la bab nas rnam drug tu; ;khams kyi dogs yongs su g-yos par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-19: ma smad shin tu bzang ba'i rdzing de yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-20: dbus su gdugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od cig byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-21: chab bzang yan lag brgyad ldan rgyas par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-22: rdzing bu lnga brgya kun kyang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-23: zhugs shing kun kyang lo ma 'khrungs par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:66b-24: me tog 'bras bu kha dog mdog dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-2: nags tshal ma lus de dag ngoms par bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-3: chab chen de las byung ba'i rgyud 'phros pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-4: 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan chab kyis bltams par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-5: zhugs shing sman dang lo tog ldum bu yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-6: 'khrungs gyur zhugs shing me tog 'bras bu rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-7: dog sa'i steng na mchis rgu'i sa bon rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-8: kun kyang chab kyis brlan pas rnam par 'khrungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-9: chab kyis bangs gyur dog sa'i phyogs rnams kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-10: de tshe thams cad rab tu mnyam par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-11: sgang gshong dog sa'i phyogs rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-12: de dag kun kyang de tshe mnyam par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-13: g-yang sa grog po mi bde'i phyogs kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-14: de tshe yud kyis kun kyang mnyam par gyur; ;tsher ma gseg ma la sogs ma mchis gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-15: rin chen bzang po'i 'byung gnas yongs su thon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-16: skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-17: skom pas gdungs pa kun kyang chab la 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-18: kye ma de ring bde na su mthu zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-19: snyan par brjod pa de skad chad du brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-20: ngog sa'i mnga' bdag skar 'od sras dang bcas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-21: sras mo blon po'i tshogs bcas de yi tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-22: skye bo bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67a-23: bza' shing ra bar dgyes par gshegs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-0: mdangs dga' rdzing chen yongs su @67b ma smad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-1: spos chus bltams pa dbus na mchis gyur ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-2: de yi dbus su chos stegs bzang po yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-3: pho brang steng gshegs btsun mo bcas pas bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-4: dgung bdun lon par gyur nas de yi chab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-5: dgung gi gung la gyen du lud par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-6: ri dang gzhal med khang gi phreng bcas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-7: dog sa'ang de'i tshe yongs su g-yos par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-8: yongs su ma smad de yi dbus nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-9: padmo chen po lo ma stong ldan 'khrungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-10: gdugs stong mdor gsal sprin gyi dra ba can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-11: ri rab rtse mo man chad 'od kyis 'gengs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-12: chu ba rdo rje nang rim dri bda' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-13: rin chen dbang po'i lo ma rnam dag yangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-14: 'dzam bu chu klung gser bzang snying po can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-15: ze ba spos rab 'bar ba phun sum tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-16: mgon po khyod ni de yi snying po las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-17: skyil mo krung bcas sku ni byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-18: mtshan gyis rnam brgyan yan lag shin tu mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-19: lha mang brgyas kyang mngon par mchod pa bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-20: rgyal po pho brang steng nas shod gshegs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-21: phyag gnyis brkyangs te legs par khyod blangs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-22: btsun mo'i mgo la bzhag ste 'di skad gsungs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-23: khyod kyi bu 'di yin gyi dgar gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-24: 'jig rten mgon khyod de ltar bltams gyur tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-25: bye ba'i gter rnams rab tu thon par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:67b-26: zhugs shing kun kyang mngon par kha 'bus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-0: @68a *// steng gi mkha' las rol mo'i sgra yang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-1: 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan sems can thams cad kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-2: khyod la mngon lta 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-3: thal mo sbyar cing kye ma mgon med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-4: mgon zhig byung zhes dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-5: khyod kyi sku las 'od zer mang 'byung bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-6: dog sa kun tu rab tu snang bar gyur; ;'gro ba'i mun pa kun kyang rnam bsal nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-7: nad mang ma lus rab tu zhi bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-8: gnod sbyin grul bum sha za mang po'i tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-9: rnam par 'tshe ba de dag bsal bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-10: shin tu gdug pas sems can 'gums pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-11: sbrul gdug kun kyang de tshe yong mi rgyu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-12: thob med sman pa mi snyan sdug bsngal dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-13: nad rlangs nad mang gnod par 'tshe ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-14: mdor bsdus kun kyang zhi zhing ma mchis gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-15: 'jig rten kun tu rab dga' byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-16: phan tshun ma dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes kyis; ;khong nas byams pa de tshe 'gro kun gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-17: shar gnyer sems bral 'tshe ba ma mchis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-18: thams cad mkhyen lam nan tan ldan par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-19: ngan song rgyud rnams rnam par rab tu bzlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-20: mtho ris lam chen kun kyang btod par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang shin tu bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68a-22: de ltar khyod kyis 'gro don yangs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-0: @68b rgya mtsho che 'dra yongs su gtong mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-1: khyod mthong bdag ni thob pa dam pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-2: yun ring 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mgon bral du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-3: khyod ni rmad du byung ba'i mgon zhig gshegs de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od kyis rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de snyan par bkur nas rab tu bsngags te lan brgya phrag stong du g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-4: de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-6: de ltar khyod sems can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa la zhugs pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-9: 'jig rten thams cad na'ang sems can gang sems can pha rol gyi yon tan la mos pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-12: sems can mun pas bsgribs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-13: phan gdags pa la drin du mi gzo ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-14: blo phyin ci log la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-17: mun pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-18: bsam pa ngang gis log pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:68b-19: nan tan dang mi ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-1: can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par mi shes pa rnams kyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la 'jug par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la brtag par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-4: yon tan thams cad shes pa'i khyad par mngon par shes pa thob par bya bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-6: de ltar khyod sems can chen po mngon par shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu la 'jug pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-7: gdon mi za bar byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-8: de ltar nga'i khams su khyod lta bu ye shes de 'dra ba dang ldan pa skyes pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-9: dzambu'i gling du ngas sems can yongs su bsdus pa'i mthu don yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-10: de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-11: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-12: gos rin po che rin thang med pa bdag gis lag bdar te blangs nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-13: de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyang gos rin po che sna tshogs kyis khyad par byin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69a-15: gos rin po che 'di khyer la bdag gis yongs su spyad pa gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo @69b rin chen 'od 'khor dang bcas pas pus mo gnyis sa la phab ste gos rin po che dag lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas spyi bo la blangs te phyir byung nas rin po che de dag bgos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-1: de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyis kyang so so nas rang rang gi gos rin po che de dag bgos nas des gos rin po che de dag bgos pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la bdag gi 'khor bu mo de dag dang bcas pas g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-2: de dag thams cad kyi gos rin po che de dag la rgyu skar dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-3: skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-4: de dag mthong nas 'gro ba'i tshogs mang po 'di skad ces 'dzer te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-6: khyod kyi 'khor bu mo 'di dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-7: mtshan mo'i lha mo skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-8: khyod de dag gis bskor bas gya nom par mdzes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-9: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-11: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:69b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-2: de'i tshe rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od kyi btsun ma padmo'i 'od ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-5: rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yum du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-7: de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo padmo'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-8: rdzus te byung ba'i gzhon nu thu par len len pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-10: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba; rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yab tu gyur pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-11: rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-14: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70a-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-0: yang rigs @70b kyi bu; khyod de'i dus na sems can dzambu'i gling der skyes shing rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bkod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la bkod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' smon lam sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-23: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-25: yang dag par sgrub pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-28: lam gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:70b-30: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-0: lam gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su byung ste rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di @71a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-1: ni; chos kyi gzhal med khang sna tshogs na rnam par spyod pas 'khod cing rnam par spyod pa 'di dag yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-2: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-3: rgyal ba'i sras po kho mo'i mig yangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-4: phyogs kun zhing mang rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-5: sems can rgya chen gang chen mtsho yi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-6: 'khor bar gyur tshe kun la rnam par lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-7: 'byams klas zhing rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-8: rgyal ba byang chub shing gi drung bzhugs pa; ;rdul med kun kyang phyogs bcu rgyas bkang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-9: chos sgrog rtag par 'gro 'dul mthong bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-10: kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho yongs su dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-11: sgra rnams ma lus thams cad des thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-12: bde bar gshegs pas chos gsungs ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-13: thams cad dga' bas yang dang yang du thos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-14: kho mo'i ye shes gnyis med chags pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-15: sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi yul la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-16: 'gro ba'i sems kyi rgya mtsho yangs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71a-17: ma lus kun la mtshan nyid dngos kyis 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-0: sngon gyi mtha' dran ting nge 'dzin @71b stobs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-1: bskal pa rgya mtsho tshad med kho mos shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-2: tshe rabs rgyud mang gang chen mtsho dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-3: pha rol dag dang bdag gi'ang de bzhin shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-4: rgya mtsho'i zhing gcig rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-5: bskal pa skad cig gcig gis ma lus shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-6: sems can 'gro rgyud dag na 'khor ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-7: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul tshogs bcas de bzhin no; ;de dag thog ma'i smon lam ci 'dra dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-8: yang dag sgrub tshul 'jug tshul rnam yangs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-9: spyod la brten pas tshogs rnams yongs sgrub pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-10: 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyang kho mos dran //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-11: mnyam med tshad med tshogs gyur yon tan mtsho mnga' ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-12: dbang bskur sar byon ji snyed de dag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-13: byang chub 'tshang rgya'i tshul ni rnam yangs la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-14: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kho mo 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-15: thabs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang dag gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-16: bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa 'gror bskor dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-17: mya ngan 'das pa yon tan tshad med dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-18: chos rnams gnas pa'i dus kyang kho mos shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-19: dri med theg pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-20: sems can rnams 'dul rnam yangs ji snyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-21: 'gro bar de dag gis ni gang bstan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-22: so so kun la sna tshogs tshul gyis 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:71b-23: dga' ba'i gter dang mos pa'i dbyig gi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-0: kun tu snang ba rnam thar @72a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-2: kho mos bskal pa brgya mang rgya cher bsgoms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-3: de tshul de la khyod kyang myur 'jug gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-5: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-6: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gcig non pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i stabs la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad spyod pa re rer yang dag par 'du ba'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa re re la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du bar rnam par spyad pa la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72a-10: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-0: snying po byang chub 'di nyid na mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od ces @72b bya ba zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin cing 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-2: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-3: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-4: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mnyes par bya bas bsnyen bkur zhing rim gror bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-5: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson par bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:72b-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od gang na ba der song song nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab @73a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-1: tu snang ba'i rin po che'i dra bas kun nas yog pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-4: rgyu skar thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-5: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-6: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar rang gi lus rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-7: kha dog rgya mtsho yangs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-8: spyod lam thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i tshul yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-9: sgo kun tu mngon par bltas par rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-10: chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra kun tu sgrog cing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-11: dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi don la mngon du bltas par nam mkha'i dbyings kyis glo ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-0: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @73b bsags pa la gces shing sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon du chos kyi sprin yang dag par len cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems las phyir phyogs su ma gyur cing dran pas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-2: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od kun tu 'gyed cing snang ba yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-4: chos sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus dri ma med pa rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-5: chos kyi lus mun pa dang rdul du bral ba rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-6: chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu las byung ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-7: chos nyid rab tu rtogs pas mun pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-8: ye shes kyi snang ba sgo kun tu gsal ba rab tu thob pa shin tu nad med cing gdung ba med pa'i yid kyi lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-9: chos kyi sku mi shigs shing brtan pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:73b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs gnas med pa'i rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-0: dri ma med pa'i chos nyid kyi lus @74a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-1: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan pa de rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas rab tu snang ba'i snying po can gyi bstan la 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-2: des de mthong nas spyi bos btud de mthong bar bya ba'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su dran par byas nas sa'i gzhi las btud de rgyang bcad pa zhig tu mngon par btud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sa'i gzhi de las langs te thal mo sbyar nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od de'i lus la bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-4: 'du shes rnam par dag pa bcu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-5: de dag thob pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang skal pa mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus la dmigs pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rang gi sems kyi 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa yongs su sgrub pa grub par bya ba'i phyir rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du shes rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-0: smon lam thams @74b cad kyis brgyan pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan gyi 'du shes rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag gi lam la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa'i chos bla na med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i snang ba yongs su mthong bar bya ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba ba skyed pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-3: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-4: spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba gcig gi 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-5: dge ba'i chos yongs su bsags pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-6: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brtson 'grus kyi shugs yongs su 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-7: yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:74b-8: yongs su skyong ba'i 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-0: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir @75a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos la dbang bsgyur bar rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la don thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-3: 'du shes rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-4: de dag thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od snang ba las byang chub sems dpa' dang skal pa mthun pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-5: 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dus gsum rjes su dran pa'i tshul la dran pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-6: chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad tha ma dad par khong du chud par bya ba la blo gros kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rigs pas rjes su shes par bya ba'i bye brag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-8: tshul tha dad par mkhas pa la rig pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75a-9: blo nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir blo'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-0: @75b byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho shes pa'i snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir dbang po rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-1: rnam pa thams cad du sems can yongs su bsdu ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan gyis lam khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod yul gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i lam snang ba rnam pa thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-4: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes shing khong du chud pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir don khong du chud pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-5: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la chos la rnam par spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:75b-6: sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-0: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la rnam pa tha dad par yongs su bstan pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i skal pa @76a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir stobs kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-3: sems dang bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-4: bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas mi skyo ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir btson 'grus kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-5: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-6: 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zil gyis mi non pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-7: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i tshigs yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma zhum mi dma' ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-8: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig rnam par dmigs pa'i tha snyad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76a-10: tshul rgya mtsho la dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-0: de bzhin gshegs @76b pa'i gdams ngag gi yon tan khong du chud pa rnam par dag par bya ba la yon tan rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-1: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las rnam par smin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos dang las kyi rgyud du mi 'gal ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-2: sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mchod sbyin gyi chos bzang po la rab tu gnas pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang ye shes la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnams par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-4: byams pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyis skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-5: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-6: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs kyi rgyud du skal pa mnyam par bya ba'i phyir lus kyi las kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:76b-7: chos thams cad brjod cing smos pa la ngag gi las rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-0: sems can thams cad kyi sems la @77a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir yid kyi las kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-3: sangs rgyas 'byung brgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dus ma lus par mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro bya ba'i phyir mchod pas rim gror bya ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-6: sems can gyi khams thams cad du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-7: chos kyi tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu thob pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir kun tu rgyas par dgang ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-0: byang chub sems dpa' @77b thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa la 'khor gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shin tu phra bar 'jug pa la 'jug pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yangs pa thams cad du sems rnam par phye ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rnam pa tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba la khong du chud pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par phye ba ye shes mtha' yas pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba la tshul 'byams klas pas kun tu rgyas par dgang ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-7: phyogs thams cad rgyas par dgang bar yang dag par gzhol ba thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir mi ldog pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:77b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir mun pa rnam par sel ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-1: thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor rjes su phyin pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i sbyor ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyi dra bas rgyas par dgang ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-3: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho rjes su rgyu ba de dang de dag la ye shes mngon sum gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-4: rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad mngon du bya ba'i sbyor ba la nan tan gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-5: chos kyi mos pa shin tu shas che ba'i brtsams pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir btsal ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-6: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgyan yongs su sgrub pa la rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-7: nyam nga ba'i rtog pa med pa'i sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs yang dag par brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i sbyor ba la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs @78b su rdzogs par bya ba la spyod pa'i rgyan gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-1: chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma khong du chud par bya ba la chags pa med par rnam par spyad pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-2: chos la rnam par spyod pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dang de dag tu thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-3: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yul bstan pas yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir skye mched rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-4: chos thams cad sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-5: rnam par sgom pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob par bya ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rab tu thob par bya ba las yongs su gnan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan pa la yongs su bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:78b-11: skad cig gcig gi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-1: 'phrin las mtshan nyid sna tshogs la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dgod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-2: rjes su dran pa'i dmigs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rjes su dran pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par zhe non pa la byang chub sems dpas spyad pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-4: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos shing dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-5: sgrib pa'i ri thams cad la rnam par zlog pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyir mi zlog pa'i ye shes kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-7: sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-8: gdul ba'i dus su skye ba'i skal pa dang mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul gyi sgo la rnam par spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i yul la rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir yul gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79a-11: gzhi thams cad yongs su chom pa'i sems su bya ba'i phyir gzhi med pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-0: @79b chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rang gi lus kyis yang dag par gnon pa'i phyir brtson pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-2: 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir nan tan gyi tshul la mngon par shes pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-3: phyogs thams cad kyi zhing rgya mtshor 'jug par bya ba la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-4: gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba la gzungs kyi sa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-5: mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-6: nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu'i chos kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos zab mo la 'jug pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du snang bar bya ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-8: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par bstan pa la mngon par gsal ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:79b-9: zhing gi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-0: rnam par 'phrul pa sems can yongs su @80a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-1: bstan pa'i phyir rab tu bskyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-4: rjes su dran pas sems can gdul ba'i phyir don yod par spyad pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-5: smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas stobs bcu'i ye shes rjes su 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i skal pa mnyam pa yang rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-6: de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang shin tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-7: mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la bltas pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa de dag thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-8: 'di dag la sogs pa mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od las skal pa mnyam pa'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la blta ba'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs pa; dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-0: skal pa mnyam pa'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu @80b phra ba snyed la zhugs pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-1: de ni bdag gi sems la bdag dgongs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-2: byang chub mos pa mi ldog shin tu brtan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-3: khyod kyi thugs la'ang bdag ni de bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-4: bdag gi bzhin du de ring brtan par skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-5: sdig to ma lus rnam par byang bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-6: dge ba'i rnam smin mi nya ma rab tu thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-7: bdag gis blta na mdzes pa khyod mthong bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-8: chos dkar mi bas bdag gis yongs su bsags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-9: bdag gi sems ni yon tan chu bos brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-10: sems can phan brtson rnam pa tha dad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-11: brgyan 'gyur des ni phyi mtha'i bskal par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-12: zhing rnams kun tu spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
