K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-13: 'phags mas bdag la thugs brtse mdzad slad du; ;chos rnams thams cad grub pa khyod kyis bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-14: bdag la sman slad rjes su gzung dgongs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-15: chos kyi gdams ngag dam pa stsal du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-16: ngan 'gror ltung ba'i lam ni rnam par bzlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-17: mtho ris shul gtsang dam pa yongs su bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:80b-18: bde gshegs ma lus bzhud cing rjes bzhud pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-2: dpe med rmad du byung mang khyod la bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-3: 'byung ba'i 'du shes dam pa nye bar skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-4: nam mkha' lta bur dri med tshad med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-5: thams cad mkhyen nyid chos sgo rnam par dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-6: kun mkhyen tshad med 'byung gnas bzang po yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-7: 'du shes de ring tshad med khyod la skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-8: bsod nams rgya mtsho mkha' ltar tshad med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-9: sems las byung ba skad cig re rer 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-10: 'phags ma pha rol phyin pas bdag bkur gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-11: bsam yas bsod nams kyis kyang rnam spel gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-12: yon tan dge ba thams cad yongs 'phel nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang myur thob mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rtag par bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-15: thams cad mkhyen lam rab rdzogs 'du shes te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-16: de yi slad du bdag gi chos dkar rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-17: myur du rdzogs par 'gyur zhes tshim par gyur; ;de slad 'di las don kun rab tu 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-18: dge ba'i yon tan ldan pa grub par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-19: brjod pa mtha' yas thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-20: 'di ni yongs su bsgrubs shing 'gro la brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-21: yon tan tshad med khyod ni slob dpon gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81a-22: thams cad mkhyen gyi chos la bdag 'dren pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-0: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med @81b pas; ;'phags ma khyod la bdag gis lan mi lon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-1: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-3: khyod kyis bdag la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ni; bstan ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-5: rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-9: ci srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-11: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-12: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-13: mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-16: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par skul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:81b-18: kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-0: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la zhugs nas gnas med pa'i chos la brten te 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags par @82a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-1: gyur to; ;chos rnams kyi gzugs shin tu rnam par phye ba la zhugs te mi 'dra ba med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-2: sna tshogs med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-3: rnam pa tha dad pa med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-4: mi rtog pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-5: mi sngo ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-6: mi ser ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-7: mi dmar ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-8: mi dkar ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-9: mi mthun pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-11: rnam pa tha dad pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-16: mi dkar ba'i kha dog gi chos nyid la zhugs nas kha dog rnam par phye ba du ma'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyi kha dog can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-18: kha dog tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-19: kha dog rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-20: rgyan thams cad 'byin pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-21: kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-22: 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-23: 'jig rten thams cad la mngon du gyur cing lhag pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-24: gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-25: mi mthun pa med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-26: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par sbyangs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-27: kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82a-28: stobs chen pos rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-0: @82b zab mo thob par dka' ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-1: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gis mi zad pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-3: skad cig re re la sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-4: kha dog gi sprin sna tshogs yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-5: gzugs dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyi kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-6: rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-7: shin tu yid du 'ong zhing rnam par snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-8: bzang po dang mdzes pa thams cad 'bel ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-10: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-11: thogs pa med par kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-12: dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal te 'od dang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-13: mi shigs pa'i lus kyis bsgrubs pas mdzes par gyur pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-14: chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-15: zil gyis ma non la zil gyis gnon pas thams cad zil du rlag par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-16: mun pa dang rab rib med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-17: mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:82b-18: dkar po thams cad shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-1: ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-2: sngon bla ma la rim gror byas pas shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-3: lhag pa'i bsam pa nam mkha' yongs su dag par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-4: mchog dam pa phul du byung bar shin tu yangs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-5: mi 'phrog mi zad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-6: 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas shing ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-7: thogs pa med par phyogs thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-8: sems kyi skad cig 'byams klas pa la zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med par kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-9: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-10: sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-11: ba spu'i sgo thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-12: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-13: chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83a-14: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs su snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-0: nam mkha' ltar @83b dri ma med par snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-1: rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par dag pa ltar rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i 'od la gnas pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-2: chos nyid dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-3: kha dog dpag tu med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-4: phyogs kun tu snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-5: dus la gang du bab par 'gro ba yongs su ston pa ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-6: zhi ba dang dul ba'i phyogs las byung ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-8: 'gro ba bsod nams kyi zhing thams cad la rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-9: 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sel ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-10: don yod par 'gro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-11: ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa chen po rab tu brjod pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-12: chags pa med pa'i lus kyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-13: lus dam pa'i sprin gyi dbyangs kyis 'gro ba kun tu ston par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-14: byams pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-15: bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:83b-16: 'gro ba thams cad du mi gnas kyang 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-1: kyi stobs chen po rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-2: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang 'grogs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-3: rin po che thams cad lta bu'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-4: rnam par snang ba'i snying po ltar yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-5: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i tshul dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-7: mig 'dzum gyis rgyas pas 'gro ba mos par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-8: rin po che'i rgyan dam pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-9: 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa la phyir phyogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-10: nges pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-11: byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-12: rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-14: chos kyi dbyings kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-0: kha dog sna tshogs rab tu sgrub @84b pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-2: rgyu mthun pa bzang pos byung ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-3: 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar sgrub pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-4: 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-5: 'od dang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od du snang ba'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-6: dus gsum gyi kha dog rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-7: 'od zer kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-8: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog brjod du med pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-9: spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba kun las 'das pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-10: ba spu'i sgo re re nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-11: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs dri ma med cing yangs pa'i sprin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-12: me tog yid du 'ong ba'i ri rab kyi sprin mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-13: phreng ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa'i shing gi sprin phreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-14: thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:84b-15: rin po che thams cad kyi padmo'i sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-0: spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun @85a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-1: gyi gzugs kyi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'grengs pa'i kha dog tu sems kyi skad cig re re la phye ma'i mdzod kyi sprin thams cad byin gyis brlabs shing phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par bkang nas mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-3: rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-4: chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa mngon par sgrub pas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-5: yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-6: gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-7: bsnyen bkur bya bas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-8: khong du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-10: chos 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-12: chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-14: mi dge ba'i las las rnam par bzlog pa'i dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-15: dge ba'i las yongs su sgrub pa la so sor dgod pa'i dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85a-16: sngon smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-0: thams @85b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs kyi dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob pa'i chos kyi dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-2: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa shin tu sgrub pa'i snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su 'byung ba'i dbang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-3: byams pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa yongs su skyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blang ba'i phyir rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-5: de ltar kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-6: rnam par dbye ba med pa'i chos la zhugs nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs yongs su bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:85b-7: spyod pa'i lus re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas te spyod pa'i kha dog re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od zer gyi spring yongs su bkye zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-0: 'od zer re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gzugs brnyan mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba mtha' dang @86a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-1: dbus med pa yongs su bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-3: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-5: bskyed pa rnams kyang yangs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs par byas pa rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-9: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu dgod par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-10: shin tu rgyas par chen po'i mdo; sangs rgyas pa po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-11: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-14: gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du smras te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-15: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-17: bskal pa brgya phrag ji snyed cig nas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-18: byang chub kyi spyod pa la spyod ces zer ba de'i don kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-0: rtog @86b pa dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-2: 'khor ba thung bar rnam par dgod cing brjod par bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-3: bskal pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-4: bskal pa rnam par dag pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-9: bskal pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-10: bskal pa rnam pa tha dad par bya bar yang rnam par dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-11: brjod par bya ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-15: rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-16: 'du shes kyi dra ba thams cad dang bral bar sgrib pa'i ri thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i bsam pa la yongs su 'char te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-17: de'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus su 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-20: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyin mtshan gyi grangs su bya ba med de mi srid kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-22: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:86b-23: nyin par du snang zhing brjod pa yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-0: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil @87a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-1: 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa la rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-2: yongs su rtog pa thams cad med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-3: 'khor ba na gnas pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang dus su bya ba thams cad kyang med mod kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-4: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-5: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus kyi dbang gis bskal par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-6: 'khor ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam par bgrang ba'i grangs su bgrang ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-7: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-8: phyi ma'i bskal par gnas pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par bgrang ba yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-12: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug kyang rin po che'i ri thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-13: rin po che'i shing thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-14: rin po che'i snod thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-15: rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-17: mtsho dang mtshe'u thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-18: chu dang ba'i snod thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-19: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87a-20: sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur bar snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-0: rin po che thams cad kyi rdul shin @87b tu phra ba rnams la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan byung bar snang yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-1: rin po che'i ri rnams la yang gnas pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-2: rin po che'i shing nas rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnams kyi bar du'ang zhugs pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-3: rin po che'i 'bru rnams kyi khongs su chud pa'ang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-4: rin po che'i 'byung gnas rnams kyi rjes su song ba'ang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-5: rgya mtsho rnams kyi nang du song ba'ang ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-6: chu'i snod thams cad kyi nang du zhugs pa'ang ma yin mod kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-7: thams cad kyi khongs na 'dug par yang snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-13: chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rgyud la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-15: zhi ba'i nam mkha'i dbyings la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-17: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-18: skye gnas thams cad du'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus su skye bar snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-19: 'khor ba'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:87b-20: skyed dang shi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nye bar gdung ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-1: par rtog pa dag dang 'grogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-2: bskal pa la'ang ring ba'i 'du shes sam thung ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-3: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-4: byang chub sems dpa' phyin ci log las shin tu 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-7: lta ba'i phyin ci log las yongs su 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-8: rmi lam lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes kyis khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-9: sgyu ma lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad rab tu rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-10: sems can med pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-11: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rab tu mthong bas snying rje'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-12: smon lam chen po'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-13: gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-17: chu klung chen po la sogs pa la gru ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-18: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can yongs su bsgral ba la brtson pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-19: nam ma zhig gi bar du rgyun gcod pa med kyang de la pha rol gyi ngogs la mngon par chags pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88a-20: tshu rol gyi ngogs la'ang chags pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-0: chu'i dbus na'ang gnas @88b pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i gru'i mthus 'khor ba'i chu klung gi rgyud las sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral ba la zhugs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-3: de la tshu rol gyi mus 'jigs pa med do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-4: pha rol gyi mur bde bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-5: 'on kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad du gnas par bya bar zhe non pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral bar bya ba la zhugs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-6: bskal pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa la mngon par zhen pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-7: bskal pa 'da' bar bya ba la ring ba'i 'du shes su gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-11: chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nam mkha'i gzhi'i dkyil 'khor na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du 'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-13: 'das par gyur kyang rnam par rtog pa med cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:88b-14: 'khrug pa med cing bsgribs pa med la phyi ma'i mtha'i dus su zhing thams cad 'dzin kyang yongs su skyo ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa ye shes @89a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-1: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor kyang smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing ngan song gi g-yang sa thams cad las sems can yongs su 'dzin kyang yongs su skyo ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-2: bde ba'i lam la 'god pa byed kyang yongs su sgyid lug pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la 'god kyang zhum par byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-4: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'khrug pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-5: 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gdung ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-9: sgyu ma'i rnam pa las grub pa'i mi yan lag dang nying lag shin tu tshang ba la lus la gnas pa'i chos bcu med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-10: bcu gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-25: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa las byung ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89a-26: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-0: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i don du @89b skyes te bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la'ang chos bcu med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-2: 'di ltar 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-3: 'khor ba srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye bas skyo bar 'gyur ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-4: yul gyi dga' ba la 'dun pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-8: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-9: lam nyam nga bar skye bas 'jigs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-11: mngon par chags pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-13: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya chen po'i stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-15: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha snga 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od de la bskal pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-18: 'od bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-19: bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba de la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:89b-20: sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-0: @90a *// sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu po de dag las bskal pa'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-5: lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-6: de thams cad kyi thog ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de gling bzhi pa'i dbus na rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod pa dang tshad du'ang rgyang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-9: rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa de'i shar phyogs logs na nags tshal 'od bzang po zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-10: nags tshal 'od bzang po der snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog gi sprin ces bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90a-11: snying po byang chub rin po che'i sprin ces bya ba der gdan sengge'i khri rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-0: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po bla @90b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-1: de'i tshe mi'i tshe'i tshad lo stong phrag bcu thub pa las 'jig rten du sems can srog gcod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-2: ma byin par len pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-3: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-6: zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-7: tshig kyal ba zer ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-8: chags sems dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-10: log par lta ba can byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-11: de ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu rnam par rgyas par gyur nas rab tu brtan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po des 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-13: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying po byang chub mchog tu gshegs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-14: de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa de na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-15: des mi ma byin par len pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:90b-22: zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-4: chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-5: 'dod pa mi bzad pas mngon par non pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-6: log pa'i chos kyi kun nas 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-10: 'jigs pas bag tsha ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-13: dge sbyong du bya ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-14: bram zer bya ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-16: g-yo dang ldan pa brgya stong du ma rab tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir btson rar btsud par gyur to; ;rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od de la bu gzugs bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-19: kha dog bzang po dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-20: mi chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de khang pa glu snyan pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i steng du phyin te bud med kyi 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing 'dug 'dug pa las btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis dmad du glags pa de dag gi sgra 'jigs 'jigs skad du 'bod pa thos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-21: thos nas mi dga' zhing shin tu nyams mi bde ba'i sems su gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91a-22: snying rje chen po skyes nas khang steng de nas shod du babs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-0: btson ra der @91b phyin nas btson ra dam po na 'khod pa'i sems can shing sgrog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-3: ltung dang mdo rtod kyis sgrog shing brtod de gcig gi lus dang gcig tu sbrel nas mun pa mun nag tu btsud de dud pa'i rab rib kyis 'grigs shing rlung nad nyams su mi bde bas nyam thag par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-4: dbugs shin tu mi bde bar rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-5: bkres pa dang skom pas mnar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-7: lus thams cad phyag dar dang rdul gyi nang na 'gre ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-8: lus rang gi skras yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-9: brla sgril gyis dam du bcings pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-10: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis mtho brtsams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-11: sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas zil gyis mnan cing sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-12: mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi smre sngags bla zhing 'o dod 'bod pa de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-13: snying rje'i bsam pa rgya chen po byung nas gzhan la phan par bya ba'i sems skyes te btson ra thibs po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams btson ra nas thar par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-14: zhes dbugs bton nas des sems can de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:91b-15: lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen pa mdzad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-0: btson ra mi bde ba na mchis pa'i sems can rnams @92a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-1: la glo ba rje nas bdag gis mi 'jigs pa stsal na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-2: de dag dgye bar ci gnang zhes nas de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis blon po lnga brgya po bsags nas khyed ji snyam du sems zhes smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-5: rgyal po'i phyag mdzod rku ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-6: rgyal po'i sku la dar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-7: btsun mo'i 'khor du zhugs pa las bzung ba sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-10: de dag gi chad pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-12: ma lags na'ang btson rar gum na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-14: de dag gi mgon su bgyid pa de'ang rgyal po'i zhal sngar glo ba ring ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-15: de nas rgyal po'i bu rnam par rgyal ba'i snying rje chen pos mi bzod ches nas blon po de dag la smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-16: khyed kyis ji skad du smra ba de ltar yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-17: ngas khong ta 'di dag gi don du sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba thams cad kyang bzod par bya na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-18: de dag la khyed kyis ci bya ba de nga la gyis te nyes pa can de dag khye zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-19: ngas de rnams btson ra nas dgrol ba'i don du mi bde ba thams cad nyams su blang ste lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92a-20: srog yongs su dor bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-0: gal te ngas sems can 'di rnams tsam zhig kyang btson ra nas @92b dgrol bar ma nus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-1: khams gsum pa'i btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can sred pa'i zhags pas glags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-2: ma rig pa'i thibs po na 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-3: gti mug gi mun par btsud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-4: phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-5: ngan song gi rgyud zabs su ring zhing 'byung bar dka' bar chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-6: dbyibs mi sdug la mdog mi sdug pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-7: dbang po'i sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-8: nor ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-11: khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-12: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-13: ye shes kyi skye mched dang skol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-14: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems dri ma can du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-15: sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-16: bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-25: 'khrug pas mnar ba rnams kyang ji ltar khrol bar bya zhes nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag bdag nyid yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:92b-26: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bas g-yog 'khor thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-0: nor gyi phung po thams cad kyis blus te btson ra de dag nas yongs su bkye nas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal @93a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-1: nyams su blangs te phyir ldog pa med par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-2: de nas blon po lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa gyen du bsgreng ste 'o dod bos nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od kyi gan du dong ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-3: rgyal po'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-4: gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i mchid thabs su bgyis pas rgyal po'i chab srid kyang stor bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-5: bdag cag rnams kyang srog la 'bab par the tshom 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-6: lha'i zhal snga nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba la bka' nan ma mdzad na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-7: ring po'ang mi thogs par lha'i zhal sngar sku la dar bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-9: de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od shin tu khros nas rgyal po'i bu rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-10: g-yon dang ldan pa'i mi de dag tu bcas te gsad par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-11: de nas de'i ma skyed skyed pas thos nas mi dga' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-12: bud med kyi 'khor stong dang bcas te skra ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-21: phyag dar gyis gang bar snying rje rje skad kyi nga ror du zhing rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te 'di skad du gsol ba btab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93a-22: lha'i zhal snga nas thugs ci dgongs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-0: rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal @93b ba gtang du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-1: rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i srog stsal du gsol zhes nas de nas rgyal pos rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba mdun du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-3: g-yon dang ldan pa'i mi 'di rnams thong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-4: de ste mi gtong zhing de rnams kyi le lan du shi bar gyur ta re zhes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-5: des zhum pa med pa'i sems ma 'khums pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-7: gzhan la phan par gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-8: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas 'chi bar khas blangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-9: de'i mas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od la zla ba phyed cig tu phrad par gsol ba btab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-10: dgung zla phyed cig tu gzhon nu 'di sbyin pa stsol du ci gnang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-11: de slan chad ni; su ci dgyes pa de'ang mdzad par gsol zhes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-14: de nas rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa de'i byang phyogs logs shig na sngon mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bya ba'i bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba der gzhon nu de song nas su ci 'dod pa de la de byin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:93b-15: des gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas nas zla ba phyed du sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-11: yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang de dag 'dod pa la yongs su btang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-12: de nas nyi ma tha ma la bab par gyur pa dang 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kun nas 'dus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-17: ljongs dang yul gyi mi dang zhags pa thub pa thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-18: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-19: gdul ba'i dus thugs su chud nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te lha'i dbang po'i tshogs kyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-20: yongs su bskor; klu'i dbang pos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-22: gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-26: lha ma yin gyi dbang pos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94a-28: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug gi rin po ches rnam par brgyan pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-0: sems dang ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pas rab tu @94b bkang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-1: mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-2: dga' bas yongs su mchod de bstod pa'i glu dbyangs kyis yongs su bskul /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-4: kun nas bskor cing zhal du blta ba de 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-5: rgyal po gzhon nu rnam bar rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po shin tu mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-8: thugs zhi ba; shin tu dben par dbang po las rgyal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-9: glang po ltar shin tu dul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-10: mtsho ltar rab tu dvangs shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-11: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang; cho 'phrul chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-12: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba chen pos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-17: dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-20: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang bas rgyas par 'gengs shing sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar mdzad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-21: sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:94b-22: spos rin po che'i ngad 'phro ba'i 'khor lo rab tu 'gyed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-0: @95a *// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyod pa'i tshul du ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa mdzad cing rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-2: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-3: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal blta ba'i byin gyis pha zad cig nas tshur gshegs pa mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mngon par mos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-4: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-5: 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po de pha zad du bsu nas mos pa'i sems kyis lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag 'tshal nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-6: bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs su gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-7: bde bar gshegs pa tshur gshegs su gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dgongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-0: bde bar gshegs pas bdag cag yongs @95b su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-1: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das la gdan dam pas bstabs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-2: bcom ldan 'das gdan bting ba 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-3: gdan de yang gtsang sbra lhur len pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i padmo'i snying po can du byin gyis brlabs nas gdan de la bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-4: 'khor gyi stan de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-5: de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu 'khor de'i sems can thams cad kyang sgrib pa thams cad dang bral te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-6: nad thams cad kyang zhi bar gyur nas 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal pos sems can de dag snod du gyur par thugs su chud nas bstan pa rim pas bka' stsal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:95b-8: 'di ltar rgyu'i dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan nas zhal gyi sgo nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-1: ngag gi dbyangs su brjod pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag stong dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-2: chos kyi yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu bsgrags pa dang; de'i mod la 'khor de nas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-3: rdul dang bral te dri ma med par gyur nas chos la chos kyi mig skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-4: srog chags bye ba mang zhig gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-5: mi slob pa'i sa thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-6: srog chags stong phrag bcu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-7: theg pa chen po la rnam par dul bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-8: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-9: smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul la zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-10: de ltar bcom ldan 'das des sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed theg pa chen po la rnam par dul bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa sna tshogs su gtogs pa dag gi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa dag gis kyang ngan song gi lam rnam par bzlog par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96a-12: sems can grangs las 'das pa zhig ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-0: mtho ris su skye ba'i lam la rab tu bkod par gyur @96b to; ;rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba 'di thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-2: de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-3: rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang nas nor gyi tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-5: mi'i 'jig rten na 'tsho ba'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thar par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-6: mchod sbyin chen po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po de la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ba'i mod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:96b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba yang thob par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-0: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta @97a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-3: de ltar kho mo rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-4: snying rje chen pos rab tu mi dga' zhing 'gro ba thams cad la phan par zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-5: khams gsum la mi gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-6: rnam par smin pa'i lan la re ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-9: ming smos pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-10: bdag la bstod pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-11: gzhan la smod pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-12: dngos po thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-13: sred pa'i 'du shes las gyen du 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-14: khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-15: 'jig rten gyi yul gyi bde ba las phyir phyogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-18: lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-19: 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen pos nan tan du byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-20: 'gro ba thams cad la snying brtse bas sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la bsam pa thag pa nas lhag par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i @97b lam yongs su sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-1: theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis 'byung ba'i lam rab tu brgyan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mngon par blta bar bya ba'i tshul gyis de dag de lta bur dka' ba dag kyang byas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba 'di yun de srid du ring ba zhig nas thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-7: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus ni rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od la log par gsol ba 'debs shing kho mo gsad pa'i phyir gros su gsol ba'i blon po lnga brgya po de rnams gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-10: lhas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir skyes bu lnga brgya bkye ba de dag yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-11: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba zhig la sangs rgyas lnga brgya sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-12: rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-13: pha dang ma sna tshogs su smos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:97b-14: skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-1: par 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-2: byang chub kyi shing gi 'od sna tshogs yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-3: snying po byang chub sna tshogs su nye bar 'dong ba'i sgo sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-4: bdud pham pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-5: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-8: nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-9: mdo sde'i tshul shin tu bstan pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-10: tshig gi lam dang skad sna tshogs rab tu ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-11: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-12: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthu dang rgyan sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-13: tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-14: bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-15: bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa; ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-16: snying rje chen po'i lus su gyur pa sha stag tu 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98a-17: de dag gi bskal pa'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'od du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-0: de'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi @98b khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum pa thugs rje chen po'i sengge zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi pa 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba nas thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-3: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-5: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na g-yon dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyal po la snying ring bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-7: kho mos gsod ma mi'i lag tu phyin pa las rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste btson ra de dag nas bkye ba de rnams gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:98b-10: de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mtha' yas grags par brjod pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros mthong bar gyur ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu @99a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-1: sems bskyed nas da ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di yang sgom zhing shin tu rgyas par byed pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-3: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-6: smra ba chen po bden pa can ni; de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-8: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-9: de'i dus na rgyal po'i 'khor du gyur pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-10: btsun mo'i gnas kyi sgo ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-12: rjes su 'brang ba de dag kyang gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99a-13: de ltar mi blta ste; zhags pa thub pa stong phrag drug cu po smra ba chen po bden pa can gyi smra ba'i rgyal mtshan yongs su gzung ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das la rgol du 'gro ba'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar blags nas kun kyang zhing sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-0: ming sna tshogs kyi de bzhin gshegs par 'jig rten @99b du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-3: rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba de pha dang mas gnang nas sems can brtson ra ba de dag yongs su bkrol ba'i 'og tu srid shin tu bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-5: dbyig rin po che phun sum tshogs ba dag kyang por /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-6: bu dang chung ma dag kyang spangs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po'i zham 'bring du rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-7: rab tu byung nas kyang lo stong phrag lngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-8: de'i bar skabs su ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu yongs su bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-9: gzungs kyi sgo stong phrag bcu'ang rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-10: mngon par shes pa'i tshul stong phrag bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i gter stong phrag bcu'ang rab tu thob bo; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-12: bzod pa'i sgo stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su sbyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-13: sems nges par gzhag pa stong phrag bcu'ang mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:99b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi lus stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su spel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo stong phrag bcur yang @100a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul stong phrag bcu yang yongs su skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-3: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs kyi sgo stong phrag bcu yang mngon du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam stong phrag bcu'ang mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-5: de de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu yongs su gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar rjes su dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho stong phrag bcu phyogs bcur gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong zhing shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-8: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcur gtogs pa'i sems can 'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa shi 'pho zhing skye bar gyur pa mtho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-10: bde 'gro'i lam du phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-11: ngan song gi lam du phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-13: kha dog mi sdug pa las ci bzhin du skyes par gyur pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100a-14: sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba yang khong du chud cing mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-6: yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-7: rnam par gdul ba'i dus kyang khong du chud cing mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-9: rgyal po gzhon nu de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling de nyid du rgyal po'i gnas dga' ba dang ldan par rgyal po de nyid kyi rigs su skyes nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-10: de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' la dpal shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-11: de'i 'og tu snying po byang chub de nyid du brgya byin du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa lha dbang snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-13: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dpal ri bo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:100b-15: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi @101a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-1: 'khor lo'i 'od rab tu bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-2: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-4: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thug pa med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-6: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du lha ma yin gyi dbang por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-8: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du tshangs pa'i dbang por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'od de nyid du bskal ba 'od bzang po de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-0: bskal pa 'od bzang po de'i 'og tu bskal pa 'od zer bzang po zhes bya ba @101b byung ste; bskal pa 'od zer bzang po de la yang sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-1: kho mo yang bskal pa de la rgyal po blo gros chen po zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-2: de'i tshe kho mo rgyal por gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi dpal ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-3: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la khyim bdag cig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa phung po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-5: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la blon po zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i sras zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-7: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa shugs mnga' ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-9: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la shing gi lha mo zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-11: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de gnyis la ded dpon cig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa phyag dri ma med pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-13: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la grong khyer gyi lha mo zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:101b-15: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la ngal bso bo zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa lha dbang gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur @102a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-1: to; ;de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la dri za'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-3: de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la grul bum gyi dbang po zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i cod pa na zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-5: rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa bskal pa 'od zer bzang po de la skye ba'i rigs sna tshogs su skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag drug cu bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-6: kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sbyan sngar 'gro ba'i tshe yang sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sbyan sngar 'gro ba'i tshe yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sna tshogs rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-10: gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-11: mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-12: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul rjes su rtogs par bya ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-0: chos snang ba'i @102b sgo thob par bya ba'i tshul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-1: ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par dpyad pa rnams pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-2: phyogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i snang ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-3: zhing rgya mtsho sna tshogs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i snang ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mthong bar bya ba rnam par dmigs pa'i snang ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu thob pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-8: yongs su gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-15: bskal pa 'od zer bzang po de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar rim gror byas pa de bzhin du bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas de dag tu byon te chos bstan par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos chos bstan pa thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-17: thos nas kyang yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:102b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa yang kho mos yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad @103a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-1: las kyang kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba 'di thob par bya ba'i tshul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-2: rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi sgo sna tshogs kyis thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-3: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyis de'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-4: yongs su bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab rnam thar dam pa 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-6: grags pa khyod kyis bdag la gang dris pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i byin gyis de bstan gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-8: ma lus yang dag ji bzhin bdag la nyon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-9: bskal pa bsam yas yangs pa mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-10: rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul dang grangs mnyam pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-11: de kun 'das pa'i snga rol mdangs dga' ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-12: 'jig rten khams shig byung ba rin chen 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-13: de tshe bskal pa bzang po'i 'od kyang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-14: de la rgyal ba dpag tu med pa skyes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-15: thub pa'i dbang po de dag kho mo yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-16: rnam thar 'di la sgom zhing bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103a-17: rgyal po'i gnas rab yangs shing bzang byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-0: de yi ming ni dga' bas @103b brgyan pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-1: de tshe sems can rnam par ma dag sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-2: mi bzang ngan du spyod pa der byung gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-3: der ni rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-4: sems can de dag chos kyis bskyang ba byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-5: de yi bu ni rnam par rgyal ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-6: mdzes shing mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-7: g-yon ldan stong phrag mang po de dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-8: de tshe rgyal pos gsad par byas mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-9: bzhon nu snying brtse mi dga' kun nas 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-10: myur du dgye bar rgyal po de la gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-11: rgyal pos thos nas de tshe blon po rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-12: ma lus kun bsdus de la bka' stsal nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-13: kun gyis de la phyag byas phyir gsol pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-14: de ni rgyal po khyod dgrongs thabs cig lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-15: rgyal po de ltar log par thugs bcug nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-16: sras de gsad par de tshe byas gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-17: bdag srog phangs par ma brtsis ngo zum med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-18: rgyal po'i sras kyis gsad par byas ma btang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-19: gsad par byas pa de yi mas thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-20: rgyal po de la 'khor bcas gsol ba 'debs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-21: dgung zla phyed cig sbyin pa ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-22: 'jig rten stsol du gzhon nu gtang bar gnong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-23: rgyal po des kyang de ltar gnang gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-24: des ni ci 'dod sbyin pa yongs su btang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-25: zla ba phyed du nyin mtshan sbyin byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-26: nyi ma'i tha mar tshogs par gyur pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:103b-27: zhags pa thub pa gang rnams ci 'dod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-2: rgyal po'i gnas der 'gro ba mang po dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-3: cho der du zhing kun kyang 'dus par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-4: byang chub shing drung bde gshegs de yi tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-5: dam chos dbyangs mchog sgron ma'i rgyal zhugs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-6: 'gro ba'i dbang po smin par thugs chud nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-7: mchod sbyin ra bar thugs rje chen pos byon; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rnam phye bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-8: de yi 'khor du bde gshegs byon gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-9: chos kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-10: mdo sde rgyal po bde bar gshegs pas bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-11: 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med rnam btul nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-12: de tshe byang chub mchog tu lung yang bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-13: rgyal ba'i sras po rnam par rgyal ba yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-14: shin tu dga' bas byang chub mchog tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-15: bde gshegs bsnyen bkur mchod pa rnam yangs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-16: de la mchod byas dga' bar smras pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-17: 'gro ba rnam 'dul skyabs su bdag 'gyur bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-18: mgon dang gnas dang dpung du'ang de bzhin zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-19: rgyal ba de yi zham ring thar par zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-20: yang dag byang chub lam ni yongs tshol zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-21: chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu brtag bya bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-22: der gnas bskal pa brgya phrag mang du spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104a-23: sdug bsngal rgya mtshor lhung zhing ldongs gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-0: 'gro @104b ba mgon med kun la snying brtse bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-1: yang dag byang chub lam la yongs bsgoms nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-2: de tshe de yis rnam thar 'di thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-3: bskal pa de la bde gshegs gang byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-4: de dag kun la'ang dga' bas bsnyen bkur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-5: de dag kun la mchod pa chen po byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-7: de yi 'og tu bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams; ;zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kun la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-8: rgyal ba ji snyed skyes par gyur pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-9: rab tu mchod cing de dag bsnyen bkur byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-10: rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba kho mo yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-11: nyam nga btson rar gnas pa'i btson mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-12: de dag dgrol phyir lus kyang yongs su btang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-13: rnam thar 'di yang de tshe thob par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-14: zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul phran rab bgrangs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-15: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po bsgoms par byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-16: tshul mang mtha' dang dbus med mnyam med pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-17: skad cig re re dag tu rnam par spel; ;thub pa'i bdag po ji snyed mthong gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-18: de dag spyan sngar sngon chad 'di thob ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-19: sgo tshul rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-20: de dag gis ni rnam thar 'di yang bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-21: de dag rnam thar ma nor bsam yas la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-22: bskal pa bye ba mang por kho mos bslab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:104b-23: de la rgyal bas bkod cing grol gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-2: phyogs bcu kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-3: thogs pa med par lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-4: skad cig re rer zhing rgyud bsam yas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-5: dus gsum rgyud rnams kun la'ang rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-6: dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-7: re re kun la'ang mngon du rab tu lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-8: de dag lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgyal ba la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-9: sprin du gyur pa rnams kyang spyan sngar 'grim //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-10: phyogs rnams kun tu nye bar phyin 'dong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-11: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'dong bas shin tu mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-12: rgyan rnams ma lus mngon par char 'bebs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-13: rgyal ba rnams la de dag mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-14: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho che la rnam yangs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-15: zhu ba mtha' yas kun kyang zhu ba byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-16: rgyal ba'i chos sprin mngon par char 'bab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-17: kun kyang ma lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-18: phyogs bcu ma lus kun tu de dag 'dong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-19: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi spyan sngar 'bab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-20: gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs bstan gnas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-21: rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-22: kha dog mtha' yas rang gi lus gzugs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-23: phyogs rnams thams cad rnam pa stong du 'gengs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105a-24: de dag lus gcig las kyang gzugs kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-0: mtha' dang dbus med @105b rnam par ston par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-1: ba spu re re'i sgo nas grangs med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-2: 'od zer mang po rgya mtsho de dag 'gyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-3: skye rgu'i nyon mongs me yi gdung pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-4: sna tshogs thabs kyis rab tu zhi bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-5: 'di la gnas pa lus sprul sprin mang ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-6: ba spu re re'i sgo nas 'gyed byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-7: ngo mtshar rmad kyis phyogs kun rgyas bkang nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-8: chos chu'i char gyis sems can rnam par 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-9: tshul 'jug 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-10: rgyal sras kun gyi gnas su gyur pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-11: de la gnas shing phyi mtha'i bskal par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-12: zhing rnams kun tu spyad pa rab tu spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-13: bsam pa ji bzhin chos rnams ston byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-14: de dag lta ba'i dra ba rnam par zlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-15: mtho ris mya ngan 'das la sems can 'god //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa yang rnam par ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-17: 'jig rten skye gnas thams cad ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-18: kha dog mtha' yas lus mang bsam yas pa; ;bsam pa bzhin du chos rnams rjod byed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-19: de dag sems can kun gyi gzugs brnyan gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-20: 'di dang gzhan dag tshad las 'das pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-21: yon tan rgya mtsho zhing mang rgya mtsho yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-22: rdul phran rab snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:105b-23: rnam thar zhi ba 'di ldan thob par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-0: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam @106a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-1: par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-2: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-3: 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-4: 'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-5: shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-6: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-7: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-8: mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-9: chos thams cad rab tu dpyad pas mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-10: bdag med pa'i chos mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-11: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-12: gdul ba rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gnyis su med par rab tu rtogs pa dag gi lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-14: yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-15: ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa yongs su shes par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106a-16: sems kyi gnas khong du chud par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-0: ting nge 'dzin la @106b dbang sgyur ba rtogs par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-1: rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya bar nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-3: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi lumbi ni'i nags tshal na lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-4: de'i gan du song la ji ltar na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-7: 'jig rten rnams la snang ba byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-9: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas mi skyo bar 'gyur ba dris shig /
