K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyir lta zhing mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-11: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-12: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:106b-13: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-1: dpon gyi bu nor bzang mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi gdams ngag de rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par skul ba de la yongs su sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-3: khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-4: rgya cher byed cing mthar gyis lumbi ni'i nags tshal gang na ba der phyin te lumbi ni'i nags tshal la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal yongs su tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-5: lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal lumbi ni'i nags tshal na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim brtsegs pa zhig na sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo'i snying po can zhig la 'dug cing nags tshal gyi lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor te mdun du byas nas chos ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs @107b kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-2: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba lags pa'ang ma 'tshal /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa la spyod cing sems can rnams la snang ba 'byin par 'gyur ba'ang ma 'tshal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-7: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-8: lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:107b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-1: byung na; byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-4: phyir ldog pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-5: rgyun gcod pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-6: yongs su skyo ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-7: sgyid lug par 'gyur ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-8: nyams par 'gyur ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-9: nyams dma' bar 'gyur ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-10: yongs su yi chad par 'gyur ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-11: chud za bar 'gyur ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la yongs su gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-14: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-17: 'jig rten gyi lam rgyud thams cad las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar yongs su grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-19: ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa shin tu byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i @108b smon lam gyi sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dang po'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-2: byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-4: chos kyi tshul la nges par rtogs par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa'o; ;dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-7: kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-13: ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par spyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni; byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-14: chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan pa bye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:108b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-0: de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dang po sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen @109a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-1: bkur ba'i smon lam gyi sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gror bya ba la 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-4: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-7: mchod pa byed cing bsnyen bkur byed de dgyes par byed la thugs byung bar mi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta bas mi doms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-8: sangs rgyas la rim gro bya bar brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-9: sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i shugs kyis rnam par spel ba'i shugs dang ldan pa; de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mos pa'i shugs drag po yongs su skyes pa de phyir mi ldog pa'i dad pas bsod nams yongs su sdud pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsdu ba la brtson zhing sbyor ba rgyun mi gcod pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba dang po sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109a-15: de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-0: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par @109b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-1: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-2: shin tu dgyes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-3: dngos po thams cad la phangs par mi brtsi ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir bshams pa chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-5: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-7: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir g-yo dang sgyu med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lam lan nan tan du bya ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus khrus pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad la sku bslu ba med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:109b-10: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam chen po 'debs pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-0: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems kyi yan lag gi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub @110a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-7: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-9: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho yod do cog nges par rtogs pas mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi rnam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas mngon du bya bar gcig tu sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa; kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la yang dag par spyad par sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya bas mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la nan tan du bya bas yongs su grub par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa'i tshogs rgya chen po yongs su sgrub pa bskal pa'i me 'bar bas kyang rgyun mi gcad par @110b brtson par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-1: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-2: gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po mngon par sgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-4: yongs su spyad pa'i tshul thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la dngos po thams cad rnam par sgom pas dngos po med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges par rtogs pas gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-10: de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-12: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dbyings las gya nom par yongs su dag pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-13: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la snang ba rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-15: bsam pa brtan pa rdo rje'i khams lta bus yongs su zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-16: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba las phyin phyogs su phyogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:110b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su grub par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-1: chub sems dpa'i dbang po rnam par spel ba la khyad par du 'bogs pa rab tu thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu 'od gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-3: sems shin tu dge ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-4: smon lam brtan zhing rgya che ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mi g-yo ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-5: sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-6: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas mgon du gyur pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-11: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-14: gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pas sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-15: sbyin pa lhug par gtong bas dngos po'i 'du shes thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111a-16: tshul khrims mtha' yas pas mtha' las rgal bar rnam par dag pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa'i bzod pa @111b dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yangs par 'byung ba la zhugs pas brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-2: sgo kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas bsam gtan la rab tu brtson pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-3: chos snang ba thams cad rab tu thob pas shes rab kyi mthu'i 'od dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-4: sangs rgyas blta ba rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs par bya ba la zhugs pas thogs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-5: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dbang sgyur bas smos pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-6: chos kyi tshul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thob par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-11: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du skyes pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-15: tshul gyi sgo thams cad la shin tu grub pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:111b-18: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po la rnam par dag pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-1: cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rang bzhin gcig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig tu gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-3: chos dkar pos 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-4: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag nyid che ba'i chos kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-5: dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dris pa la spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-11: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba las phyir mi ldog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho las phyir mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112a-15: chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba la gnas pas yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-0: 'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs @112b par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-1: gzugs su rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-2: mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa lta bu la dbang rab tu thob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-3: srid pa thams cad du skye ba grib ma lta bur gdod rab tu ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgra brnyan lta bur rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-5: thabs kyi tshul don sna tshogs dang ldan pa la rab tu brtson pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-10: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-12: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rnam par gnas pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-13: de la gnas nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes kyi tshul la rnam par dpyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:112b-14: ye shes kyi tshul gyi sgo re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul tshad med par yongs su ston pas bskal pa tshad med par zad par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-1: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pas dbang du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-2: sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sems kyi skad cig thams cad la yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-3: dmigs pa tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-4: tha mi dad pa'i chos rnams la tha dad pa'i ye shes kyi dbang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-5: dmigs pa brjod du med pa dag kyang bsgribs pa med pa'i dbyings yongs su non par byed do; ;dmigs pa chung dus kyang mtha' yas pas brtan pa'i sa la yongs su 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-6: chos nyid tshad med pa yang chung ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-7: che bar khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-8: 'jig rten thams cad kyang rnam par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-9: mnyam par rab tu rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-10: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-11: rnam par shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyang sgom pas khong du chud par byed do; rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan par byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba @113b gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-2: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig thams cad la rgyan sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-3: rgyan du mar ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-4: sprul pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-5: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa thams cad la shin tu mkhas par gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-6: chos kyi sprul pa la mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-7: chos kyi dbyings dam pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-8: bsam pa ji bzhin du sems can gyi lus rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-9: sems can gdul ba mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-10: spyod pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sgrib pa med pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-12: de'i rgyud kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa yongs su ston pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-13: sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:113b-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes dbyig tu bya ba'i mdzod dang ldan pas sems can gdul ba'i dus la bab na rtag tu sta gon du gnas pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa chos kyi sprul pas brgyan par byed pa'i snying po zhes bya @114a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-2: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gcig pa'i yul la dbang bskur ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dab chags pa'i yul la rab tu 'jug pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-5: sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-6: phyi ma'i mtha'i shi 'pho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-7: skye ba'i sems rgyun chags par 'byung ba'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes 'dab chags pa'i yul yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'dab chags pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-12: chos thams cad kyi rgyud 'dab chags pa la mkhas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so; ;bskal pa 'jig pa dang 'du ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-14: da ltar byung ba rnams kyang ming dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-15: sa tshigs dang bcas par 'dab chags par rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-16: sems can tshul ji lta bur yongs su smin par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114a-17: dus la gang du 'bab pa rnams la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-0: rnam par 'tshang rgya bas @114b gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-1: sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa'i tshul 'dab chags pa yang sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pas yongs su ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-3: 'di ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-5: de dag ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu rnams te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-6: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-8: yang dag par sgrub bar byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-9: yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-10: rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-11: yongs su grub par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-12: zhing ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyan gcig gi lhab lhub la rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs byin gyis rlob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-13: sems can gyi khams gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyis rlabs kyis rgyun chad pa med par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:114b-14: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dmigs pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-0: shin tu bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sna tshogs du ma @115a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-1: rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-2: chos mtha' yas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-3: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gtugs pa yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-5: sems can tshad med pa spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-6: gdul bas yongs su 'dus pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral bar byin gyis rlob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-8: chos thams cad kyi sprin dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du med pas rnam par dag pa dmigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung ba rnam par dmigs par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-9: tshad med par rnam par spyad pa la sgrib pa med par rtogs pas khong du chud pa rnams chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-10: mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115a-11: sangs rgyas kyi sa tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba rnams 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i don du chos kyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-0: de nas lumbi ni'i nags tshal kyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang @115b pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-1: lhag pa'i bsam pa dri med rnyog pa med pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-2: gang rnams rgyal ba blta bas nam yang mi ngoms shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-3: rgyal ba kun gyi phyi ma'i mtha' yi rgyan sprin la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-4: smon pa'i mkhas pa de dag skye ba'i thog ma gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-5: dus gsum byung ba'i 'jig rten ma lus kun bkang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-6: zhing dang sems can de bzhin chos dang sangs rgyas rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-7: sems can dgrol phyir smon lam 'debs pas brgyan pa'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-8: de ni bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyi skye ba gnyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-9: gang rnams chos kyi sprin 'thung nam yang mi ngoms shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-10: ngoms par rtogs pa'i yid kyis dus gsum chags med lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-11: mkha' dbyings dri med mnyam med sems kyi lus ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-12: mtshungs pa med pa de ni de dag skye ba gsum //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-13: lhag pa'i bsam pa ri rab brdo rje mtshungs brtan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-14: thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mtshor rnam par 'jug byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-15: gang rnams snying rje chen po'i gang chen mtshor 'jug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-16: de ni skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi skye ba bzhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-17: gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-18: pha rol phyin pa dri med rgya mtsho mngon bsgrubs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:115b-19: chos kyi 'od 'gyed 'gro ba yongs su smin byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-1: bu chen po de dag skye ba lnga //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-2: chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chags med sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-3: dus gsum dpe zla med pa'i sangs rgyas rigs byung zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-4: gang rnams chos dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-5: de ni mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-6: gang rnams chos lus yongs su chags pa med pa'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-7: zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyis dgang byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-8: sangs rgyas stobs rnams ma lus khong du chud rtogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-9: de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi skye ba bsam yas bdun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-10: gang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la dbang ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par dpyod byed la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-12: ting nge 'dzin kun tshul gang chen mtsho la yongs 'jug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-13: de ni de bzhin nyid rten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-14: gang rnams zhing kun 'byams klas yongs su sbyong byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-15: sems can thams cad yongs smin byed 'dul rab brtson la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-16: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnams rnam ston pa; ;de ni grangs pa chen po rnams kyi skye ba dgu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-17: gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhin rab zhugs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs drag yangs pa rnam spel cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-19: gang rnams chos dbyings gzhi tshul tha dad chags med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116a-20: de ni rgyal sras rnams kyi skye ba bcu yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-0: skye ba bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams de @116b bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-2: 'jig rten thams cad la snang ba byed pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston pa thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su lta zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-15: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug cing khong du chud pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-16: 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba khong du chud par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-17: gling bzhi pa skal pa dang ldan pa'i dzambu'i gling 'di'i lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yongs su blta ba'i don du sngon gyi smon lam gyis skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-18: da ltar kho mo 'di ni; byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjes su dran pa sgom zhing rnam par spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:116b-19: de ltar kho mo 'di na gnas gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-0: de phan chad lo brgya na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi pho brang @117a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-2: zhes bya ba'i tshe lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas bcu byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-4: 'di ltar lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad mthon dman med la ngam grog dang ga yang sa med cing mnyam par gnas par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-5: sngon gyi ltas dang po byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-6: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad gseg ma dang gyo mo med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-7: sdong dum dang tsher ma dang bral te sa'i gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur nas rin po che mang pos yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-8: sngon gyi ltas gnyis pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-9: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-11: ta la'i phreng bas rnam par 'khrigs pas yongs su brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-12: sngon gyi ltas gsum pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-13: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i spos kyi myu gu kun nas thon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-14: phye ma thams cad kyi mdzod kun nas thon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-15: rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi sprin dang na bun yongs su byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-16: spos kyi rin po che'i gzugs kyi shing drung kun nas 'khor te rgyan yongs su sbyangs par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117a-17: sngon gyi ltas bzhi pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-0: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas kyi me @117b tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-2: lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnam pa thams cad yongs su rgyas pa dang ldan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-3: sngon gyi ltas lnga pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-4: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shing thams cad la nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod mngon par grub par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-5: sngon gyi ltas drug pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-6: yang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi padmo'i tshal thams cad du chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyang kha 'bus te sa'i gzhi las thon nas chu las mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-7: sngon gyi ltas bdun pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-8: yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa la spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-9: gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-17: 'gro ba'i dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di na thal mo sbyar cing 'khod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-19: sngon gyi ltas brgyad pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:117b-20: yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-0: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad lag na thogs shing blag sha'i yal ga la mngon du @118a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-1: lta ste 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-2: sngon gyi ltas dgu pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-3: yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil dag nas byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mang po thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-4: lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-5: 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-6: thog ma bltams pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs dang ldan par 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag las sgrar thon cing grags par gyur pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-7: sngon gyi ltas bcu pa byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-8: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-9: de byung bas 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118a-12: de ltar kho mo sngon gyi ltas bcu po 'di dag mthong bas kyang dga' ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-0: gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma grong khyer chen po ser skya'i @118b gnas nas byung ba'i tshe lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-1: de dag byung bas sems can tshad med pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi snang bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-4: sa'i steng na gnas pa'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad du snang ba rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-5: rin po che'i padmo kha ma bye ba kha bye bar gyur pa'i 'dab ma thams cad las snang ba rab tu byung ste bltams pa legs par bltams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-6: zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pa yang de dag bas byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-7: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thog ma sems bskyed pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir snang bar byas te mngon par shar to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-8: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:118b-9: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sgrub cing ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-0: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal @119a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-2: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-3: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-4: gdul bar byed pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-5: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-6: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-9: byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-10: ye shes thugs su chud par mdzad pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-11: sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-12: de dag gis sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems dang bsam pa'i mun pa thibs po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119a-14: de la lha mo sgyur ma shing blag sha'i gnas su phyin pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'dus pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-0: @119b 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu'i tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-1: lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-2: gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu dri nga ba med pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-9: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor dang bcas te tshogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-10: byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par brtson pa thams cad kyi lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-11: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i gzi brjid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-14: gzugs kyis rab tu snang bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil du brlags par gyur te zil gyis mnan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-16: lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas byung ba'i 'od dang snang ba dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-17: 'od gzhan gyis nyams par gyur pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-20: thogs par gyur pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-21: phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-22: byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-23: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-24: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:119b-25: nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te lhag ge /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-0: @120a *// lhang nger gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-3: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dang po'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-4: rigs kyi bu; gzhan yang gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu ma'i lus su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chud cing gzugs brnyan byung bar snang bar gyur pa de'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-5: nags tshal gyi mid sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-6: shing drung rnam pa tha dad pa sha stag tu'ang lha mo sgyu ma phyin cing 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la stag gon du sdod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120a-10: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lumbi ni'i nags chel du byung ba gnyis pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-0: gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re la yang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig @120b bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-3: bkur stir mdzad de mchod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang ldan par ma lus par grags par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-8: me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-9: chu shin tu dang ba la nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-10: sprin gyi tshogs 'brug sgra zab mo 'byin pa can yang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-12: de bzhin du lha mo sgyu ma'i ba sbu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang yongs su snang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-13: chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad kyang yongs su grags par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-16: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gsum pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-18: gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:120b-19: ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re ra nas kyang zhing ji snyed cig dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121a-17: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121a-35: ji tsam zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121b-3: ji lta bu zhig la brtson par byas te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas brnyes nas sngon sku ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121b-14: ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:121b-21: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon sku ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122a-6: ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad la gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122a-11: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122a-18: rus pa dang rkang yongs su btang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122a-19: mkhal ma dang thugs yongs su btang ba'am /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122a-36: bang ba yongs su btang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-8: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su btang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-9: ma la cha yongs su btang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-10: khang pa dang gzhal med yongs su btang ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-11: yo byad yongs su btang ba de ltar gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-12: rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-13: len pa de dag kyang rnam pa ji lta bus len par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-14: sbyin pa'i dngos po rnam pa ji lta bu dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-15: yul gyi phyogs gang dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-16: de'i ste byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba sbu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-17: slong mo ba'i sgra de dag kyang grags par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-20: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba drug pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-22: gzhan yang sngon gyi mtha'i rgyud du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yum gyi sku nas bltams par gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang lhab lhub ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-23: sems can gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:122b-24: bza' shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-3: ba dan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-4: rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-8: sil snyan gyi sgra ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma lumbi ni'i nags tshal du phyin pa'i tshe lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'dir yongs su byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-10: 'gro bas rnam par dmigs su yod par byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-13: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bdun pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123a-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las yongs su 'das pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-1: spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi longs spyod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-2: dmigs pa thams cad bzang zhing mthun pa'i longs spyod kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-3: de dag thams cad lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas ma 'dres par thon te lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di yongs su brgyan cing kun nas gnas par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-6: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-8: gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-13: dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis 'dra bar brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-18: rnam par snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-19: 'khor 'dra ba; rgyan mtshungs pa mang po yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi legs pa rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing thon par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-22: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dgu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:123b-24: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bltams par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-1: du 'og gi rdo rje'i gzhi las sa chen po mngon par brtol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-2: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa zhes bya ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-4: rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-5: ze ba'i rtse mo rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-6: 'dab ma'i phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis brgyan cing shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-7: lo ma'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis byas pa; snying po mdzes pa rin po che yid bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-8: ze ba'i phreng ba rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-9: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-10: rin po che'i rgyal po grangs med pa'i dra ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas yongs su yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-11: rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje mthu bo ches mi shigs pas lhun kun nas bkab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-12: lha'i ris thams cad kyis kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-13: klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124a-14: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kun nas bskor cing lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-0: dri za'i dbang po thams cad kyis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i klu'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i da ro dang sbyar te bstod pa'i sprin @124b gyis mngon par bstod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-1: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis nga rgyal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-3: dregs pa thams cad btang zhing shin tu btud de phyag bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-4: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad kyis rin po che'i snam bu kun tu spyangs te nam mkha' kun nas brgyan par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-5: mi'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su brjod cing rol mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-6: glu'i dbyangs la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-7: nyams su rab tu bde bas kun nas blta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-8: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu dga' ba dang mos pa skyes pas yongs su blta zhing sgra snyan pa byung ste rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyi char mngon par dbab pa byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-11: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bcu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-13: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag lumbi ni'i nags tshal du byung bar gyur nas de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' 'od tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-14: blta na btang mi bra ba zhig lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas bltams te nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta; sprin gyi tshogs rum nas glog gi phreng ba 'gyur ba lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-15: ri chen po'i spo rum nas nyi ma shar kha'i sprin go lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:124b-16: mun pa stug rum nas sgron ma chen po byung ba lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las gzugs brnyan ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-3: rmi lam ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-4: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-5: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-6: skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i 'od rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa'i chos nyid kyis mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-9: lumbi ni'i nags tshal 'di na gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-10: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125a-12: kho mo gling bzhi bskal pa dang ldan pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul ba la lta zhing khong du chud par bya bar gnas pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya thams cad na'ang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul ba bye ba phrag brgya la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dus pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams @125b cad rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa dag tu yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re res bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125b-1: de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba rnams kyi khong du chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125b-2: tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed kyang rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi rdul re re la zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125b-3: zhing thams cad kyi zhing re rer byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i yang mu rnyed par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:125b-4: ji ltar kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-0: rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la'ang @126a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-1: sems kyi skad cig re re'i sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re re la byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-2: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-3: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyis lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-5: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston pa 'di rnyed nas yun ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-8: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya bar bskal ba mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu byung ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-9: mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-0: lha dang mi rnams @126b kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtan du byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya ba der gling bzhi pa dbu ma rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-3: gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas ri rab rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-4: rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-5: rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od de la btsun mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba mnga'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-8: gling bzhi pa skal pa dang ldan pa 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling du lha mo sgyu ma bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi 'dzam bu gling du yang rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-9: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:126b-10: thog mar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-0: lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus @127a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-2: bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bza' shing gi ra ba chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-3: dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu de yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas der bltams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-4: de'i tshe bza' shing gi ra ba chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de'i dbus su pho brang brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs bzang po las brtsegs pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-5: pho brang brtsegs pa de'i nang du shing 'dod pa thams cad 'byin pa'i yal ga la 'ju ste lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan bltams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-7: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bltams khar ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba sta gon du gnas gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de bltams par gyur ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis spos dri shin tu zhim pa'i spos chu'i bum pa me tog dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bas sku bsil te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-0: de la tshul dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab la grangs med pa @127b mchog tu bya bas mchod nas ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od kyi bar du bzhag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-1: ma ma des byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs ma thag tu de'i mod la ma ma de dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-2: mos ba'i shugs chen po thob par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yul kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-3: de thob par gyur ma thag tu des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med pa dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di la 'ang shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis zhugs par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-7: ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-8: rnam par thar pa de thos par gyur pas kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba'i rnam par 'brul pa yang dag par lta ba'i smon lam chen po yang mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-10: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba byung bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-12: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:127b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-0: de la ji snyam du sems @128a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung bar gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na yang de ltar mi lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-2: lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu po lumbi ni'i nags tshal na gnas pa kho mo'i 'khor du gyur pa 'di dag yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-4: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu'i yum rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i lha mor gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-9: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na'ang de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-11: rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-12: de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-15: de phyin chad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128a-16: sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthus rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128b-0: @128b skad cig thams cad du bral bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128b-2: kho mo mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad na yod pa la sems kyi skad cig thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la yongs su 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi mig gis lta zhing khong du chud par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa byung brgya mtsho dag kyang lta zhing khong du chud par byed la; de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho chen po dag la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul brgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128b-4: sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang sems kyi skad cig thams cad du lta zhing khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:128b-5: ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rdul shin tu phra ba 'byams klas pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba ma nor par mngon du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-0: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i @129a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang sangs rgyas 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-2: de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang mngon du gyur par blta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-4: de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas mchod par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos bstan pa nyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-6: chos la yang gnyer ba'i chos kyis nan tan byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-7: de nas lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-8: rim gro bskyed cing nga la gang 'dri ba [?]//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-9: de dag bdag las rgyal ba'i sras nyon cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129a-10: rgyal ba'i spyod yul blta dga' zhi ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-0: rgyu dang rkyen gyis @129b tshul gyis rnam par bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-1: zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-2: sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab dran //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-3: bskal pa'i ming ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-4: de la rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-5: bskal pa'i dang por de bzhin gshegs byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-6: dbang phyug yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-7: nags tshal dam pa gser mdog me tog tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-8: mgon po de 'khrungs bdag gis mthong bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-9: ming du dri med skyed pa'i 'od ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-10: de yi ma ma mkhas par bdag gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-11: bltams ma thag tu gser mdog dam pa'i 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-12: 'jig rten dbang pos bdag gis pang du bzhag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-13: gang zag dam pa pang du bzhag tshe yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-14: de yi spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-15: bsam yas de la g-yas dang g-yon du yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-16: bltas shing mtha' rnyed mthong bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-17: mtshan rab bzang pos de ni yongs su brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-18: dri med de sku blta na rab sdug ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-19: rin chen gzugs 'dra bdag gis mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-20: dga' ba'i shugs drag mtshungs med rnam par 'phel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-21: de yi yon tan dpag yas sems sems nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-22: kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-23: de yi rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-24: rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-25: rgyal ba'i legs pa rgya mtsho dga' smon nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:129b-26: smon lam rgya mtsho bdag gis rab tu bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-1: rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-2: dan song lam rnam kun kyang rnam par bzlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-3: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun gyi bde gshegs rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-4: ma byon bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-5: sems can sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-6: smon lam rgya mtsho kho mos btab par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-7: mgon po de las bdag gis chos thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-8: rnam thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-9: bskal pa zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-10: spyad pa spyad de de yang rnam par sbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-11: de la mgon po ji snyed byung gyur pa; ;de dag ma lus bdag gis kun kyang mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-12: rnam thar rgya mtsho 'di ni sbyong byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-13: de dag bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-14: zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-15: stobs bcu mnga' ba ji snyed 'das byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-16: de dag chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-17: rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di yang rab tu bsgoms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-18: sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran ji snyed pa; ;rdul rtse 'byams klas kun la rnam par mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-19: rdul phran re re la yang rgya mtsho'i zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-20: sngon chad rgyal bas sbyangs pa rab tu mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130a-21: zhing rnams 'byams klas de dag kun tu yang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:130b-26: tshe rabs kun tu lus mang khrag khrig gis /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-2: zhing tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-3: 'gro rgyud mi bzad ji snyed yod pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-4: 'gro ba kun la mngon du kho mo ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-5: chos sprin yangs pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-6: rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-7: rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-8: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-9: thams cad bstan par kho mos nus re skan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-11: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-12: kho mo byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i mngal nas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i smon lam gyis bsam pa yongs su skyed pa; sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-15: sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-16: rgyud kyi lam yongs su bstan pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du padmo'i nang nas skye ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-4: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-6: grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na sh'akya'i bu mo go pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-8: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyis lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-9: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-10: sangs rgyas phal bo che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:131b-11: sdong pos brgyan po'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:132a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lumbi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas @132a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:132a-1: song ste grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa de nyid sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:132a-2: khong du chud par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:132b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba @132b rab tu thob pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:132b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133a-10: sgrib pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133a-11: bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun na gnas pa med pa de'i phyir khyod ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133a-12: ring po mi thogs par sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-6: mi shin tu ngang gis byams pa zhig la bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur la /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-10: rab tu mi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-11: gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-14: lha dang mi'i lam gyi rgyud du lus dang sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-15: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing nyams bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:133b-18: dga' ba'i yid nyams su bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-2: bdag gi don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-4: bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-5: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer bas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-8: lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i dbang gis ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-12: kun nas 'khor ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-14: lta ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-15: sems can sna tshogs dang 'du zhing 'dzi ba'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'phel bas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-16: bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-17: bde ba myong ba la yongs su chags pas ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-18: sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'khor ba'i rgyud na 'dre ldog pa ma yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-21: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho na 'khod cing sdug bsngal dpag tu med pas shin tu mnar ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134a-23: snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-3: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa yongs su tshol zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-5: bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-6: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-7: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing mthong na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-9: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong zhing sems can thams cad kyi skye mched sna tshogs mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe chos kyi sku tha dad pa med cing bla na med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-10: sems can rnams kyi lus dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:134b-18: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
