K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas yongs @135a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-4: yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-6: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su skyed pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir pha dang mar gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'dzud pas ma ma lta bur gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-9: ngan song gi g-yang sa'i 'jigs pa las srung ba'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i lha rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang blta bur gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-10: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir mnyan pa chen po lta bur gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-11: bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-12: shin tu bsil ba'i rang bzhin nye bar stob pas gnas su gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-13: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par byed pas mu stegs su gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-14: chos rin po che'i gling du skyel bas mgon byed par gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-15: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gis sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas me tog tu gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-16: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od yangs pa rab tu 'gyed pas rgyan du gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135a-17: kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dam pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-0: kha na ma tho ba @135b med pa'i las la nan tan du byed pas phrad na legs pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-1: yan lag dam pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su tshang ba'i lus dang ldan pas kun tu bzang ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-2: blta na mi mthun pa med pas btang mi bra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-3: ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-4: chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i phyir snang ba byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-5: byang chub kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-6: bdud kyi las rnam par zlog pa'i phyir dmag dpon du gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-7: shes rab kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-8: chos kyi nam mkha' la blo'i zla ba 'char bar byed pas zla bar gyur pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-9: 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bebs pas sprin du gyur pa yin te; lha mo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-10: de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-11: sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:135b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-0: phye ma rin po che'i rgyan gyi char yid kyi rang bzhin mngon par phab ste kun nas bskor cing rjes su 'brangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i khang par 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad @136a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-1: pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-2: byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-3: sems can kun la thugs brtse bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-4: rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-6: bskal pa bye ba mang pos kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-7: khyod kyi zhal mthong shin tu dka'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-8: 'jig rten ma rig ldongs pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-9: khyod kyi ye shes nyi chen yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-10: mi shes rab rib sgrib pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-11: 'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-12: thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-13: khyod ni rang byung nyid du zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-14: khyod ni dgongs pa rnam dag pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-15: sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-16: dge bshes bsnyen bkur bstan mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-17: lus srog phangs par mdzad mi mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-18: khyod ni 'jig rten brten mi mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-20: 'dren pa ma mchis mi brten pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-21: dgongs pa thogs med nam mkha' bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-24: ye shes sgron ma rab 'gyed pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-28: chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-29: mkha' la ser bu ji bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-30: bskal pa'i me 'bar me bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-31: rtag tu 'bar bas rab tu brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136a-32: me lta bu yi brtson 'grus kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-0: byang chub spyad pa @136b spyod pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-1: sengge bzhin du shin tu dpa'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-2: brtson 'grus rnam par gnon pa brtan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-3: ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-4: gzhan gyis thub pa med par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-5: chos dbyings rgya mtsho 'di dag ni; ;rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-6: der yang dge bshes bsnyen bkur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-9: de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don du 'brang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-11: nang du song nas sh'akya'i bu mo go pa mthong bar 'dod de kun tu bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-12: sh'akya'i bu mo go pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbus na stan rin po che byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-13: gzugs brnyan gyi padmo'i snying po can zhig la bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-14: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-15: sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin tu bsdus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-16: tshig snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:136b-17: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mngon du bya bas shin tu bsdus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag @137a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-1: par sgrub pa la don mthun pas shin tu bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-2: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas bu dang bu mo yongs su gzung ba'i tshul bcangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-3: byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su dag par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-4: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-5: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-6: bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa; byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshul la shin tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-8: chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-9: 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags pa med pas yongs su dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-12: sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-13: chags pa'i lam thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-14: chos kyi sku la legs par sprul bas rnam par spyod pa; 'jig rten thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-15: gdul ba la mngon par phyogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137a-16: bsod nams rgya mtsho dri ma med pas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-0: byang chub @137b sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smin lam gyis shin tu byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs yangs pas ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems rab tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sh'akya'i bu mo go pa gang na ba der phyin nas sh'akya'i bu mo go ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te langs nas mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-4: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yongs su 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-7: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khong du chud la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang mi gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'ang rab tu thob la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la'ang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-10: 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:137b-11: chos kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang ldan yang gzugs kyi lus kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-0: mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha @138a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-1: dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-2: chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis par yang rab tu rtogs la dag gi lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-3: nges pa'i tshig thams cad brjod pas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-4: sems can thams cad sems can med par yang rab tu shes la sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las kyang phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-5: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag par yang khong du chud la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-6: chos thams cad la las dang rnam par smin pa ma mchis par yang rtogs la dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir mi ldog pa ma 'tshal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-7: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-8: sh'akya'i bu mo go bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-10: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos nyid rnam pa de lta bu dri bar sems pa lags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-12: dri ba brjod pa de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i tshig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-15: legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-16: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138a-18: chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul @138b gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-1: ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rlabs po che la brten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-5: mos pa rgya chem po rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-6: dge ba'i bsam pa rlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-7: bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pas rab tu brtan pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-8: sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung pa'i chos bstan pa chen po thos pa rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-9: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i sems kyis gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-12: rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-13: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcad pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-15: chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-16: 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-18: de brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:138b-19: chos de dag thob par gyur nas kyang mi zad pa'i tshul du mngon par sgrub cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-0: shin tu rgya che bar bya @139a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-1: ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-4: lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-5: 'khor ba'i yo byad don du mi gnyer ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-6: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-9: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-10: gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-12: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-15: chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-16: de nas sh'akya'i bu mo go bas don de nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-17: rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-18: dge bshes dam pa bsnyen brtson g-yo dang sgyu med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-19: ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139a-20: de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul 'dra 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-0: gang rnams @139b mos pa rlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-1: de yi khongs su dus gsum 'jig rten chud pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-2: zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-3: ye shes 'od byed de dag spyod pa 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-4: gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dbus med la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-5: kun nas nyon mongs dri mas mgos rab dag cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byung gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-7: de dag spyod pa mig 'phrul gzhi yi rnam pa 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-8: kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bsam yas dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-9: yon tan rgya mtshos yid bsal ldan pa nyer brten pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-10: de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho'i lus ngag snying po ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-11: 'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-12: rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-13: chos kyi 'brug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams mi ngoms shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-14: chos tshul rjes su snyegs pa'i shes rab 'od kyi sgron //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-15: de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-16: gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-17: gzhan dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-18: bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-19: sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-20: rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-21: de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang bo dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:139b-22: smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-0: mig 'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin @140a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-1: no; ;phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin brlabs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-2: phyi mtha'i bskal par spyod byed kun tu bzang po'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-3: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-4: chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-5: gang rnams ye shes nyi ma snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-6: 'gro ba nyams nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-7: 'gro ba'i mun pa bsal cing brtan pa 'char 'byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-8: nyi ma lta bus de dag spyod pa 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-9: skye rgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'dre ldog mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-10: yid gsal 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams phyir zlog rab gnas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-11: chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-12: spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-13: tshul 'di bslab pa de dag mtha' dang dbus med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-14: lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-15: gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-16: srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang yongs smin byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-17: byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-18: mos pa sna tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-19: 'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140a-20: brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-0: de nas sh'akya'i bu mo go pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras @140b so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-3: nor bzang gis smras pa; 'phags ma /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-6: rigs kyi bu; kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la snyoms par zhugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed mthong zhing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-8: bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-9: sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-10: skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-11: mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-12: las mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-13: las rnam par smin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-14: de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-21: bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-22: bag la nyal ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:140b-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-1: ba yongs su zin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-2: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-3: dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-4: de dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su 'dus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-5: sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-6: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-8: smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-9: sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-10: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-11: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-12: 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang gdul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141a-14: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul @141b pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-1: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-4: sngon kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so; ;lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-5: ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-7: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so; ;rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chung ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-8: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-9: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-10: rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:141b-11: rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-0: @142a *// rang sangs rgyas de dag ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bdag kyang rab tu shes so; ;thog ma sems pa skyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-4: smon lam rnam par dag pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzem pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i @142b ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:142b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-1: dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i chul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so; ;byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtshor rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-7: chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i dam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-10: smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143a-11: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143b-0: kho mo ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun mi 'chad @143b pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143b-1: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143b-2: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:143b-3: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144a-0: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi @144a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144a-1: bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144a-2: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144a-3: phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144a-4: phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-0: phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho @144b dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-1: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi klong rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rta babs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams ming du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-15: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-17: sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-18: sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la yang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:144b-19: bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-0: zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes @145a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-2: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-3: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-4: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-5: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-6: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-7: yo byad la dbang sgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-8: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan du mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-9: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-0: bsam gtan gyi @145b yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-1: shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-3: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-4: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las ye shes snang bar gyur pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su gnas pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:145b-10: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-0: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol @146a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-1: pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-4: thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-5: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'dul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-7: sems can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-8: ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-9: gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-10: spobs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146a-12: spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-0: mthar gyis yongs su sgrub pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi @146b tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-1: de dag gi dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-3: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-7: snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-8: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-9: mngon par sgrub pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-10: ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-11: sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-12: phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par gnas pa la 'jug pas bstan par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-13: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-14: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul gyi yul ni; de lta bu ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-19: de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:146b-20: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-0: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs @147a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-2: sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-3: rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-4: sems can thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-5: nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-6: nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-11: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis sh'akya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-13: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147a-16: sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-0: 'jig rten gyi @147b khams de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-2: gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-3: rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-4: grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas sa'i gzhi bee d'urya sngon po las grub pa la gnas rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-5: 'obs spos chus yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-6: gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba; autpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-9: me tog punda r'i ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dri zhim pas kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-10: rin po che las byas pa'i stegs bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas dkrigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-11: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi nags tshal gyi phreng ba dkrigs pas kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-12: steng nas gser gyi dra ba bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par phye ba'i mig mang ris mdzes par rnam par bres pas sa'i gzhi shin tu spa bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-13: dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-14: bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:147b-15: bza' shing gi rab bye ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-0: shin tu skyid cing phun sum @148a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-2: skyes pa dang bud med brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-3: ser bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyod de me tog gi char mang po rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'brul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-4: sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-5: grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-6: gser gyi dra ba'i rgyan la sogs pa rlung gis bskyod de rol mo mang po'i sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-7: snyan pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-11: byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-12: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mnga' thob mdzod cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-13: khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-15: rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal der khams kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-16: de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-17: blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-18: rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad kyang dpa' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-20: yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-21: gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-24: kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-25: rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148a-26: padmo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-0: bud med stong phrag @148b brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas gtso mor bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-1: de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-4: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-5: de la mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-6: de'ang 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de rkang pa'i mthil shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-7: sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-9: gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun gyis sa chen po la mnyam par reg go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-10: de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-13: rnam pa thams cad du shin tu tshang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-15: blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-16: de'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-17: rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gsal la shin tu mdzes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-18: me tog dam pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-19: de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel bar gyur te shin tu mdzes pas rnam par bye ba; bu ga med pas zag pa med pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-21: ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-22: de rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:148b-23: shin tu dag la shin tu gsal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-1: cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-2: de'i sor mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshigs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-3: de dag mnyam par sa la 'jog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-5: de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang ka tsa linda bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-8: khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-9: de dag thams cad bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-10: yid dga' ba'i dam pas tshim zhing yid shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-11: de'i byin pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-14: legs par grub par gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-15: ri dvags kyi rgyal po ae na ye ltar de la sus kyang bsnyegs pa'am sleb par mi nus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-16: 'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-17: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang yang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-18: de'i rkang pa gnyis la shin tu mtho ba zlum la shin tu legs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-21: shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-22: blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par gyur to; ;lag pa la gnyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-23: thal gong gi lhun la gnyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149a-26: de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa grub par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-0: de'i gsang @149b pa'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la nang du nub cing kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-3: rta cang shes ltar 'dug pas de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang bud med dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-10: bla mar bya ba rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-11: gzhan du na bdag longs par spyod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-12: ched du bstan par bya ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-15: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de ro stong sengge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-16: lus rim pas rgyas la ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-17: ri dvags kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin tu legs pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-18: de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin tu rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-20: lus kyi cha thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-21: lus la dma' ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-22: lus la mtho ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-23: lus la zhum pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-24: lus la dgu pa med pa; lus rin po che'i gtan pa shin tu phyis pa bas kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-25: de dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-26: des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu ring ba thob par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:149b-27: des lus ma btud de lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga gnyis la nyug cing reg go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-1: lus che zhing drang ba'ang thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-2: rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-3: lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-4: lus rab tu mnyen pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-5: lus shen tu lci ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-6: lus rab tu gsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-7: lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-8: des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-10: de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-11: bzhin gyi 'khor thams cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-12: kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-13: mi chen po'i mtshan sengge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-14: za 'gram shin tu mkhregs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-15: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-16: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-17: kha'i sgo shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-18: mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-19: so ma tshang ba med pa la zas shig za na yang lan gcig bldad pas chung du na 'bras can gyi 'bru 'ga' yang ma zhig par za ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-20: so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa rab tu thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-21: mtshams chu sgo med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-23: rkyen rkyen du shin tu mdzes pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150a-24: de kha zas shig za na yang 'go ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-0: ljan ljin du 'gyur @150b ba'am; thogs par 'gyur ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-2: mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-3: so mnyam zhing rnga rngo med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-5: so zhum pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-6: so gyes pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-7: so thog drung mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-8: so rngo ba med par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-9: gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-11: mche ba shin tu gsal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-12: mche ba shin tu dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-13: mche ba shin tu brtan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-14: mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-16: shin tu yangs la srab cing mnyen te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-21: gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun 'gebs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-22: bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-25: nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med par rjod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-26: gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-32: brjod cing smra ba'i tshig gi las yid du 'ong ba brjod pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-33: ngag gi lam mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:150b-34: 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyis ngag rjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-0: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang gud du mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang @151a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-3: mig dkar nag 'byes par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-4: mig shin tu dang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-5: mig yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-7: mig rnam par gsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-8: mig mngon par mdzes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-9: mig blta na sdug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-11: mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-13: rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-14: mig gi skye mched rin po che padma r'a ga ltar shin tu dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-20: mig gi sprin shin tu brtan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-21: de'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-24: shin tu mnyen pa; shing bal ltar reg na bde ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-28: chab rom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-29: 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur to; ;de'i spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te shin tu legs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-33: rin po che'i padmo 'dab ma bye ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-34: kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151a-35: rin thang gdab tu tshad med pas gces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-0: gzhon nu de pags pa shin tu @151b 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-9: slod bag tu gnas pa med par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-11: mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-12: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-13: gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-14: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim po'i 'od zer 'byung bas lus kyi rgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-16: ba spu re re'i byung ba dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-17: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-18: bee d'urya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-22: shin tu legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-23: gzhon nu de'i spu yan lag gyen du 'khyil bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i spu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-26: ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-27: gzhon nu de mi chen po'i mtshan skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:151b-28: de'i skra nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon mthing du 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-1: ba; drung shin tu ran pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-5: dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-6: rgyal bu gzhon nu de shing gro dha ltar mchu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-7: kun nas rkyen du ran pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-9: kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-11: mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-20: mi smra bar 'dug pa la bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-22: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis yongs su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-23: sems can thams cad kyis blta na yid du mi 'ong ba'i bag med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-24: blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152a-25: blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba de lta bu zhig skyes par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-0: de nas lan gcig cig rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po blta ba'i @152b phyir bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyi bskal ba bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-1: dzambu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po bzhi dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-2: rdo rje mthu bo che'i srog shing sra ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-3: tsandan dam pa las bsgrubs pa'i yu ba bzang po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-5: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-6: rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-7: sengge'i khri rin po che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bshams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-8: bu mo lnga brgyas rin po che'i srad bu'i lnga ldi nas yongs su bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-9: nam mkha' la chags pa med pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta cang shes stong dang bcas pa la zhon nas gdugs chen po rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-10: steng g-yogs rin po che'i rgyal po bee d'urya dkar po las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-11: 'od dri ma med pa tshad med pa 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-12: rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs thams cad kyis spa bar spras te rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-13: yub rin po che'i rgyal po bee d'urya sngon po las bsgrengs pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:152b-15: srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-2: rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-4: me tog gi char chen po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-6: lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-7: rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-8: de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe lam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-10: gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-11: gser dngul dang rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bsgrubs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-12: gser gyi phye ma bkram pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-13: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-14: g-yas g-yon nas rin po che'i shing gi phreng bas dkrigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-15: rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-16: steng nas rin po che'i dra ba bres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-17: rin po che'i gnam yol sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-18: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-20: snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgrengs shing dpyangs pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-21: g-yas g-yon nas rin po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod pas rnam par brgyan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153a-22: rin po che stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-0: slong mo pa'i tshogs la yongs su bstab pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba @153b bkod; stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-1: rgyan 'dod pa'i slong mo pa rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-2: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-3: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-4: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-5: su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-7: bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-8: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-9: rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-13: reg bya yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi kha zas kyi rnam pa bkod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-14: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-15: ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing thog sna tshogs thams cad spungs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-16: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-17: gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-18: mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-19: ri mo sna tshogs shin tu spa bar rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-20: shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-23: thags su ma btags pa bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-24: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:153b-25: byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-0: dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag @154a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-2: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-3: sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi phung po dag bkod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-4: stegs bu la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-8: cha lug sdug gu sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-9: yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-10: yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-11: byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-14: shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag bkod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-15: de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na sbrul tshong ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i longs spyod du 'os pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-16: blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-24: ha cang yang mi sngo ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-28: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154a-31: shes nyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-0: @154b gtsug lag thams cad la shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-6: khong khro ba mi mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-7: blta na mi ngoms shing yid du 'ong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-11: ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-13: g-yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-14: de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo du ma zhig gis bskor te rin po che'i shing rta la zhon nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal nas byung ste rgyal pos bka' stsal nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas phar rgyal bu gzhon nu de la glu len cing 'dong 'dong ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-15: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems shin tu mi bzad pa zhig g-yos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-16: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ches nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-17: blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-18: ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-19: gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la ma btang na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-21: srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-24: de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-26: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:154b-27: de'i yab nor gyi bdag po mi bzhugs par 'gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par @155a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-2: de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-3: bu mo bdag cag kyang sbrul tshong ma dag cig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-4: 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-5: yu bus sems can 'ga' zhig la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur mi byar mi rung ba'ang med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-6: yu bu ni; rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim gror 'dong 'dong bar zad kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-7: de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-9: thob par yang shin tu dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-10: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-11: bde bar gshegs pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155a-15: de'i snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i nang du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-0: der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon pa de bu mo shing rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing 'chog 'chog pa'i rmi lam du mthong @155b nas sad par gyur pa dang sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-13: 'og min gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-14: der sa'i lha mo thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-19: chu'i klung gi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-22: skya rengs 'char ba'i lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-23: nags tshal gyi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-26: lo tog gi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-27: grong khyer gyi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-28: rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-29: snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-30: lus kyi 'od zer gyi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-31: sems can gyi ris kyi lha mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:155b-33: phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-0: zhes nas de ltar des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha med pa thob par gyur te skabs su bab nas @156a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-1: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-2: gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-3: yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su grags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-4: shes rab stobs kyi bdag dang 'dra ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-5: sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu ma'i tshul kun 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-6: srog chags mang po stong 'phrag du ma yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-7: 'dod chags dbang gis bdag la rab bltas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-8: gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-9: glo ba chags par gyur pa gcig ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-10: sems can gang la'ang zhen par gyur pa'am //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-11: gang la'ang khong khror bdag gi sems ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-12: gang la'ang dgra mi bgyid de zhe mi sdang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-13: bdag ni sems can sman par dga' ba lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-14: sku gzhon sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-15: gang tshe bdag gis gsal bar mthong gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-16: de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-17: rgya che yangs par shin tu dga' bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-18: khyod kyi dbu bzang lcang lor 'khyil ba 'am //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-19: rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon mthing gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-20: zhal gyi smin sdug 'phral ba shangs su mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-21: khyod kyi zhal sngar lus 'di bdag 'bul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-22: mtshan gyi rab 'chang gzi brjid che mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-23: sku gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156a-24: khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-0: zil du rlog pas snag tsha'i @156b gzugs kyang 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-1: spyan gsal ring la dkar nag 'byes pas mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-2: shin tu zhal rgyas sengge'i za 'gram can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-3: khyod kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-4: gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag ni gzung du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-5: khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-6: mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-7: tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi gsung mnga' bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-8: gsung zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-9: khyod kyi zhal na thags bzang tshems mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-10: dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-11: 'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-12: skyes bu dpa' khyod 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-13: khyod kyi sku la mtshan rab mdzes pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-14: sum cu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-15: sku gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-16: mi yi dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba byon; ;shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-17: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-18: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-20: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-23: khyod la yongs su srung ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-27: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-28: zhes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:156b-29: blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-2: khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la smros //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-3: lus mchog khyod ni su yis yongs su bzung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-4: khyod la pha dang ma ni yod dam med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-5: khyim thab med dam khyod ni su zhig dbang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-6: gzugs mdzes khyod la sems can gzhan nam gcig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-7: bdag gi yin par 'du shes byed med dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-8: khyod kyi yid ni gsod la mi dga' grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-9: gzhan las ma byin 'phrog par mi byed dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-10: 'dod pas log par g-yem la mi dga' grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-11: rdzun du brjod smrar yid ni mi smros sam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-12: khyod kyi blo gros mdza' dbyen mi 'jug gam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-13: tshig brlang gzhan la gnod par mi smra grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-14: gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems med dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-15: 'gro ba rnams la gnod par mi sems grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-16: lta ba'i 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-17: las kyi rgyud la ye rngam sems med dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-18: g-yo mdog sgyu yi dbang du mi 'gro 'am //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-19: mi 'thad 'jig rten gnod par mi byed grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-20: pha ma gnyen dang mdza' bshes bla ma la; ;sri zhu rim gro bya ba'i tshul 'chang ngam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-21: phongs par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-22: khyod kyi yid la sbyin pa'i sems yod dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-23: chos dang mthun par dus su 'doms byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-24: lus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-25: yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157a-26: dge bshes rnams la dga' ba'i sems yod dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-0: sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror @157b byed ldan nam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-1: sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-2: gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyer 'gyur ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-3: chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-4: chos yid mchog la gnas par khyod byed grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-5: chos min spyad pa'i blo gros med grang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-6: legs pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-7: gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mchog yod dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-8: skye bo mgon med phongs par gyur pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-9: 'bren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-10: ngan song 'gro ba'i lam la zhugs pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-11: shin tu nyam thag snying rjes sems grang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-12: gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-13: khyod ni dga' ba mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-14: skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis 'khol gyur la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-15: shes rab mthu bskyed btang snyoms byed mi byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-16: mi shes gnyid log skye bo mang mthong na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-17: byang chub dam par smon lam 'debs byed grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-18: bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-19: smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur grang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-20: de nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sbrul tshod ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-21: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-24: rdzus te byung ba padmo'i nang nas skyes pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-25: sngon chad khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol tu ma byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:157b-26: zhes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-0: bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang @158a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-1: smras pa; ;de ni bdag gis rim pas khyod la brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-2: ji ltar bu mo 'di skyes bskyed bskyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-3: bdag gis khyod la gsol gyi gsan du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-4: gang tshe dgung sangs khyod ni bltams gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-5: de tshe bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-6: rdzus te dri med padmo'i sbubs nas byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-7: yan lag kun tshang mig yangs 'di yang skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-8: dus kyi nang na sos ka dus mchog la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-9: sman dang lo tog myu gu thon pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-10: s'a la'i ra ba bza' shing rab mchog tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-11: bdag ni rtse dga' de khrod mchi mchi ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-12: sna tshogs yal ga'i lo ma rgyas gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-13: zhugs shing me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-14: bya bran sna tshogs sgra snyan zhugs shing nang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-15: nags khrod mya ngan ma mchis dgar mchis mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-16: rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu yid 'ong la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-17: rin chen ratna sna tshogs 'tshal ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-18: rol mo glu la shin tu bslab pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-19: bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-20: spos mchog ldan pa'i punda r'i ka dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-21: rdzing 'gram me tog sil mas gtams pa yis //
