K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-22: sa phyogs de na bud med mang po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-23: bdag cag de na dga' bar mchis mchis na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-24: chab dbus de nas rin chen padmo'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-25: 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-26: lo ma rin chen yu ba bee d'urya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-27: snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gser las bgyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158a-28: spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i ze ba can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-0: 'od chen dzambu'i @158b rgyal mtshan kun tu 'phro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-1: de tshe dgung la gdugs shig shar tam zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-2: skye bo kun kyang yid gnyis 'tshal bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-3: dgung sangs rgyur nas padmo chen po de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-4: gdugs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyas bgyis nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-5: snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-6: 'di 'byung de ni sngon gyi ltas su byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-7: bud med rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-8: tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag pas byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-9: sug las bgyis pa chab 'tshal mi 'gyur bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-10: 'di ni sngon chad legs par spyad pa'i 'bras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-11: skra ni mthon mthing mig yangs autpa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-12: tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha dog rnam dag ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-13: phreng ba rgyan mchog cha lugs dbyibs su shis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-14: dpal ltar dri med padmo'i mchog las skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-15: lus ni rnam dag yan lag rkyen du mnyam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-16: lus kyi dbyibs legs yan lag yongs su tshang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-17: gser gyi gzugs la nor bus phyis pa 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-18: phyogs kun 'od kyis rnam par gda' bar gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-19: lus las tsandan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-20: phyogs su rgyas par 'di yi lus las 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-21: sgra snyan lha rdzas yid du 'ong brjod tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-22: kha nas autpa la yi ngad kyang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-23: 'di ni gang tshe 'dzum zhing dgod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-24: rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-25: bud med rin chen 'jig rten 'dir byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-26: tha ma la kun gyi dbang du 'gyur ma lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-27: khyod ma gtogs par mi yi 'jig rten na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:158b-28: 'di yi bdag po gzhan ni gcig ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-1: rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-2: khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-3: 'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-4: ha cang mi spo ma ha cang phra ma lags; ;lto ni gzhu 'dra nu ma shas kyang rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-5: yan lag skyon bral 'di ni khyod la 'os //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-6: grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-7: lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-8: 'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-9: ma lus de la 'di ni pha rol phyin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-10: mda' gzhu'i tshul la'ang rnam pa brgyas su mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-11: 'phong gi cho ga rnam pa rangs par rtogs; ;dgra yid bzho zhing dbab pa kun la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-12: 'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-13: lus rnams kun nas rin chen rnam dag pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-14: 'od mchog 'khor gyis shin tu mdzes pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-15: sngon gyi legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-16: 'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-17: mi yi 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-18: de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi cho ga 'tshal; ;de dag ma lus thams cad zhir bgyi na'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-19: ma nor sman gyi cho gas gso la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-20: dzambu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-21: skye bo'i nges tshig ma lus bye brag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-22: 'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-23: sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159a-24: dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-0: de dag bye brag tshul la'ang @159b rab tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-1: 'jig rten glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-2: ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul yang 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-3: rol mo sil snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-4: bzhad gad rol mo'i tshul la rnam par mkhas; ;chags dang ma chags mi rnams mngon 'tshal kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-5: khong khro chags par 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-6: 'jig rten bud med sgra rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-7: khyad par nang du de la ma lus 'tshal; ;bud med skye bo'i skyon du bgyi ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-8: grangs med de dag 'di la gcig ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-9: thil gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-10: yan lag bstabs dang yan lag rnams bstan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-11: shes nyen kun la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-12: khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-13: 'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-14: 'dod pa zhe dug mi ldang sdig mi bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-15: bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing des pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-16: mi khro mi brlang shin tu mkhas pa lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-17: ldang ba'i ngang tshul yid du'ong ba'i ngag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-18: rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-19: sku nyams gar bde lta zhing sri zhu che //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-20: khyod kyi spyod mthun rjes su snyegs tshul dang mthun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-21: rgyas shing gtugs dang nad dang ldan pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-22: phongs pa shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-23: mig dang bral zhing mgon skyabs ma mchis la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-24: 'di ni snying brtse rtag tu skyed pa lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-25: 'di ni rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:159b-26: bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-1: rten kun la sman par dga' ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-2: rlabs chen sems kyi yon tan kun gyis brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-3: mchis sam nyal lam mchi 'am 'greng yang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-4: smra'am mi smra 'dzum zhing dgod kyang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-5: rtag tu bag mchis dran pa shes bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-6: 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu bsngags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-7: bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-8: 'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-9: 'di la lta bas 'jig rten ngoms mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-10: 'di ni gang la'ang chags par 'gyur ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-11: dge ba shes rnams la sri zhu 'di che ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-12: de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-13: rjes su ci 'byung lta zhing skyon med tshul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-14: sems bdag brtan pa ri rab ri dang 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-15: 'di ni bsod nams mchog gis rtag tu brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-16: mi mdza' dgrar len 'di la yong ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-17: 'di yi shes 'dra bud med gcig ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-18: rgyal sras khyod la 'di ni tshul dang mthun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-19: de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung bar phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160a-20: bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug ba'i mdun du bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @160b chub tu zhugs pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-2: ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-3: tshad med pa zhig bsag par bya dgos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-4: bskal ba mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-5: yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-6: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug par ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bya dgos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni; mi gcad par bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-13: sems can gyi rgyud thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-15: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-17: mtha' las rgal bar bde ba la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-18: sems can rab tu dgod par bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-19: sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrub pa la ni; brtson par bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-26: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:160b-28: sems can thams cad kyi phongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-1: thug pa'i bskal par spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe kha zas dang btung ba'i spyin pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-2: sems can yongs su tshim par bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-3: yo byad kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-4: slong ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-5: de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la nan tan nyams su len pa'i tshe phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-6: yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-8: chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-13: nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-14: de'i tshe khyod gzhan la byin na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-15: nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-16: bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su btang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-18: lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-19: nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar byas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-22: nying lag gtubs shing slong mo ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-23: nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161a-25: de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-0: zhes nas rgyal bu gzi brjid bdag pos de'i tshe bu mo @161b dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-1: ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-2: yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-3: yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya mtsho rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-4: tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-5: bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-6: mkha' ltar tshad med smon lam rnam sbyang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-8: bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-9: rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-10: pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslab ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-11: ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-12: byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-13: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-14: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-15: 'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-16: ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-17: nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-18: sems can kun kyang ma lus rnam sbyang dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-19: sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-20: thams cad mkhyen lam tshul la dgod kyang dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-21: chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-22: bskal ba rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-23: 'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-24: 'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:161b-25: slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-1: cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-2: de'i tshe khyod ni nga sems mi mthun te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-3: zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par mi 'gyur ram //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-4: nga yi mgo 'dod 'ongs par ngas mthong ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-6: de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal gdungs 'gyur gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-7: 'di 'dra'i don thos rab tu brtan par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-8: nga yi rkang lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-9: khyod ni mi dga' de tshe slong ba la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-10: bud med ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-11: don 'di thos shing sems la yongs su soms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-12: phangs pa'i dngos dang de bzhin bu rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-13: khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-14: don 'di thos te mi dga' med na lta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-15: khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-16: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-17: bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-18: gzhon nu ji skad gsung ba de ltar bgyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-21: ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-22: gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-23: thams cad du yang slad nam las pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-24: rtag tu zham ring sleb pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-25: don thams cad la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-26: thugs dang mthun par spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-27: med par nyams su blang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162a-28: mi mthun pa ma mchis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-0: zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i @162b 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-1: bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-2: zhugs kyis yongs gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-3: khyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-4: tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis spro bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-5: tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-6: bdag gi lus ni shin tu gtubs gshags kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-7: brtan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-8: ngang dge khyod kyis bdag gis khyim thab mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-9: khor yug ri yis bskal ba mtha' yas su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-10: bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-11: sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-12: khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-13: khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-14: bdag la thugs brtan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-15: yan lag sha gtubs gzhan la stsal ba mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-16: khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-17: bdag gi lus ni slad na ma las par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-18: skyes bu lha yi sras po khyod la dbul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-19: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-20: skye bo slong ba rnams la dgyes par stsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-21: sems can kun la thugs rje mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-22: bskyed de sems can rgya mtsho bsdu slad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-23: byang chub dam pa mchog tu khyod zhugs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-24: de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes bzung ba mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:162b-25: longs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-2: sems can mchog khyod khyor 'tshal ma lags kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-3: khyod dang spyod pa mthun par spyad slad du'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-4: spyan gsal mdzes shing byams pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-5: khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs pa ci tshul lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-6: thugs rje che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-7: de las thub dbang 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal; ;khyod kyi zhabs kyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-8: dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-9: khams gsum kun tu 'khor los bsgyur bar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-10: mtshan rab yongs kyis brgyan byon gdon mi 'tshal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-11: bdag gis g-yar lam mthong ba dgung zhig la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-12: chos bzang sprin 'od byang chub snying po yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-13: shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-14: sangs rgyas sras mang du mas mdun du bdar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-15: rgyal ba'i dbang po sku mchog nyi ma de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-16: dzambu chu klung rin chen 'tsher ba 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-17: g-yar lam mthong bar phyag gis bdag mgo byugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-18: de nas sad nas glo ba rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-19: dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-20: sngon chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-21: bdag la bstan pa bde gshegs de nyid ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-22: snying po yang dag byang chub yongs la zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-23: sngon yang gzhon nu gzi brjid khyod blta zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163a-24: bdag gi sems bskyed de ltar bsam par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-0: mdang sum @163b dgung la lha mo dge ba yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-1: gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-2: bdag gis bde gshegs g-yar lam rmis pas mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-3: yongs su dag pa'i sems can khyod kyang mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-4: yid bzhin bsam 'grub khyod dang bdag bcas pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-5: de ring rgyal ba de la mchod par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-6: de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i mtshan thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-7: sangs rgyas blta ba'i skabs byung nas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu rin po che lnga brgyas mngon par gtor nas gtsug gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba'ang de la byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-8: me'i mdog ltar 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos rin po ches kyang de bkab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-9: de de ltar rim gro byas kyang dga' bar gyur pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-10: nyams bde bar gyur pa lta bu'ang med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-11: dga' ba dang mos par ma gyur gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-12: gzhan du na thal mo sbyar cing mig mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi brjid bdag gi gdong la lta zhing gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-13: de nas sprul tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-14: bu mo 'di ni khyod gsal bgyi snyam nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-15: yun ring snga nas bdag gis bsam bsam ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:163b-16: gzugs mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-2: tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-3: bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-4: mi yi 'jig rten gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-5: 'jig rten kun gyi bud med nang na mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-6: padmo'i sbubs nas skyes pas rigs smos su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-7: skyon gyi dri mas ma gos 'thad ma lags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-8: ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-9: rtag par khyod kyi spyod tshul mthun par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-10: reg na bde la kun nas 'phags pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-11: 'di yi lus ni shin tu 'jam pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-12: bro 'tshal nad pa gang la reg gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-13: de yi mod la bro dang bral bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-14: 'di yi lus las spos kyi ngad 'byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-15: spos mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-16: de yi dri zhim tshor na rnam dag pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-17: tshul khrims gnas par mi rnams kun kyang 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-18: 'di yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-19: padmo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-20: khros pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-21: sems can ma lus kun kyang rab tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-22: 'di yi tshig snyan yid du 'ong ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-23: nyams su bde bas 'gro ba nyan par dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-24: thos na de rgyus skyon gyi mun pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-25: mi dge'i sug las bgyid par mos mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-26: 'di ni bsam bdag yid la dri med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-27: 'di la kun tu g-yo dang sgyu ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164a-28: ci smra de dag yid la'ang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-0: tshig dbyangs des ni 'gro @164b ba tshim par bgyid //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-1: sgyu yis sems can 'drid par mi bgyid de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-2: nor gyi don du 'gro ba yongs mi slu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-3: yid bsdams khrel gyis 'dzem dang ldan pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-4: rgan nam gzhon la'ang rtag tu sri zhu spyod; ;rigs rgyud gzugs kyis dregs pa ma mchis te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-5: 'di ni 'khor gyis dregs pa'ang yongs ma mchis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-6: nga rgyal rlom sems yongs dang bral ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-7: 'gro ba rnams la rtag tu gus par 'dud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-8: de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-9: bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-10: 'khor thams cad dang bcas par bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba de nas byung ste snying po byang chub chos kyis 'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-13: bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-14: de rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas babs te rkang pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i drung du song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:164b-15: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-1: zhi ba; dbang po bsdams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-2: glang po ltar shin tu dul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-3: mtsho ltar dvangs shing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-4: de ltar mthong nas de'i sems mngon par mos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-5: de ltar sems mngon par mos par gyur nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-6: mos pa'i shugs chen po rnam par spel te dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-8: spro ba chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te rin po che dam pa'i padmo stong phrag lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-9: bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-10: rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa lnga brgya brtsigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-11: gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165a-12: de nas bcom ldan de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas mdo sde sgo kun tu lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-0: des @165b de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-1: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-2: dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-4: sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-5: 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-6: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-7: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-8: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-9: gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:165b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-0: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam gyi sprin ces bya @166a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-1: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa chos kyi tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-3: bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas kyang ye shes thub par dka' ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges par gzhag pa rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-5: de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-6: bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-7: 'khor thams cad dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-8: de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-9: rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po gang na ba der dong ste drung du phyin nas rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te don 'di brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-10: lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bgyi ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166a-12: mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-0: bde bar gshegs @166b pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-3: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-4: khyod kyi khams 'di de nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu stug po'i 'od na rnam par spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-6: de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-7: gzhon nu khyod la don 'di lha'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-11: bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas sbran to; ;de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas byung bar thos nas sangs rgyas skye ba la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-12: gter rab tu thob pa tsam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-13: sangs rgyas rin po che dang phrad par ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-16: ngan song gi g-yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-17: nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-18: sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang phrad pa tsam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-19: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-20: yongs su 'grel ba yin par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-21: shin tu bde zhing ldan pa la ni; rab tu gzhog par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-22: rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-23: yang dag par ston par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:166b-24: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-0: sgron ma chen po byung ba tsam @167a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-2: 'jig rten mgon med pa las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-3: chos kyi tshul gyi mgon dang phrad par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-4: 'jig rten 'dren pa med pa las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-6: sangs rgyas byung bar thos pas mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-7: spro ba chen po skyes nas rgyal rigs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-16: 'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus nas sangs rgyas byung bar sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la rgyal po'i srid de yang chos kyi dga' bar byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-17: de ltar gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der song ste spyan sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-18: bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor dang bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-0: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas de'i tshe mdzod spu nas 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi sgron ma zhes @167b bya ba rab tu bkye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-1: de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-2: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-3: sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-4: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-5: sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pas gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas par yang dag par bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-6: de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzungs kyi sgo de thos nas chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba chen po skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-7: 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-9: nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo; ;srog chags stong phrag bcus ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-10: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:167b-11: sems can grangs med pa zhig gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-2: phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa des sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dul bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-3: de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa de'i yid la 'di snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-5: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud par mi nus la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-6: ye shes rnam pa 'di lta bu yang sgrub par mi nus kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-9: snyam nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-11: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul la mchis par ci gnang zhes nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-13: de'i dus la bab par shes na rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-14: de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zham ring du rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168a-15: de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas par yongs su bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-2: de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo yang rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu yang rab tu thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-4: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-5: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa yang rab tu thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-8: gtam gyi skyes bu yang byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-9: chos smra ba chen po yang byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-10: bstan pa yongs su bzung ba yang byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-11: mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la lus yongs su bstan nas sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-12: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid mngon par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-13: sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-14: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan pa yongs su bzung pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:168b-15: rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag pos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba nya ste rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun rab tu thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-0: de khang pa'i steng na bud med kyi tshogs @169a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-1: kyis bskor cing 'dug ba'i mdun du 'khor lo rin po che chen po shugs la thogs pa med pa zhes bya brtsibs stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-2: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-3: lha rdzas kyi dzambu chu klung gi gser las grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-5: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-6: glang po rin po che sna chen po rdo rje rin po che'i ri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-7: rta rin po che ri sngo rlung gi shugs zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-8: nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-9: bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de yang bud med rin po cher byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-10: khyim bdag rin po che nor gyi phung po mang po zhes bya bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-11: blon po rin po che mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yang byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-13: de de ltar rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-16: chos kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-17: yul gyi mthu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-18: de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod cing yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-19: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169a-20: des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-6: skye bo dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba yang ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas par chos kyis mngon par rgyal te gnas par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-7: des 'dzam bu'i gling de'i rgyal po'i gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag tu yang rgyal po'i gnas re rer gtsug lag khang lnga brgya lnga brgya byed du btsud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-8: thams cad kyang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-9: longs spyod dang yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-10: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-13: dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal gyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-14: gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-15: lhun gyi rgya shin tu che bar byas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-16: nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-17: rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-18: rgyal po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:169b-19: rgyal po'i gnas de dag kun tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-0: sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i cho @170a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-2: rnam par 'phrul pas sems can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-3: der yang sems can ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-4: dad pa thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-5: dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-6: sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-7: dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-8: byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-9: byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-10: snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-11: sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-14: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-15: chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-16: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170a-17: dus gsum gyi ye shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-0: sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i don du ye shes @170b snang ba la zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-2: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-3: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam bskyed par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-5: lam gyi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir ye shes snang ba bskyed par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-7: chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-8: zhing gi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-9: zhing mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-10: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir smon lam 'debs par gyur to; ;'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:170b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa rnam par dag par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-0: sems can rnam pa de lta bu dag gi don rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba mthong nas rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul @171a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-2: chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pas sems can de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-3: gdul ba'i don du rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gshegs su gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-5: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzhi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-7: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa de yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-11: rigs kyi bu; de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i yab tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-13: de ltar mi blta ste; de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od ces bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-0: da ltar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin ces bya @171b ba na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbu ma dus gsum rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba na snying po byang chub thams cad la dbang ba'i lus rab tu snang ba zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te; sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor cing chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan du snang ba'i sprin yongs su dag par mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho der de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-4: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smin phar mdzad pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-6: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:171b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo padmo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-1: bdag po'i yum du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-2: bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gtso mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-4: rigs kyi bu; bcom ldan 'das kyi yum lha mo sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa' skyed skyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-5: rnam par thar pa kun tu snang zhing sgrib pa med pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-6: sngon de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i btsun mo dam pa padmo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-10: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na sbrul tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-13: sh'akya lag na 'khar ba'i chung ma kho mo'i ma mig mdzes zhes bya ba 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na sbrul tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-16: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo dga' ba'i 'od shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172a-20: de'i tshe de'i dus na sbrul tshong ma'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-0: de la @172b ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal pa gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i 'khor du gyur pa de rnams gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-4: de ltar mi blta ste; bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa las ma nyams pa'i sems dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-10: chos thams cad la rnam par spyad par dbang sgyur ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:172b-13: sems can thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par ston pa'i lus yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-1: ba la rjes su mthun pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-3: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-4: yang dag par sgrub pa phyogs kyi dra ba ma lus pa thams cad du 'dal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa sha stag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa 'di dag yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid kyi bdag po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-9: kho mos nam bzhugs kyi bar du na bza' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173a-13: yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:173b-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:174a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sems can nam mkha'i sems snang ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to; ;de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i spos kyi gtsug bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-2: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams der sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-3: de dag thams cad kho mo cag gis na bza' dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-13: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya chen po la mos pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-14: bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer du gshegs pa la kho mo rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te khyim thab dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sgo rnam pa thams cad du bshams pas mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das de las chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba 'byung ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-15: de thos nas kho mos ye shes kyi mig rab tu thob ste byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di yang rab tu thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:175b-17: de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan @176a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-1: cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cing bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu rgyu rgyu ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig bsnyen bkur nas bskal pa la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bskal par bzhugs pa gcig kyang bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyang bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-6: bskal pa la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-8: bskal pa la la la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-10: de srid du kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i sku yang tshad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-15: ji 'dra ba zhig yin pa khong du ma chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-16: sku'i 'phrin las kyang khong du mchud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-18: thugs kyi 'phrin las kyang khong du mchud do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-19: ye shes kyi gzigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-20: ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176a-21: ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yang khong du mchud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-0: byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems bskyed de brda sna @176b tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-1: bsnyen pa sna tshogs kyis mos pa bskyed par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-4: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'khor du 'grogs 'grogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-6: de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya chen po la mos pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di thob nas rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-8: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu 'grogs 'grogs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-9: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos chos bstan pa thob ste yongs su blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:176b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos rnam par thar pa 'di tshul sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-0: @177a *// mdo sde'i tshul gyi gsung sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-1: rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-3: rnam par thar pa'i rgyud sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-4: dus la 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-5: zhing rgya mtsho la 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-6: sangs rgyas blta ba rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs par bya ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi lam sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'byams klas pa sna tshogs kyis thob par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i tshul ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-13: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-14: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-15: sems can gyi ming du bya ba thams cad kyi dbyings ltar tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-16: dus gsum gyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-17: phyogs rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-18: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177a-20: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi lus ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang mnyam @177b pa'o; ;de ltar rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-1: kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta lta yang blta bas ma ngoms te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-4: gcig tu 'dod chags la spyod pa'i skyes pa dang bud med phan tshun nas 'phrad par dus byas pa gnyis la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-5: sems kyi rgyud tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba gtsang ba'i 'du shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-6: rnam par rtog pas mos pa las byung ba tshad med pa zhig skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-8: de bzhin du kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-9: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-10: tshad med par shin tu bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-11: gzhi sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-12: mtshams kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa; dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-13: ri'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-14: sa'i gzhi'i rgyan sna tshogs bstan du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-15: sprin sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' kun nas khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-18: grangs sna tshogs su brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud sna tshogs 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-21: snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:177b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan @178a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-2: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgra 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-3: theg pa'i tshul sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-5: snang ba sna tshogs kyis rab tu snang pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-6: mtshan ma sngon chad ma mthong ba dag sems kyi skad cig re re zhing mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-7: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-9: mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs sgrog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dag kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-10: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa khyim dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-15: rgya mtsho la gnas pa gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-17: longs spyod kyi yul sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-20: sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-21: dbang po sna tshogs su grub pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dag kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178a-22: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho @178b mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-7: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-9: thabs rgya mtsho dag la'ang 'jug cing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:178b-12: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rab tu 'grub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-0: de ltar kho mo bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i sgo re re zhing sems kyi skad cig re re @179a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-1: la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-2: khong du chud par byas kyang mthar thug par ma gyur te sngon khong du chud pa la bzlas te khong du chud par byas pa'ang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-3: sngon thob pa las bzlas te thob par byas pa'ang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-5: de ltar don thams cad grub pa btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-6: bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang kho mo ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-7: ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya bas yongs su 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-9: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di shes te mnyam par gzhog par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-10: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-11: sems can thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i dbyibs su gnas pa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthun par spyod pa yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-13: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179a-14: lus med pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-0: nam mkha'i @179b mtshan nyid du 'gro ba'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rnam par rtog pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-1: thams cad du rjes su song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam par rnam par 'phrul pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-2: rnam par thar pa'i yul mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par 'phrul pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-3: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rgya chen por sems bskyed pas 'jug pa la rnam par spyod cing dbang sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-4: chos kyi gnas sgo thams cad dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho la rnam par rtse ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-5: yon tan gyi gter ma lus par bstan par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di nyid na khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-8: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po padmo'i snying po can la byang chub sems dpa'i yum lha mo sgyu ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-10: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dri ma thams cad kyis mi gos pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i nan tan la rgyun mi 'chad pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:179b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa la sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod @180a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-1: pa thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mngon du gyur par gnas pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-3: sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i nan tan las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-4: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-5: theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-6: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-7: rnam par spel ba la sgyid lug par mi 'gyur pa yin pa dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-8: de nas sh'akya'i bu mo go pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i tshul 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-9: yang dag byang chub spyod la brtson pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-10: sems can dam pa sems can sus mthong ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-11: mos pa'i sems can khong khro ldan yang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-12: de yi bsdu bas kun kyang yongs su 'du; ;zhing brgya'i rdul phran rab tu phra snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-13: bskal pa mang po kho mos 'di nas dran //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-14: de yi pha rol bskal pa rnam brgyan la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-15: 'jig rten khams rab ri bo'i 'od byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-16: de la thub pa stong phrag bgrangs pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-17: bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-18: de kun tha mar thub dbang byung ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-19: 'gro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi rgyal mtshan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180a-20: de tshe rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-0: @180b thub dbang de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-1: dgra yi 'khor bcom 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-2: bka' la thogs med mnga' bdag dam par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-3: de la bu ni brgya phrag lnga yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-4: kun kyang dpa' zhing rtul bod gzugs dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-5: yan lag kun rdzogs rnam par dag pa'i lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-6: gong na med pa'i dpal gyis rab tu brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-7: rgyal po sras bcas bde gshegs 'dun par gyur; ;rgyal ba'i mchod pa rgya chen rab kyang byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-8: de ni rtag tu dam chos yongs bzung ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-9: chos la mngon brtson rab tu brtan par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-10: rgyal po de sras 'od zer bzang po ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-11: sems can rnam dag gzhon nu 'khrungs gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-12: shin tu blta mdzes yid 'ong gzugs ldan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-13: yan lag mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-14: rgyal srid yongs su spangs nas mi yi 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-15: bye ba lngas bskor de tshe rab tu byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-16: rab tu byung nas brtson 'grus brtan ldan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-17: rgyal po'i chos kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-18: pho brang dam pa sdong po ldan pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-19: grong mchog bye ba stong gis kun nas bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-20: nags tshal yal ga sna tshogs der byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-21: rab tu sgra zhi bla na med pa'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-22: de ni 'od bzang brtul zhugs rab ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-23: 'jigs med shes rab spobs dang ldan pa bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-24: des ni sems can nyon mongs sbyangs pa'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-25: rgyal ba'i chos kyang yongs su bstan pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:180b-26: shes rab ldan pa de ni bsod snyoms la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-1: shing cha byad zhi ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-2: mi g-yeng spyan gyis dgongs pa mkhyen bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-3: tshul zab bstan par bzhud pas grong du byon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-4: grong mchog dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-5: tshong dpon legs pa'i snyan grags der byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-6: kho mo de yi bu mo yid 'ong gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-7: gzugs mdzes ldan te nyi ma'i 'od ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-8: khyim gyi dam pa de yi sgo gnas su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-9: 'od zer bzang po 'khor bcas kho mos mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-10: yan lag mtshan brgyan shin tu mdzes pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-11: de la kho mo mos pa mchog cig skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-12: de ni kho mo'i khyim gyi sgor byon nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-13: nor bu de yi lhung bzed nang du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-14: rgyan rnams kun kyang bkrol te mos sems kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-15: shin tu 'dun par de la bdag gis phul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-16: bde gshegs sras po 'od zer bzang dpal la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-17: 'dod chags sems kyis mchod pa rnams bsgrubs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-18: bskal pa'i dam pa nyis brgya lnga bcur yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-19: ngan song gang du'ang song bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-20: lha yi yul du lha rigs ldan par skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-21: mi yi yul du rgyal po'i sras mor gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-22: kha dog mtha' yas sku yi mdog mnga' bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-23: kun tu kho mo mngon par zhal yang bstan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-24: bskal pa nyis brgya la bcu 'das gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-25: sbrul tshong gtso mo blta na sdug pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181a-26: mi 'jigs byed pa'i bu mor skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-0: de tshe @181b shin tu sbyangs zhes bya ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-1: rgyal bu gzi brjid 'od kyis bdag mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-2: kho mos de la dga' bas mchod pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-3: bdag nyid de la yongs su dbul byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-4: kho mo de yi dbang gyur chung mar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-5: drang srong chen po sku mchog nyi ma la'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-6: bdag cag bsdongs te legs par mchod pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-7: mos pas sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-8: bdag gis byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-9: rgyal ba bye ba drug cu tshang ba yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-10: bskal pa de la kho mos rim gro byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-11: rgyal ba de dag tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-12: sangs rgyas mos pa'i gzi brjid byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-13: der ni kho mo'i chos mig rnam par dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-14: chos kyi rang bzhin bdag gis khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-15: tshul min rnam rtog rab tu zhi bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-16: de tshe tshun chad kho mos snang ba thob /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-17: rgyal sras rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-18: de phyi tshun chad rnam par mthong bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-19: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rgya mtsho'i zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-20: bsam las rnam 'das phyogs su kho mo 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-21: phyogs rnams kun gyi sna tshogs rnam dag pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-22: zhing rnams tshad med rmang byung kho mos mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-23: mthong yang de dag la ni chags pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-24: nyon mongs bcas la'ang khong khro sdang ba'ang med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-25: zhing rnams de dag ma lus thams cad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-26: snying po byang chub sangs rgyas ma lus mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:181b-27: de dag 'od kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-0: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis @182a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-2: de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-3: sems gcig thogs pa med pas khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-4: rnam par thar pa tshad med thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-5: de dag ting 'dzin ma lus de bzhin gshegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-6: de dag spyod pa yangs pa'ang khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-7: sa tshul ma lus kun kyang kho mos shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-8: smon lam grangs med rgya mtsho chen po yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-9: skad cig re res mtha' yas khong du chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-10: bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-11: skyes bu dam pa'i sku la lta lta ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-12: de yi ba spu re re rnam 'phrul pa'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-13: nam yang mur phyin bdag gis ma nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-14: de yi ba spu gcig gi rtse la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-15: zhing mang rgya mtsho grangs las 'das pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-16: rlung gi phung po chu bo chen po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-17: sa yi lhun rnams me yis yongs gang mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-18: gzhi rnam sna tshogs rnam phye'i gzugs ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-19: dbyibs tshul sna tshogs khong du chud bya ba; ;dbyibs dang lus kyi rnam pa sna tshogs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-20: lus dang rnam pa mtha' yas gzugs ldan pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-21: brjod yas khams rnams zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-22: tshad med rnams su tha dad gsal bar mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-23: chos kyi gsung gis 'gro ba gdul don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182a-24: brtson pa'i rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-0: bskal par spyod pa @182b yangs pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-1: sku yi 'phrin las kho mos de ma shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-2: gsung dang thugs min de gnyis 'phrin las min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-3: rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul tha dad tshul ma shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis sh'akya'i bu mo go pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te sh'akya'i bu mo go pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang bltas te sh'akya'i bu mo go pa'i drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-5: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-6: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-7: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lha mo sgyu ma'i gan du 'gro bar mngon du bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi rgyud kyi ye shes la zhugs pa des 'di snyam du bsam mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-10: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i skye mched drug dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-11: gnas med pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-12: chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-13: chags pa med par 'gro ba'i lam du zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-14: chos kyi lus shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-15: lus kyi lam sgyu mas legs par sprul pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:182b-16: ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam par 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-1: gzugs dang lus su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-2: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-3: ma skyes ma 'gag pa'i lus dang ldan pa; 'ong ba med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-4: bden pa med pa dang rdzun pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-5: ma 'phos ma zhig pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-6: ma byung mi 'jig pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-7: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-8: gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-9: kun gzhi med pa la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-10: mi zad cing nyams pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-11: gzugs brnyan ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-12: rmi lam dang mnyam par rnam par rgyu ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-13: me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar 'pho ba med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-14: phyogs med pa ltar rab tu zhi ba khong du chud pa'i lus dang ldan pa //
