K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-15: phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-16: dus gsum du tha mi dad pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-17: lus med pa'i sems kyi lus rnam par mi rtog pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183a-18: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mig gi lam las yongs su 'das pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-0: kun tu bzang po'i mig @183b gi rgyud kyis rnam par shes par bya bas 'dul ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-1: chags pa med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa rnams mthong bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-3: mngon sum du 'phrad par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-5: mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-6: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rig par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-7: tshig gi rgyud yongs su shes par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-8: gdams ngag yongs su gzung bar bya bar thabs ji lta bu zhig tu nus par 'gyur snyam nas de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe grong khyer gyi lha mo rin chen mig ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-9: nam mkha'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba zhig gis bdag gi lus rgyan sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-10: bdag gi lus rgyan gyis rnam par klubs par nam mkha' la 'dug par nye bar bstan nas lha rdzas kyi me tog rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-11: kha dog du ma can snyim pa nas mngon par gtor te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:183b-12: rigs kyi bu; khyod kyis 'khor ba'i yid la dga' bar mi gnas pas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su srung ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-1: bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmigs pas sems kyi grong khyer brgyan pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-5: g-yo dang bral bas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su sbyangs pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-7: khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-9: khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par spel ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-15: chos kyi gzhal med khang yangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la dbang sgyur bas sems kyi grong khyer dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-16: gnas kyi mdzod brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184a-17: srung ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-0: rigs kyi bu; khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa'i sa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu @184b thob par 'tshal bas sems kyi grong khyer snang bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-2: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i thabs kyi lam gyis rang gi sems kyi grong khyer du gzhol bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer nye bar brtan pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-4: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-5: smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas sems kyi grong khyer gyi ra ba brtan pa mngon par sgrub par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-7: khyod kyis nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-8: bdud kyi ris kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-9: bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi chom par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rgal dka' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-10: bshig par dka' ba mngon par sgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-12: khyod kyis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer snang bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:184b-14: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung bas sems kyi grong khyer mngon par brlan pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-1: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rang gi sems kyis yang dag par blangs pas sems kyi grong khyer brtan pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-3: khyod kyis byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par dgang bas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu rgyas par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-5: khyod kyis mi dge ba'i chos kyi gnyen po chos kyi gdugs yangs par sgrub pas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su dag pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-7: khyod kyis snying rje chen po shin tu yangs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du sems g-yo par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu bskyob pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-9: khyod kyis phyi nang gi dngos po 'gro ba thams cad la yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer gyi sgo dbye ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185a-11: khyod kyis 'khor ba'i yul thams cad la dga' ba las phyin phyogs su blta bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-0: khyod kyis mi dge ba'i chos kyi rgyud thams cad mi srid par bya @185b bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi srog rab tu mkhrang ba mngon par sgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-2: khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus las phyir mi ldog par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer brtan par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-4: khyod kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dran pa shin tu snang bar byas pas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu gsal bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-6: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo sde sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par dbye ba'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-8: khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon sum du gnas pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:185b-9: lam gyi tshul yongs su brtan pa'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer dmigs par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-0: khyod kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho rang gi smon lam du mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi grong @186a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-1: khyer byin gyis brlab pa'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-3: khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-4: ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po rnam par spel bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi tshogs kyi mthu rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-6: khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-11: rnam par byang ba shes par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer nas 'od kun tu dgye ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-13: khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad yang dag par bsdu bas sems kyi grong khyer du dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-15: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dran zhing snang bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer 'od gsal bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186a-17: khyod kyis lus med pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-0: khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du 'gro bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer sgyu ma lta @186b bur brtag pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-2: khyod kyis de ltar sems kyi grong khyer yongs su sbyangs pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su sgrub pa thob par nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-4: de ltar sems kyi grong khyar yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdun na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-5: sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba la sgrib pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-6: chos mnyan par bya ba la sgrib pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba la sgrib pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-8: sems can yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba la sgrib pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la sgrib pa yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-10: sgrib pa thams cad mi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-12: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-13: lhag pa'i bsam par dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-14: las gron chung dus dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-15: rigs kyi bu; dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:186b-16: de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha mo chos kyi padmo dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-0: ngo tsha shes pa'i dpal gyi dog pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis shig lha mo'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor nas lha mo sgyu ma'i legs pa rjod @187a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-1: cing snying po byang chub nas thon te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas rang rang gi rin po che'i rna cha las 'od zer gyi dra ba rin po che'i kha dog tu 'dug pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-3: bdug pa dri ma med pa 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog tu 'dug pa du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-5: bsam pa mos par byed pa'i kha dog dang; sems kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-6: lus kyi gdung ba sim par byed pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-7: lus rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187a-8: lus kyi mthu thogs pa med par 'byung ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba mang po bkye bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-0: zhing rgya chen po snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku thams cad du khyab pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa yongs su bstan nas 'jig rten thams cad la g-yas phyogs su bskar ba byas te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu shar nas spyi bo'i gtsug man chad ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du zhugs te lus kun tu khyab par gyur to; ;de ltar lha mo de dag gi 'od zer gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la phog ma thag tu de'i mod la mun pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa'i mig rdul dang bral ba'i 'od @187b snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-1: sems can gyi rang bzhin khong du chud par byed pa'i mig rab rib dang bral ba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-2: sems can gyi rang bzhin khong du chud par byed pa'i mig rab rib dang bral ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-3: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba'i mig rdul dang bral bas dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-4: zhing thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku la rnam par lta ba'i mig rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par lta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-7: zhing rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-8: 'jig pa rnam par phye ba la rnam par lta ba'i mig chags pa med pa'i 'od ces bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo sde'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa'i phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i mig kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:187b-10: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-1: gyi rlabs la rnam par lta ba'i mig kun nas yul du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skyes pa la rnam par lta ba'i mig kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa'i sgo srung srin po'i dbang po srin po stong phrag bcu'i gtso bo mig bzang zhes bya ba chang mar bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-5: rang gi gnyen bshes dang 'khor du bcas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la me tog kha dog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas mngon par gtor te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-7: chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang nye bar bsnyen pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-10: 'di ltar bsam pa yongs su dag pa g-yo dang sgyu med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-11: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa la tha mi dad pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-12: sems can thams cad la sems can med pa'i rang bzhin nges par rtsogs pa'i rab tu rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-13: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par 'dun pa'i mos pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-0: chos thams @188b cad kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i mig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-1: sems can gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la tha mi dad pa'i byams pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-2: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-3: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnyen po gdugs su gyur pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyud thams cad la rab tu zhugs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba mngon du gyur pa'i ye shes kyi mig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-6: chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang nye bar bsnyen pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-8: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo bcus rnam par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang mngon du gyur pa 'thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-11: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral bar rnam par dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-12: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i mig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:188b-13: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dmigs pa thams cad la rnam par mi rtog rnam par mi dpyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-0: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i @189a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-2: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-3: bsod nams rgya mtsho gsog pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-4: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo sems bskyed pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'byung ba dang 'bral ba med cing nye bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-5: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar las pas yongs su 'grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-6: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang yongs su mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-7: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag par kun tu nye bar 'gro ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-8: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs kyi spyod pa thams cad kyis dub pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-10: ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang mngon du gyur pa 'thob pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi kha nas grags pa zhes bya ba yang @189b 'thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-1: de la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad tha mi dad cing mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen tha mi dad cing thams cad du khyab pa 'di rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-4: srin po'i dbang po mig bzang gis de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-5: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-7: bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pas sman yon btags pa ma nongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-9: da dung yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i slad du ji ltar brtson par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-10: phyogs gang logs su mchi bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-11: gnas gang zhig tu yongs su btsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-12: dmigs pa gang zhig bsam par bgyi ba'i thabs kyi sgo ma nor bar bstan du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-16: phyogs kun tu rab tu 'dud pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-17: dmigs pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dran pa dang 'brel ba'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-18: kun tu 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-19: sems kyi shugs rmi lam lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:189b-20: yid kyi lus gzugs brnyan lta bus rnam par rgyu ste 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du song zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis srin po'i dbang po mig @190a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-1: bzang gis ji skad du gtam pa de ltar nan tan du byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-2: mdun gyi sa'i nang nas padmo chen po rdo rje rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i chu ba can; nang rim rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho sna tshogs las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-3: rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad las 'dab ma'i phreng ba grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-4: rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-5: spos kyi rin po che'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad gyi mdog gi ze ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-6: rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas yog pa byung ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-7: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po de'i snying po la'ang khang pa brtsegs pa chos kyi phyogs su yang dag par gzhol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-8: shin tu spa la blta na sdug pa; sa'i gzhi rnam par snang ba'i dbyibs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-9: rin po che rgyal po thams cad las byas pa'i ka ba stong tshang bas mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-10: rgyan thams cad du rin po che thams cad bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-11: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dri ma med pa'i lha rdzas kyi gzhi bting ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-12: mu tig gi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pa kun nas bres pa; rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs rab tu spa bar spel bas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190a-13: dzambu chu klung gi nor bu rin po ches kun nas rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-0: rin po che'i khri 'phang grangs @190b med pas kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-1: phyogs thams cad nas rin po che rgyal po'i them skas mdzes par bkye ba gnas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-2: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus na yang khri nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi padmo'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-3: nor bu rin po che'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i dbyibs lta bu'i rten gyis bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-4: nor bu rin po che'i 'bru thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-5: dbang po'i rgyal mtshan rab tu snang ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-6: rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo'i sa la brten pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-7: rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phreng bas brgyan pa; rin po che'i khri 'phang du ma las blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-8: rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu spras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-9: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-10: rin po che'i rgyal po'i stan lha rdzas las 'das pa legs par bting ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-11: gos rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyis gzhi thams cad du bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-12: rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi gnam yol bres pas nam mkha' rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-13: rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-14: phyogs kun nas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dkrigs pa'i sgra 'byung ba; rin po che thams cad kyi snam bu'i rgyal mtshan phur lab tu lding ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:190b-15: spos rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par bres pas kun nas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-1: cad kyi rgyal mtshan las me tog gi klong sna tshogs char du mngon par 'brul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-2: rin po che'i dril bu'i rgyal mtshan 'khrol ba'i sgra yid bde ba'i dbyangs snyan par grags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-3: khang pa'i kha thams cad nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-4: rin po che'i gzugs sna tshogs kyi kha nas spos chu kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i char 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-5: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba las glang po dam pa'i gzugs su byas pa'i kha nas padmo'i dra ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-6: rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sengge'i kha nas spos kyi sprin kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-7: rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba tshangs pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i kha nas byams pa chen po'i tshul tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ror sgrog pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-8: rin po che sna tshogs shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi kha nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi legs pa rab tu rjod pa'i nga ro 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-9: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs su 'byung ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191a-10: nor bu rin po che dam pa'i dril gyi phreng ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-0: rdo rje'i dril sna tshogs las byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams @191b cad kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-1: rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba'i dbyings sna tshogs tu sgrog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-2: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snying po dag pa'i phreng bas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-3: rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i phreng bas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'od zer yongs su bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu dbye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-5: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i phreng bas sprul pa'i sprin 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i 'od rab tu dgye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-7: rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi phreng bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul bas skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par dgang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:191b-8: rin po che'i rgyal po ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi khyim gyi lha mo'i dbyangs snyan pa rab tu sgrog pa dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-0: khri de dmigs pa thams cad @192a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-1: du de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sprin 'gyed pas yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-2: legs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-3: rin po che'i rgyan grangs med pa'i 'khor gyi stan gyis bskor bar mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-4: khri de la lha mo sgyu ma 'jig rten gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-5: srid pa'i rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs su yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-6: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gzugs bsod nams yangs pas byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-7: 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs sems can thams cad la bzhin mngon par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-8: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-9: gdul bar mthun pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad dang mngon sum du 'dal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-10: dus thams cad 'gro ba nam mkha' la rnam par dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi mthas klas par dmigs su yod par byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-11: 'gro ba med pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad 'gag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192a-12: 'ong ba med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad du ma byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-0: ma skyes pa'i gzugs @192b mi skye bar mnyam pa'i chos la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-1: ma 'gag pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad la gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-2: yang dag par dmigs pa'i gzugs bden pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-3: 'jig rten gyis rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs rdzun pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-4: 'pho ba med pa'i gzugs shi 'pho ba dang skye ba las 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-5: mi 'jig pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-6: mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs dus gsum tshig gi lam du gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-7: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i gzugs mtshan nyid med pas byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-8: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-9: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-10: sgyu ma lta bu'i gzugs ye shes sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-11: smig rgyu lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba'i 'du shes bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa la gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-12: grib ma lta bu'i gzugs sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-13: rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas dmigs pa la ma 'dres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:192b-14: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gzhol ba'i gzugs nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-0: snying rje chen pos byung ba'i gzugs sems can gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su @193a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-1: bskyang ba la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-2: chags pa med pa'i sgos byung ba'i gzugs skad cig re res chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-3: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gzugs rnyog pa med par 'gro ba thams cad la brten pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-4: tshad med pa'i gzugs tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-5: mi gnas pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-6: byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i gzugs byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-7: ma byung ba'i gzugs smon lam sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-8: zil gyis mi non pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-9: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gzugs zhi gnas kyi snang bas rnam par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-10: mi 'byung ba'i gzugs 'gro ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-11: rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ltar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193a-12: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-0: mi rtog pas rtog pa med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par dmigs @193b pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-1: thogs pa med pa'i gzugs 'khor ba las bzlog pa la rab tu brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-2: rnam par dag pa'i gzugs de bzhin nyid dang mnyam par rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-3: rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs gzugs med par gzugs su snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-4: tshor ba med pa'i gzugs kyis 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-5: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-6: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis byung ba'i gzugs chos sgyu ma'i rnam pas grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-7: rnam par shes pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes las byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-8: rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi lam la gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-9: gdung ba yongs su bsal ba'i gzugs chos kyi sku bsil ba dam pa dang ldan pas lha mo sgyu ma bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-10: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs kyi lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi lus las 'phags pa ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:193b-11: de la sems can la las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-1: ma de bdud kyi bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-2: bdud kyi bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-4: dbang sgyur gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-6: rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-8: rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-10: rab mtsho ma'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-12: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-16: grul bum gyi bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-18: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194a-20: lha mo sgyu ma de mi'i dbang po'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral yang sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa des sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la lha mo sgyu ma 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams dang @194b ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams kyis bsgrubs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-3: 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-4: snying rje chen po'i lus su sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad nan tan du byas pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-6: bzod pa thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyis sems rnam par spel ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-8: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-9: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-10: bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang tshul thams cad las yongs su grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-11: bsam gtan gyi yan lag tha mi dad pa'i yul yongs su 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-12: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho bskam pa la shin tu gdon mi za bar byas pa'i nges par rtogs pa sna tshogs la gnas pa; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par dbye ba'i tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:194b-13: chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho rnam par dpyad pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-0: @195a *// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas ma ngoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-1: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la rnam par lta ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba'i sgo la mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i lam yongs su dag par bya ba; rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul nam mkha' dang mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-5: sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-6: 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa rnam pa tha dad pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-8: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-9: sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs mthar thug par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul thams cad mchod pas rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la brtson pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195a-12: chos kyi sku bla na med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-0: gzugs kyi lus @195b mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-1: bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rgya chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-3: chos kyi stobs rab tu sgyes pa'i blo can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-4: sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad kyi stobs yongs su rdzogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs kyi stobs yongs su skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes glog gi shes rab snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-8: sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems rgya mtsho rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa; 'gro ba shin tu mang ba'i bsam pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-9: sems can pha rol gyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-10: sems can mtha' yas pa'i mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyus la mkhas par khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-11: phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho tshad med pa lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba'i tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-13: zhing tha dad pa'i tshul thams cad shes par bya ba'i tshul la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-14: ye shes kyis lta ba phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-15: dus rgya mtsho thams cad du khyab pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:195b-16: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon sum du 'dud pa'i lus can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-1: sprin rgya mtsho'i char thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan gyis 'byung ba la rab tu brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su sgrub pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu 'jug pa la rnam par dpyod pa'i mthu yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-5: byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bskyang ba la rab tu brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs pa'i sprin kun tu snang ba rab tu ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-9: rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i smon lam gyis byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-10: de dag la sogs pa mthong ba'i tshul 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lha mo sgyu ma tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196a-11: des de mthong nas lha mo sgyu ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed du bdag gi lus byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs thams cad la mngon du bltas pa'i lha mo sgyu ma la thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyis phyag byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-0: des de ltar phyag byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' dang dbus med pa thob par @196b gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-1: des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag la rnam par bltas nas mtshan mar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-4: rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-6: rab tu rgya cher bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-10: rgyas gdab par byas te ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag las langs nas lha mo sgyu ma 'khor dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-12: stan dang bcas pa la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba la yongs su bskul ba bgyis pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-17: de ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-18: mthar gyis khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di'i bar du mchis pa lags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-20: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:196b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas rnam par brgyan pa thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-1: rnam par thar pa de dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa'i tha ma la skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha ma pa de dag thams cad so so'i mar gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i lto na gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-3: kho mo'i lto g-yas pa nas 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-5: skal pa dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa 'di nyid kyi grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i rigs dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' don grub byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-7: de ltar kho mo rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang na 'dug 'dug pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197a-8: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-0: ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba mang po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum gyi yon tan gyi @197b rgyan sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thon nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te kho mo'i lus la shar nas spyi bo man chad ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du 'phros par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer ming gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang rgyan dang rnam par thar pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed pa de dag kho mo'i lus su dong ma thag tu de'i mod la kho mo'i lus su byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dmigs par byas te byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-3: rgyan thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-4: khyim dang 'khor la yang de bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer de dag kho mo'i lus su dong ma thag tu de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi skye ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-7: rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dmigs par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mthong bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:197b-8: de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub du gshegs nas sengge'i gdan la bzhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor te @198a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-1: 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis bskor cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mang po mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cing bsnyen bkur ba de dag thams cad kyang kho mos dang po thugs bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-3: skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-4: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang bcas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-9: de ltar kho mo'i lus su byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer de dag dong ma thag tu kho mo'i lus kyang 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-10: rum nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs par gyur kyang mi'i lus las lhag par yang mi snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-11: phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i mngal gyi gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198a-13: rgyan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i lus kyi khongs su chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-0: kho mo'i lus su shod @198b bar gyur par snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-2: de ltar kho mo'i lus su byang chub sems dpa'i mngal gyi gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-5: longs spyod byung bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-6: de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gcig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-7: skal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-10: rnam par thar pa gcig la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-11: ye shes kyi sa gcig la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-12: rnam par 'phrul pa gcig gis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-13: smon lam gcig gis grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-14: spyod pa gcig gis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-15: chos kyi lus yongs su dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-16: gzugs kyi lus mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-17: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-19: rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-20: rin po che klu'i dbang po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod cing klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la sogs pa klu'i dbang po stong phrag brgyad cu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:198b-21: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang mngon par mchod cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-0: dga' ldan gyi pho brang thams cad nas shi 'pho yongs su ston pas dga' ldan gyi gnas re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dal ba'i gling bzhi par skye ba @199a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-1: len pa yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-2: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-3: sems can bag med pa thams cad yongs su skul zhing mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-4: 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu dgye bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-5: ngan song thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-6: sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas rnam par zlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-7: sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las yongs su skul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-8: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199a-9: sems can thams cad la lus mngon par ston pas dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos te 'khor dang bcas par kho mo'i lus su zhugs nas de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i khong na gom pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du yangs pa'i 'gros kyis rgyu zhing spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa dag @199b kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i mngal gyi gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-1: rnam par 'phrul ba blta ba'i phyir kho mo'i khong du 'dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-2: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-7: dbang sgyur gyi lha'i dbang po rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-8: tshangs pa rnams kyang mngal gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-11: chos nyan pa'i gtam nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'dong yang kho mo'i rum 'dis de snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor zhig yongs su bzung yang yangs par gyur pa yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-12: mi'i lus tha mal pa las kho mo'i lus khyad par can du gyur pa yang med mod kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-13: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snyed kyang yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-14: lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-15: rgyan yongs su dag pa yang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:199b-20: ji ltar kho mo skal pa dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling na byang chub sems dpa' khong na yongs su 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling @200a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-1: bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling dag na'ang rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyi tshul 'di nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir kho mo'i lus 'di gnyis su gyur pa'ang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-5: mang po la gnas pa'i med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-7: ji ltar kho mo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i yum du gyur pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-8: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dag gi yang yum du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-9: la la zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' padmo'i spubs nas rdzus te skye ba zhig tu gyur na yang padmo'i tshal gyi lha mor gyur cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-10: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' len te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-11: 'jig rten rnams kyis kyang kho mo ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i yum yin par shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-13: la la zhig tu thu bar skye bar gyur na yang de dag tu yang kho mos thu bar blangs te byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200a-14: la la zhig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin 'byung bar gyur na'ang de dag tu'ang kho mo snying po byang chub kyi lha mor gnas gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-0: thabs kyi sgo ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha ma pa 'jig rten du @200b 'byung ba yongs su ston pa de snyed kyi thabs kyi sgos kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-2: kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa dag tu yum du gyur pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-5: bsod skyabs kyi yum du 'ang gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-6: de bzhin du ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams kyi'ang yum du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-7: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs shing shi 'pho yongs su ston pa'i dus la bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-8: 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skye bar 'byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-9: mngal na bzhugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa'i 'od bkye nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-10: gzhi rab tu snang bar byas te chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-11: gzhi ji snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pas mi'i 'jig rten gyi mi'i dbang po'i rigs su cher skye ba yongs su bstan pas sems can gdul bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad du'ang kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:200b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i yum du ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-1: pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba sengge dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-2: de bzhin du rab tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-12: zla ba sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-15: don gcig tu ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-18: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i ri bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-19: sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-21: sgra rnam par grags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-22: yon tan dpag tu med pa mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-24: yan lag rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-31: len pa med pa'i mu khyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-32: yid gnyis rnam par sel ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-35: grags pa dag pas byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-37: gtsug phud rnam par mdzes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-39: rin po che'i dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201a-41: rin po che bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-0: stobs @201b la thub pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-1: dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-7: mi dkar ring ba'i spyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-9: blo gros rnam par bsgoms pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-18: ye shes rdo rje'i ri bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-20: gser gyi dra bas sku rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-21: shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-25: rnam par dag pas dgyes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-30: ma nyams pa'i yon tan 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-33: dbang du gyur pa'i yon tan gzi brjid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-34: rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-35: dri zhim po'i longs spyod dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-36: dri zhim po rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-37: yan lag rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-39: zhal nas spos thams cad 'od du 'phro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-40: rdo rje rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:201b-41: rab tu bzhad pa'i spyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-4: thugs rnam par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-5: rdul rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-7: nye bar zhi ba mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-13: dge ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-14: grags pa yid du 'ong bas bzang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-15: mthus rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-16: don dam pa rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-34: s'a la'i dbang po'i lhun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202a-40: gzhi shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-2: don yod pa'i chos la mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-7: rnam par grol ba'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-8: rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-10: tsampa ka dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-11: kha na mi tho ba mi mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-12: zla ba rnam par 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-14: sku rnam par mdzes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-15: brjod du med par 'phags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-18: dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-20: mos pa'i blo gros mnga' ba'i gzi brjid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-21: me tog kun da'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-24: chags pa mi mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-25: mi dmigs pa'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-27: ngan song rab tu 'joms pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-29: sengge rnam par sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-31: bsgribs pa med par gzigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-32: pha rol gyi tshogs 'joms pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-34: snying po mi g-yo ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:202b-36: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ri bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-0: @203a *// rjes su 'dzin pa'i zla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-3: thugs brtse ba'i blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-7: gzi brjid ma nyams pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-9: mtshan ma med pa'i shes rab dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-12: rnam par thar pa'i zla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-13: bla na med pa'i rgyal po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-19: gnyer ba'i chos kyi blo gros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-20: bla na med pa'i dpal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-22: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-23: bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-26: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho ba'i lha dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-28: de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la sogs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203a-29: smos pa 'di dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum du'ang kho mo nyid 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin @203b du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-1: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-2: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i yum du yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-3: yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sengge nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i bar gyi yum du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-4: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams kyi yum du 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na 'dzam bu'i gling yod pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-7: bskal pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-8: gdul bar byin gyis brlabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-9: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa thams cad kyi yum du'ang 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:203b-11: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lha mo sgyu ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-1: sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas rnam par brgyan pa 'di brnyes nas ji snyed cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-4: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sems kyi yul las 'das par rigs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-5: rnam par shes pas bgrang ba las yongs su 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu bskal pa dge ba'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-6: bskal pa dge ba'i 'od de la 'jig rten gyi khams ri bo shin tu mtho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-7: rin po che du ma las grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-9: ri rab dang rgya mtshor bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-10: 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud dang bcas pa sna tshogs blta na mdzes pa zhig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams ri bo shin tu mtho ba'i dpal der gling bzhi pa bye ba brgya phrag bcu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-12: gling bzhi pa bye ba brgya phrag bcu po de dag gi dbus na gling bzhi pa dbu ma sengge rgyal mtshan dam pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba zhig yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204a-13: gling bzhi pa der rgyal po'i gnas bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-0: rgyal po'i gnas bye ba brgya phrag brgyad @204b cu po de dag gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas dbu ma rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-1: der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-2: rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang ldan pa der snying po byang chub yal ga sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-3: de na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-4: snying po byang chub yal ga sna tshogs kyi 'od de la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-5: de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba la bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud kha dog bzang po'i 'od ces bya ba bdud kyi sde chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa zhig lus mi snang bar ma byas par drung du phyin par gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid chen po'i mthu de yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba zhig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:204b-7: des bdud kyi sde de bas kyang 'phags la ches mang ba'i dpung gi tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te bdud kyi sde pham par bya ba'i phyir snying po byang chub de'i 'khor kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-1: sde chen po de yang rnam par gtor bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dri ma med pa des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-3: de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu la bu'i 'du shes bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-5: bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid chen po'i mthu 'di bdag gi bur gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-6: nam 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'ang bdag nyid de'i mar gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-7: ces nas des smon lam de skad du btab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-8: snying po byang chub yal ga sna tshogs kyi 'od de nyid la gnas shing bskal pa 'od bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig phrag bcu bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-10: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-0: rigs kyi @205b bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-4: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzi brjid chen po'i mthu zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-7: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-8: bdud kyi sde chen po rnam par mthor bar byed pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-12: rigs kyi bu; de ltar kho mo de nas nye bar bzung nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag thams cad du'ang 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-15: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-16: skye gnas kyi sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud kyi tshul thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-19: skyes pa'i rabs kyi tshul thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:205b-20: lha'i dbang po'i tshe thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-0: 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i 'gro ba'i rgyud thams @206a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-2: dbang phyug gis thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-3: 'gro ba'i rgyud du snang ba thams cad gang dang gang du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad du yang kho mo nyid 'di'i yum du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-4: srid pa thams cad du 'ang kho mo nyid dang bral ba med par yum du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i sgo thams cad du skad cig skad cig cing byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-6: de dag thams cad du yang kho mo nyid 'di'i yum du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-7: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa dag gi yum du'ang kho mo gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-8: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa dag gi yum du'ang kho mo gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig gi srid pa tha ma la kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer mang po byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206a-10: kho mo'i lus dang sems rab tu snang bar mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-0: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad @206b na; kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i snying po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-2: gdul bas mi ngoms pa'i lta can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ba spu'i rtse mo las 'byung bar ston pa la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-4: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-6: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'i gnas de nyid na lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo lha dbang 'od ces bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-7: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-8: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lha mo sgyu ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-10: lha mo sgyu ma'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-11: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-12: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-13: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:206b-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang ba'i gnas gang na ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-0: lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo lha dbang 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal @207a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-1: te; lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-3: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-5: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-8: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bstan du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-14: lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-18: rnam par dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207a-20: kho mos mngon par dran pa bskal pa autpa la zhes bya ba zhig byung ba la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-0: de dag mngon par @207b ma byung ba'i tshe yang yongs su srung ba byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-2: longs spyod pa'i don du bza' shing gi ra ba gsol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-4: yum gyi sku na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-6: gshegs stabs mdun du bzhud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-7: sengge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-8: gzhon nu'i sa la bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-9: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-11: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-12: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-13: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa mdzad pa'i tshe sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-14: rnam par gdul bar mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad dam pa'i chos mthar thug par zad kyi bar du kho mos shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:207b-21: bskal pa sa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a bcu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-0: bskal pa grags pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur @208a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-1: to; ;bskal pa dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bsnyen bkur to; ;bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dzambu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-2: bskal pa 'od gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a nyi shu'i bye ma snyad cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-3: bskal pa dpal shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-4: bskal pa snying rje bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-5: bskal pa rgyal bar gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a drug cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208a-6: bskal pa zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a bdun cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-0: de ltar tshul bzhin du kho mos rtag tu rgyun ma chad par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @208b sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar ma gyur pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-1: bskal pa chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed cig dran te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-2: kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa med la rnam par dag pas brgyan pa 'di thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-3: thos nas kyang yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-4: ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin du khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-5: rnam par thar pa 'di nyid la kho mo rtag tu rgyun ma chad par rjes su zhugs par gnas gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa nye bar bzung ba nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa med la rnam par dag pas brgyan pa 'dis dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-12: rigs kyi bu; kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-13: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mun pa'i mun nag dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-16: gnyid med pa la mos shing dga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-17: snyom pa dang le lo rnam par spangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:208b-18: lus kyi 'du byed shin tu byang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:209a-0: rtag par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin @209a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:209a-1: khong du chud pas shin tu dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:209a-2: stobs bcu rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:209a-3: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-1: pa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi gzhi yang dag par 'dres pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-2: tsa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'khor lo rnam par phye ba kun nas gcod pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do; ;na zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gnas med pas gzhi thug pa med pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-3: la zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo ming dang bral te gnas med pas dri ma med pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-4: da zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sbyor ba phyir ldog pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-5: ba zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-6: da zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu 'khor lo zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-7: sha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:210b-8: ba zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun nas rnam par 'phel bar rnam par sgrub pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211a-4: ka zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sprin tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211a-8: dza zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba'i 'khor ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211b-0: sva zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs @211b rgyas thams cad dran pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211b-3: kha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyu dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211b-6: sta zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211b-7: nya zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'jig rten 'byung ba rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:211b-8: pha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'khor ba dang mi mthun pa'i 'khor lo'i ye shes dkyil 'khor ces bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212a-0: bha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gnas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dmigs @212a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212a-4: hva zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can thams cad kyi mdog la rnam par lta ba'i stobs shin tu skyes ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212a-5: yas zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad nan tan rtogs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212a-6: gha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212a-7: ta zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad smon lam gyi phyogs su mngon par 'gro ba zhes bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212b-0: spa zhes @212b bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:212b-3: tha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can gyi don bdag med pa'i dgos pa mthar phyin par zin pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba khong du chud do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:231b-10: rgyal po'i khrims kyi 'du shes dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-0: @237a *// nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
