K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-2: yang dag pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-3: de bzhin nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-4: grib ma lta bu'i ye shes dang 'du shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-5: rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par dpyod pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-6: gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten dang 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dmigs pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-7: rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-8: 'byung ba dang 'jig pa mi skye ba dang mnyam pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-9: rkyen dang rten pa'i rgyud dngos pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis las ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i rnam par smin pa la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-11: rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i 'bras bu la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-13: bsags pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i bya ba thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237a-15: dad pa las yongs su byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-0: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i sangs rgyas mchod pa'i sprul pa @237b thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-2: rim gro las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las yongs su 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-6: shes rab dang thabs las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan yid kyi rang bzhin du sgrub pa thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-8: smon lam las yongs su byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-10: bsngo ba las yongs su byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-11: chos kyi dbyings thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul du gyur pa rnam par sgrub pas rgyas par dgang pa'i rgyan la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-13: yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes tshad med pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-14: skye ba med pa'i ye shes rtog pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-15: yang dag pa'i spyod pa la 'jug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-16: rgyu nye bar gsog pa'i ye shes rgyu dang bya ba'i lta ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-17: phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes phyin ci log gi lta ba dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-18: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes dbang phyug tu lta ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:237b-19: rten pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes bdag dang phyi rol gyi 'du shes kyi lta ba dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-0: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes mthar 'dzin pa'i @238a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-1: lta ba dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-2: gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon par grub pa'i ye shes 'pho ba'i lta ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-3: mi skye mi 'gag pa'i ye shes skye ba dang 'jig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-4: stong pa nyid kyis mi skye ba'i ye shes lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-5: smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dbang phyug med pa'i chos nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-6: mtshan ma med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang ldan pa'i ye shes mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas sa bon las myu gu chud mi za ba'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-7: rgya las rgya'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-8: gzugs las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-9: sgra brnyan dang sgrar mnyam pa rnam par dmigs pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-10: rnam par dpyod pa dang rmi lam du mnyam par rnam par dmigs pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-11: sems gzugs med pas 'jig rten yongs su bskyed pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-12: rkyen dang rgyu ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-13: las ji ltar bsags pa dang mnyam par rnam par sbyin pa 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238a-14: thabs mkhas pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-0: chos dang chos ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par brlan pa'i chos nyid @238b dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-1: ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa de lta bus mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'du shes dang yid la bya bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-2: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo nas rnam pa de lta bur btud de phyag 'tshal nas yun ring mo zhig lon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-4: lus dang sems shin tu sim par gyur pa de khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas nas langs te yud tsam zhig tu khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po de la mig mi 'gengs pas bltas nas thal mo sbyar te lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas de lta bu'i 'du shes dang yid la bya bas bskul ba'i sems dang ldan pas tshig tu brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-8: smon pa med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-10: chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-11: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-12: sems can gyi khams mi dmigs pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:238b-13: chos thams cad gnas med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-1: thams cad gnas med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas gnas med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-3: gnas thams cad rnam par bsgoms pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-4: brten pa thams cad la mi rten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-5: lus thams cad la mi rten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-6: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad bsal ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-8: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-11: yongs su rtog pa thams cad du rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa; 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-13: yid thams cad kyis rnam par dben pa'i gnas la spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-14: lam thams cad blang ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-15: dor ba med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-16: sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i thabs kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239a-17: nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-0: nga rgyal thams cad spangs pa'i shes rab shas che @239b ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-6: rigs pa skyed pa thams cad la rnam par rol pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul sgom pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na nye bar gnas pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-11: gang de dag bskal pa gcig la bskal pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-12: bskal pa thams cad la bskal pa gcig tu 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-13: gang de dag zhing gcig dang zhing thams cad du zhing thams cad dang zhing gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-14: gang de dag chos gcig dang chos thams cad du chos thams cad dang chos gcig tu mi 'gal ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-15: gang de dag sems can gcig dang sems can thams cad du sems can thams cad dang sems can gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:239b-16: gang de dag sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang sangs rgyas gcig tu mi gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-0: @240a *// gang de dag dus thams cad la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-1: gang de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-2: gang de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-3: gang de dag 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-4: gang de dag thob par bya ba thams cad rang la rag las pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa de dag gi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-6: gang de dag 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad las gyen du 'phags kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas na snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-7: gang de dag zhing thams cad la mi gnas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad du rjes su spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-8: gang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhing thams cad du rjes su spyod kyang gnas nas g-yo ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240a-9: gang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-0: @240b gang de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang 'gro ba thams cad na de'i ye shes la mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-1: gang de dag bdud kyi gnas thams cad na spyod kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-2: gang de dag 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i yid dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-3: gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan yang bdag dang sems can du gnyis su bya bar mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-4: gang de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khong du chud pa'i lus dang ldan yang chos kyi dbyings tha dad du bya ba'i gnas la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-5: gang de dag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan yang bskal pa ring pa dang thung ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-6: gang de dag skra'i rtse mo gcig nas mi g-yo yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba de lta bur sgrub dka' ba'i chos kyi phyogs la 'jug par rnam par spyod pa de dag gi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-8: zab mo'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:240b-9: mi gnyis pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-0: mtshan nyid med pa'i gnas la @241a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-2: gnyen po med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-3: mi dmigs pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-4: spros pa med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-5: byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chud par dka' ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-7: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-8: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas dang mthun pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-11: gang de mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med par mi 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-12: gang de dag chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang mi skye ba'i chos nyid du mi ltung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-13: gang de dag mi sdug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid mngon du mi byed do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241a-14: 'dod chags kyi chos dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-0: gang de dag byams pa'i gnas la @241b rnam par spyod kyang zhe sdang gi dri ma'i rjes su stong ba'i sems med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-1: gang de dag rten cing 'brel pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang chos thams cad la shin tu rmongs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-2: gang de dag bsam gtan bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-3: gang de dag tshad med pa bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gzugs kyi khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-4: gang de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pas gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-5: gang de dag zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag gis rig pa'i rnam par grol ba mngon du mi byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-6: gang de dag btang snyoms chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-7: gang de dag stong pa nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod kyang lta ba'i rnam pa la mi gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:241b-8: gang de dag mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnam par gdul ba la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-1: dag smon lam thams cad dang bral ba yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-2: gang de dag las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du las dang nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-3: gang de dag shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su shes kyang tshe'i shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-4: gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par log kyang sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'gro ba thams cad du 'dong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-5: gang de dag byams pa la rnam par spyod kyang gang la yang chags par rnam par spyod pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-6: gang de dag snying rje la rnam par spyod kyang gang la yang chags par lta bas rnam par spyod pa ma yin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-7: gang de dag dga' ba la rnam par spyod kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba la rnam par lta bas rtag tu mi dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-8: gang de dag btang snyoms la rnam par spyod kyang gzhan gyi don la rtag tu 'bad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242a-9: gang de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rnam par spyod kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba la mi smod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-0: gang de dag skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par rnam par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ba @242b la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-1: gang de dag rnam par thar pa gsum la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi rnam par thar pa thob par bya ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-2: gang de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par blta ba la rnam par spyod kyang 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-3: gang de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo brtag pa la rnam par spyod kyang shin tu 'gog par ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-4: gang de dag 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad sgom pa la rnam par spyod kyang shin tu 'byung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-5: gang de dag so so'i skye bo'i sa las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-7: gang de dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yongs su shes pa la rnam par spyod kyang phung po shin tu 'gog par ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-8: gang de dag bdud kyi lam bzhi las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang bdud du rtog pa la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-9: gang de dag skye mched drug las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang shin tu mngon par grub pa la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:242b-10: gang de dag de bzhin nyid la rnam par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mthar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-0: gang de dag theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba yongs su @243a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-1: ston pa la rnam par spyod kyang theg pa chen po las nyams pa la rnam par mi spyod pa de dag de lta bur yon tan gyi gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-3: 'di la thugs rje chen po brnyes pas rnam dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-4: byams pa shes gnyen dpal chen 'jig rten phan brtson pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-5: dbang bskur sa gnas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-6: sangs rgyas yul la rjes su dgongs shing rnam par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-7: rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po mnga' ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-8: ye shes chen po'i spyod yul rnam thar bzhugs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-9: gang rnams chos dbyings kun tu thogs med rnam rgyu ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-10: dpe zla med pa de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-11: dul sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'phags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-12: bsam gtan mngon shes stobs kyi mthar phyin shes rtogs pas; ;shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs la gnas pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-13: theg chen pha rol phyin pa rnams kyi gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-14: 'di ni chags med blo gros bsam pa rgya chen te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-15: nam mkha'i spyod yul ldan pa mi gnas mi rten pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243a-16: dus gsum thams cad rgyas 'gengs bsgribs pa med pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-0: srid kun dngos po rnam par bsgoms pa rnams @243b kyi gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-1: gang rnams chos kun mi skye'i tshul la zhugs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-2: chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dngos nyid rtogs mdzad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-3: ci la'ang gnas pa mi mdzad nam mkha'i bya bzhin te; ;mkhyen pas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-4: gang rnams 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin dngos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-5: rtog pa'i rgyus bskyed phyin ci log las byung mkhyen nas; ;'dod chags bral ba'ang rnam par rtog par mi mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-6: zhi dang nye bar zhi ldan de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-7: gang rnams rnam par thar dang bden tshul 'phags lam dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-8: phung po de bzhin khams dang skye mched rten pa'i dngos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-9: yongs su rtogs mdzad mkhas pa zhi bar mi ltung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-10: shes rab thabs la mkhas pa de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-11: gang rnams sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs bzhugs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-12: rgyal ba'i zhing la yongs rtog rnam rtog kun zhi la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-13: chos rnams dngos po'i rang bzhin med par rtogs mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-14: zhi bar gzhol ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-15: gang rnams chags med spyod pas chos dbyings 'di dag tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-16: dngos dang bral bar rnam spyod mkha' yi rlung 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-17: dngos po kun dang bral zhing dngos med rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-18: mi gnas blo mnga' de dag gnas ni 'di yang 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:243b-19: gang rnams ngan song rgyud du 'gro ba song gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-0: sdug bsngal nad pa mi bde nyams su myong @244a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-2: byams pa'i 'od kyis ngan song thams cad zhi mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-3: byams dang thugs rje'i thugs mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-4: nyam nga'i 'khor na gnas shing 'phags lam gol gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-5: 'gron po dmus long dmigs dang bral bar gyur 'dra ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-6: 'jig rten gzigs shing bar lam rab la 'god mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-7: 'gron po'i bsel rab 'dra ba de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-8: gang rnams skye dang mya ngan rga shi dbang gyur pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-9: 'gro ba bdud kyi zhags pas yongs su bcings gzigs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-10: rnam par bkrol nas mi 'jigs phyogs bder 'don mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-11: dpa' bo de dag thub par dka' ba'i gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-12: nyon mongs nad pa'i 'gro mang gang gis gzigs gyur cing; ;ye shes bdud rtsi sman chen yongs su bsdu mdzad nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-13: thugs rje chen po bskyed cing yongs su 'grol mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-14: sman pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dra ba'i gnas 'di yin; ;gang gis 'gro mang sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-15: nyon mongs gtos su lhung ste tsham gyi mtshor lhung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-16: gzigs shing dge ba'i chos kyi gru chen yongs sbyar te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-17: sgrol mdzad mnyan pa'i bu 'dra de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244a-18: gang gis nyon mongs rgya mtsho spyod pa'i 'gro gzigs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-0: thams cad mkhyen thugs rin chen @244b dgongs dag sems can mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-1: srid pa'i rgya mtshor gshegs shing mngon par 'dren mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-2: mnyan pa'i bu ltar spyod pa de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-3: smon lam gnas na bzhugs shing thugs rje byams spyan gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-4: gang rnams sems can gnas su rnam par gzigs mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-5: srid pa'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i 'gro mang mngon 'don pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-6: mkha' lding gzhon 'dra de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-7: gang rnams chos dbyings mkha' la nyi zla 'dra tshul du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-8: sems can gnas su 'od kyis khyab par rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-9: smon lam dkyil 'khor ye shes dri med bzang po'i 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-10: 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-11: gang rnams sems can gcig ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-12: phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba zad du brtan gnas la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-13: sems can gcig la ji bzhin de bzhin 'gro ba kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-14: 'jig rten mgon du gyur pa de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-15: gang rnams 'byams klas zhing gcig mtha' yi bskal par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-16: 'gro don brtson 'grus skyo med spyod pa rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-17: zhing gcig ji bzhin de bzhin phyogs rnams kun tu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-18: bsam pa rdo rje bzhin brtan de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:244b-19: gang rnams phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rnams kyi chos sprin la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-0: stan gcig gnas bzhin rmongs pa med pa 'thung byed @245a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-2: phyi mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig bgrangs par mi ngoms sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-3: blo chen rgya mtsho lta bu'i gnas ni 'di 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-4: gang rnams zhing mang rgya mtsho brjod du med 'dod zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-5: mgon po'i 'khor rnams rgya mtshor yongs su 'jug byed la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-6: rgyal ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rab byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-7: chags med spyod yul mnga' ba de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-8: brtan pa grangs rnams smon lam rgya mtshor 'jug byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-9: spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med zhugs gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-10: 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa rgya mtsho mang spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-11: yon tan 'byung gnas de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-12: gang rnams skra rtsa gcig tu zhing rnams thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-14: 'dzud cing de yi tshul la 'jug kyang rmongs med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-15: chags pa med pa'i mig can rnams kyi gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-16: gang rnams sems kyi skad cig gcig la rgya mtsho yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-17: bskal pa 'dzud byed zhing dang sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-18: de bzhin 'dzud byed bsgribs med ye shes dran gnas pa; ;yon tan mthar phyin de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245a-19: gang rnams zhing mang thams cad rdul du bgrangs byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-0: chu ba ma lus thams cad thigs pas tshad bzung @245b ste; ;de snyed grangs su smon lam mngon par sgrub byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-1: chags med bgrang ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-2: smon lam gzungs dang ting 'dzin sgo la 'jug bya ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-3: bsam gtan rnam thar smon lam sgo rnams de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-4: bskal pa mtha' yas mngon par sgrub cing rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-5: bde gshegs sras po dgongs ldan de dag 'dir 'dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-6: 'di na gnas pa rgyal sras rnam pa sna tshogs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-7: tshig dang don ldan gtsug lag mang po mngon par sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-8: 'gro la bder 'gyur bzo yi gnas su bya ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-9: rjes su bsam shing dam pa'i gnas na rnam par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-10: 'di na gnas pa mngon shes thabs dang ye shes kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-11: phyogs bcu'i sems can 'gro rgyud sna tshogs ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-12: kun tu skye zhing 'chi ba'i khyad par rnam par ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-13: rnam thar sgyu ma'i tshul gnas chags med spyod dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-14: 'di na gnas pa thog mar sems bskyed nyer bzung zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-15: chos bzang mthar thug chos kyi spyod pa yongs su ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-16: sprul pa'i sprin gyis chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-17: de bzhin rnam 'phrul brgya mang kun kyang nye bar ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-18: gang rnams sems kyi cha gcig byang chub rnam sangs rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-19: ye shes blo gros mtha' dang dbus med la 'jug pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:245b-20: thos te rnam par bsam na 'jig rten rmongs su rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-2: 'di ni chags med blo gros rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-3: chos dbyings bsgribs pa med pa rnam par spyod byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-4: dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-5: dri med bsam pa'i blo gros gnas yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-6: gang rnams chags pa med spyod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-7: zhing rnams kun tu gnas pa med par rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-8: mi gnyis shes la spyod pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-9: mnyam pa med pa de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-10: gang rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-11: mnyam pa'i chos rnams gnas med zhi ba rtogs gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-12: gang rnams mkha' yul rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-13: rdul dang bral ba de dag gnas 'di yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-14: 'di ni snying rje'i sems ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-15: gnas shing 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-16: 'jig rten phan par bsam brtson te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-17: snying rje chen po brnyes pa rnam par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-18: 'di nas mi snang med gsal bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-19: sems can kun gyi gnas su thogs pa med par snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-20: nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-21: 'khor ba'i zhags pa kun las rnam par grol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-22: rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-23: rgyal ba rnams kyi zhabs drung thams cad kun na yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-24: zhing rnams kun tu rab tu snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246a-25: mtha' yas bskal pa rnams kyang zad par mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-0: rgyal @246b sras kun gyi lus dang grangs mang mnyam pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-1: sprul pa'i sprin gyis phyogs kyi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-2: ma lus thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-3: 'di na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-4: rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad yongs su 'jal byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-5: bskal pa bye bar rnam spyod kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-6: yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba'i dus med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-8: brjod du med pa skad cig re rer rtogs byas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-10: sangs rgyas yul rnams rnam par ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-11: 'dir ni skad cig brjod med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-12: bskal pa zhing rnams sangs rgyas mtshan la rab zhugs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-13: shin tu yangs pa'i blo ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-14: bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar yang 'byin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-15: 'di na gnas shing tshad med pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-16: bskal par sems rgyud gcig gis rab tu 'jig pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-17: yongs rtog 'du shes med bral yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-18: 'gro ba'i 'du shes dbang du ston pa byed; ;de dag ting 'dzin 'di gnas su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-19: zhugs kyang dus gsum thams cad gsal bar mngon du mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-20: skad gcig yud la gnas brten cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-21: rnam thar gnas la rnam par spyod pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-22: de dag rnam spyod gnas 'di na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-23: ma g-yos lus kyis skyil mo krung du 'khod bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:246b-24: zhing rnams thams cad kun tu yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-1: cad khyab par gcig car yongs su snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-2: khyu mchog de dag 'di na gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-3: bde gshegs rnams las chos kyi rgya mtsho yang dag 'thung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-4: ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-5: mi zad yon tan rnams kyi pha rol phyin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-6: 'di na zhing rnams kun grangs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-7: bskal pa'i grangs dang de bzhin chos kyi grangs rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-8: rgyal ba kun gyi mtshan gyi grangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-9: sgrib med sems pa rnam par dgongs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-10: rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-11: dus gsum zhing mang bgrangs pa thams cad ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-12: de dag skad cig gcig gis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:247a-13: yongs su 'byung dang 'jig pa rnam par 'byed //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:254b-10: mthong la mthong zhing da dung mthong bar 'gyur //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-2: khyod kyis de dag ma lus mthun rtogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-3: khyod kyis thob pa chen po ci 'dra ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-5: de 'dra srid pa brgyar yang dkon pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-6: de phyir rgyal sras de dag rgyun 'brel ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-7: khyod la rnam thar tshul rnams yongs su ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-8: bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar 'gro ba gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-9: bde gshegs sras dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-10: de dag de rnams spyod yul mi shes te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-11: de dag yon tan snod du bdag ma byas; ;khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i tshul 'di thos par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-13: 'gro ba kun na dkon pa khyod kyis mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-14: de ltar nor bzang dga' ba'i yid du gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-15: khyod la sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-16: byang chub sems dpa' khyod gzung phyir yang gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-17: khyod kyang de dag rjes su bstan la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-18: legs so nor bzang khyod kyi 'tsho ba dge /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi chos la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-20: khyod ni rgyal sras yon tan rnams la slob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-21: bde bar gshegs rigs rnam par 'phel byed 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-22: nor bzang dga' ba rgya chen nyams su longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-23: sangs rgyas mnyam med thams cad khyod kyi pha //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:255b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khyod dang spun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-1: yan lag thams cad khyod gyi gnyen //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-2: khyod ni bde gshegs thugs las skyes pa'i sras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-3: chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud 'dzin pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-5: ring por mi thogs chos rgyal 'thob 'gyur gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-6: nor bzang dbang po tshim zhing dga' bar gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dam pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-8: ring por mi thogs rmad byung thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-9: rgyal ba'i sras dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-10: khyod kyi spyod pa'i tshul mthun de 'dra'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-11: mi gang ci 'dra'i sa bon 'debs byed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-13: dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas nyams su longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-14: ngas ni de ring khyod kyi dbugs kyang dbyung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-15: tshe gcig khyod kyis gang rnams thog gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-16: byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-17: bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub spyod spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-18: de dag gis kyang phun sum 'di ma rnyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-19: 'di rnams thams cad mos pa'i 'bras bu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-20: brtson 'grus bsam pa dag ni de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-21: gang zhig spyod pa 'di 'drar dga' ba yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-22: nor bzang spyod pa gang yin de la spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-23: spyod pa thams cad smon lam byung ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256a-24: chos rnams thams cad mos las yongs su gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-0: nor bzang de @256b ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsgrubs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-1: rtag tu khyad par spyod pa btsal bar gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-2: klu yi bsam pa ji snyed byung gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-3: de snyed char pa yongs su 'bab par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-4: smon lam ye shes spyod yul ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-5: de snyed byang chub spyod pa rgyas par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-6: nor bzang bzang po'i spyod ces bya ba 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-7: tshul 'di khyod la bstan pa 'di yin gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-8: de shes gyis la dge bshes rang bzhin gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-9: bsnyen bkur byed tshe 'jigs par ma byed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-10: lus rnams bye ba sngon chad khyod kyis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-11: 'dod pa'i don du don med zad byas soms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-12: da ni byang chub yongs su tshol gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-13: brtul zhugs bzang po brtul bas zhig ko 'dod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-14: khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba 'das byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-15: 'du byas sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-16: gangg'a'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mnyes ma byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-17: 'di 'dra'i tshul yang thos par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-18: de las da ni khom par mir yang skyes; ;sangs rgyas byung mthong dge bshes 'di 'dra ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-19: byang chub mchog gi spyod pa'ang thos par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-20: rnam dag sems su de ko cir mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-21: bde bar gshegs pa yang du 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-22: dge bshes de bzhin chos mnyan thos par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:256b-23: gal te bsam pa yongs su ma sbyangs na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-2: de bas dad dang mos dang bsam pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-3: yongs su skyed la bla ma phu dud kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-4: the tshom lta ba yongs su skyo spongs la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-5: yang dang yang du 'di 'dra'i tshul nyon cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-7: thos nas de 'dra'i smon lam mngon bsgrubs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-8: de dag ni [?] yi srid par legs par 'ongs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-9: gang gis de 'dra'i mos pa sbyangs pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-10: de la dge bshes thams cad mi dkon no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-11: de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sras dang spun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-12: de la phyin chad byang chub the tshom med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-13: gang zhig 'di 'dra'i tshul 'dir zhugs gyur ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-14: des ni log par ltung ba thams cad spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-15: des ni sdug bsngal chos rnams thams cad bsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-16: des ni yon tan thams cad bsdu bar byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-17: lus ni bor nas ring por mi thogs su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-18: yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'jug par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-20: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-21: nor bzang khyod kyi sngon gyi rgyu sdug pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-22: da ltar byung la mos pa nges pa yis; ;khyad par don gnyer dge bshes bsten byas pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-23: chu las autpa la bzhin de phyir 'phel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257a-24: dge bshes thams cad phu dud bsam pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-0: sangs rgyas @257b thams cad dgyes bya'i bsam pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-1: chos kun yongs su dri ba'i bsam pa can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-2: brtul zhugs bzang po ldan pa dal gyis longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-3: chos kyi nan tan kun la rab gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-4: lam rnams rjes su kun tshol rab gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-5: sangs rgyas sras kyi smon lam rab gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-6: yon tan chos rnams kun gyi snod khyod longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-7: mos pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra bas; ;khyod kyis nga la phyag 'di byas pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du mngon sum du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-9: ring por mi thogs yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-10: skyo ba'i yid med nor bzang legs pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam sems ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-12: brtul zhugs brtan khyod ring por mi thogs par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mthar phyin 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-14: ye shes spyod yul rnam thar mthar phyin pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-15: 'jam dpal gan du nor bzang khyod song ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-16: bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa mchog dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-17: de tshul khyod 'jug de ni byed par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-18: de ltar byams pa chags med spyod yul gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-19: nor bzang yang dag legs pas 'phags mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-20: 'khor rnams kun la mngon par bstan byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-21: de yi yon tan legs mdzod 'di brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-22: 'di 'dra'i rjes su bstan pa dam pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-23: gdams ngag de 'dra nor bzang thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:257b-24: dga' ba'i shugs kyis dbang po mngon brlan pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-1: mang rab tu des kyang blags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-2: dga' ba'i nyams chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-3: dbang po tshim nas shugs kyis dbugs kyang phyung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-4: nor bzang langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-5: byams pa de la bskor ba rab tu byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-6: de yi lag tu 'jam dpal sems dbang gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-7: me tog phreng ba rin chen mdzes pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i smon pas mngon thon pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-9: yid du 'ong ba mang po byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-10: nor bzang de tshe rab tu dga' gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-11: dga' bar de dag khyams pa de la gtor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-12: de tshe de yi mgo la kun nas byugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-13: byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-14: rgyal ba'i sras po nor bzang legs so legs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-15: de ltar khyod ni yongs su mi skyo bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-16: nga dang 'jam dpal ci 'dra ci bzhin du; ;yon tan snod du khyod ni myur te 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-17: thos nas nor bzang dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-18: 'di 'dra'i dge bshes bdag dang phrad pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-19: srid pa brgya phrag bgrangs par shin tu dkon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-20: bdag gis de ring 'dir phyin shin tu legs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-21: yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-22: 'jam dpal khyod kyi byin rlabs bzang po yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-23: bdag gis bshes gnyen 'di dag dkon pa rnyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-24: khyod dang bdag tu myur du 'grogs par 'gyur ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258a-25: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-0: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes @258b bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-1: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-2: bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mdud du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-5: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-6: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-7: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku tshe gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-10: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa rab tu zhugs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-19: bzod pa'i sgo thams cad du zhugs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:258b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thams cad la rnam par @259a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-3: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su sgrub pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa lags; de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-6: gzungs dang spobs pa snang ba'i tshul thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la mnga' thob pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-9: des ni; byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bsags pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-11: shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i tshul la rnam par rol pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-13: mngon par shes pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-15: ye shes snang ba'i tshul bskyed pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-17: bslab pa thams cad la byung ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-21: smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa rab tu blangs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-25: theg pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i sgo la mkhas pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blangs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su bzung ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung ba @259b lags; des ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-5: nyon mongs pa'i dpung thams cad rnam par dkrug pa la shin tu dpa' ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-7: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par lus pa rnams kyi lam ston pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-9: nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi sman par gyur pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-11: sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-13: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbang po lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-15: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi thu bo lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-17: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo lags; de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-18: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la rgyu ba rnams kyi skya ba 'dzin pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-20: sems can gdul ba'i thabs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bshal ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-22: 'gro ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi dbang po rnam par gzigs pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-24: sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-26: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:259b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la yang dag par 'gro bar brtson pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-1: cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-5: 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-7: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-9: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-11: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la sgrib pa med pa brnyes pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par brtson pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-19: dbang bskur ba'i thabs thob pa lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-21: chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-23: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-24: de ni; sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu byung ba lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthar phyin pa lags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-28: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260a-29: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-0: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas nan tan du @260b bgyis na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-2: sems can gyi khams ji ltar gnyer ba'i tshul bzhin du rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-3: yi dam ji ltar bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du mthar phyin par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po brtsams pa grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-5: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-10: dge 'dun slu bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-11: sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs stong par mi 'byin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad la bltas te tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la nye bar bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-16: tshong dpon gyi bu 'di 'di ltar nga la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-17: yon tan yongs su sgrub pa 'dri ba la ltos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-20: brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-21: don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:260b-22: mos pa'i yi dam 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-0: lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'di lta bu dang @261a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-1: brtson 'grus mi ldog pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mi ngoms pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-3: khyad par yongs su btsal ba 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-4: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba lta bur spyod pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'dod pa 'di lta bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dri ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas btang nas grong khyer dpal gyi 'byung gnas nye bar bzung ba nas lho phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad du rgyus te dge ba'i bshes gnyen brgya rtsa bcu la yongs su dri ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-9: tha ma nga'i drung 'di'i bar du skyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-11: rnam pa 'di lta bur theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa; yi dam chen po la yang dag par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-12: bsam pa chen po la rab tu rtul ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-13: snying rje chen po'i go bgos pa'i ngad dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-14: byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261a-15: brtson 'grus chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-0: sems can gyi lam grogs mang @261b pos yongs su bskyang ba la mngon par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-1: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las sems can bsgral ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam chen po la zhugs pa; chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-3: chos chen po dang bsod nams rin po che yongs su bsdu ba la rab tu rtul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-4: chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po'i tshogs bsags pa la brtson pa rnams kyi ming thos pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-8: spyod pa dang skal ba mnyam pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-13: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du byung ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-14: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-15: ngan song thams cad yang dag par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-16: mi khom pa'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-17: lam nyam nga ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-18: mi shes pa'i mun pa nag po thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-19: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-20: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-21: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:261b-22: gnas kyi rten thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-1: gzhi thams cad las bskul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-2: 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du mi gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-3: 'dod pa'i 'dam nas yang dag par gdon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-4: dga' ba'i 'dod chags spang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-5: lta ba'i bcings pa gtub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-6: 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-7: 'du shes kyi zhags pa yang dag pa gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-8: phyin ci log gi lam nas rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-9: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-10: bag la nyal ba'i zug rdu yang dag par dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-11: sgrib pa'i sgo glegs gzhom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-12: sgrib pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-13: srid pa'i dra ba nas gdon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-14: ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-15: sred pa'i chu bo las bsgral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-16: g-yo dang sgyu spang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-17: sems kyi rnyog pa dang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-21: mi shes pa'i chu po chen po las bsgral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-22: 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad rnam par smad pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262a-25: sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-0: lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams kyi chos kyi rkang stegs chen po dgod par 'dod @262b pa'o; ;gti mug gi mun par 'thoms pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba dbyung bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-1: 'khor ba'i mya ngan du 'khyams pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam bstan par 'dod pa'o; ;nyon mongs pa'i nad chen pos gzir ba rnams la chos kyi sman sbyin par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-4: 'chi bas gtses pa rnams la 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings sbyin par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-5: me gsum rab tu 'bar ba rnams la zhi gnas kyi chus rab tu zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-9: 'khrug pas gdungs pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-10: srid pa'i btson ras 'khor ba rnams la ye shes kyi mtshon cha sbyin par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-11: lta ba'i bcings pas glags pa rnams la shes rab kyi mtshon chas bstud par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-12: khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyis 'khor ba rnams la thar pa'i sgo bstan par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-13: phyogs mi bde bar mngon par gzhol ba rnams la bde ba'i phyogs bstan par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:262b-14: nyon mongs pa'i chom pos gtses pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o; ;ngan song gi g-yang sas 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la 'ju sa'i lag pa brkyang bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-0: phung po'i gshed mas gtses pa rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i @263a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-2: khams kyi sprul gyis kun nas 'khor ba rnams la 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'byung ba bstan par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-3: skye mched kyi grong stong pa na gnas pa rnams shes rab kyi snang bas gdon par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-4: mu stegs ngan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mu stegs su gzud par 'dod pa'o; ;bshes gnyen ma yin pa'i lag tu lhung ba rnams la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-5: byis pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa rnams 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-6: 'khor ba'i khyim la mngon par dga' ba rnams gyen du bskyod de thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par 'dod pa'o; ;rigs kyi bu dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-7: de ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-8: sems can yongs su skyob pa'i blo gros de lta bus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su btsal ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-9: theg pa chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-10: chos kyi sprin thams cad la 'thung bas mi ngoms pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-11: tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263a-12: chos kyi sgo thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir mi gtong ba la brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa @263b thams cad spyad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-1: smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong bar bya bas mi ngoms pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas lus la dub par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-5: rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-7: sems can gyi 'jig rten na sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de lta bu'i sems can dkon no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-8: de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sdud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-9: mos pa drag po 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-10: don du gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-11: nyon mongs pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:263b-12: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba ltar spyod pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngag dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-1: pas nan tan du byed pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-2: mthun par len pa 'di lta bus byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-4: bkur sti dang rnyed pa don du mi gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i khams dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-10: dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med par yongs su btang ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i grogs yongs su tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-12: srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba 'di lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos par byed pa de lta bu'i sems can ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-15: 'dis ji ltar cher skyes pa 'di gcig la ji snyed cig thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-16: khong du chud pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-17: byang chub sems dpa' de ma yin pa gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-18: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-20: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264a-22: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-0: @264b chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-2: spyod pa'i dra ba rgya cher bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-3: smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-4: bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-7: yongs su dag par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-8: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la yang dag par 'byung ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-10: legs pa yang dag par yongs su brjod pa byas nas de la brten te srog chags brgya phrag stong gi byang chub kyi yan lag gi bsam pa brtan par byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-12: de ltar khyod kyi 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:264b-13: bde ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-0: khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar sems bskyed @265a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-1: pa ni; khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-2: khyod kyis mi'i lus legs par thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-3: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du khyod legs par 'tshos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-4: khyod kyis sangs rgyas byung ba dgyes par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-5: khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal legs par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-6: khyod kyis bsam pa'i rgyud snod bzang por gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-8: dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par brlan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-10: dkar po'i chos kyis legs par brtan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-11: khyod kyis mos pa rlabs chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-12: dge ba'i bsam pa legs par shin tu sbyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-13: khyod ni; sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par dgongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-19: byang chub kyi sems ni; sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-20: 'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-21: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu rten pas sa lta bu'o; ;nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-22: 'jig rten thams cad la rten pa med pas rlung lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-23: lta ba'i nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu sreg pas me lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-24: sems can thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265a-25: chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-0: chos @265b kyi snang ba byed pas sgron ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-1: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas mig lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o; ;mu stegs ngan pa rnam par spong bas mu stegs lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par gnas pas bzhon pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sgor 'jug par byed pas sgo lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-6: chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pas bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-7: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas gnas lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-8: 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa skyed pas rten lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa thams cad spyod par byed pas gzhi lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-12: thams cad las yongs su skyong bas ma ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-13: slob pa dang mi slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-14: smon lam thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pas dbang po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-15: yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'du bas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:265b-16: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas ri chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-2: ye shes kyi sman rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gangs kyi ri lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-3: yon tan gyi spos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur bas spos kyi ngad ldang ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-4: yon tan rgya che bas nam mkha' lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-5: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas padma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-6: sems dul zhing cang shes pas glang po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-7: rgod pa thams cad dang bral bas rta cang shes lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-8: theg pa chen po yongs su skyong ba'i sngon du 'gro bas kha lo sgyur ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-9: nyon mongs pa'i nad sos par byed pas sman lta bu'o; ;mi dge ba'i chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa'i 'og lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-10: chos thams cad nges par khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-11: yon tan gyi dri zhim par byed pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyi blta na mngon par dga' bas me tog dam pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-13: 'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsil bar byed pas kha ba'i tsandan lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-14: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas aa ga ru nag po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-15: nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pas sman gyi rgyal po blta na sdug pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-16: bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu thams cad yang dag par 'byin pas 'bral bar byed pa'i sman lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266a-17: dbang po thams cad la dbang sgyur bas dbang po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-0: dbul ba thams cad yongs su sel bas @266b ngal ba so po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-1: yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pas dpal lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdzes par byed pas lhab lhub lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-3: nyes byas thams cad sreg pas bskal pa 'tshig pa'i me lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pas rtsa ba ma grugs pa'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-5: nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad rnam par sel bas klu'i rin po che lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-6: rnyog pa thams cad sel bas nor bu rin po che chu 'dang lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-7: don thams cad yongs su grub pas yid bzhin rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-8: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-9: yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas 'dod sbyin gyi shing lta bu'o; ;'khor ba'i skyon thams cad dang ma 'dres pas gos dang ris can lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-10: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas shing bal gyi rgyud lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-11: sems can gyi bsam pa'i zhing rnam par spyod pas gshol bu lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-12: 'jig tshogs kyi go cha brtol bas mde'u thung lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-13: sdug bsngal gyi 'ben nges par 'bigs pas mda' lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-14: nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal bar byed pas mdung lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-15: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gebs pas go cha lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:266b-16: nyon mongs pa'i klad pa 'gems pas ral gri lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-1: pa dang rlom pa'i go cha 'dral bas ral gri'i so lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-2: bag la nyal gyi go cha gshog pas mda' ste'u kha lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-3: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan snyol bas dpa' bo'i ru mtshon lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-4: mi shes pa'i shing sgyel bar byed pas lag cha lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-5: sdug bsngal gyi shing rab tu gcod pas sta re lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-6: gnod pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pas mtshon cha lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus yongs su srung bas lag pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-8: yon tan thams cad la so sor 'god pas rkang pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-9: ma rig pa'i dri'i ling tog yongs su sel bas mig mkhan lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-10: 'jig tshogs kyi zug rngu yang dag par 'byin pas skam pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-11: bag la nyal gyi tsher ma 'byin pas tsher zungs lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-12: 'khor ba'i bcing pa las yongs su 'grel bas mdza' bo lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-13: gnod pa thams cad sel bas nor bu lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i lam mngon par shes par byed pas gtsug lag lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-15: bsod nams mi zad pas gter lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-16: ye shes mi zad pas chu mig lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-17: chos thams cad kyi gdong gi gzugs brnyan ston pas me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-18: 'go ba med pas me tog punda r'i ka lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rgyun du 'bab pas chu klung chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-0: @267b chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas klu'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pas 'tsho ba'i dbang po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-2: 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su phyin par byed pas bdud rtsi lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-3: 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sdud cing 'dren pas kun nas 'khor ba'i snying lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-4: 'khor ba'i chu la rgyu ba mngon par 'don pas mchil ba lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-5: yon tan thams cad kyi dri zhim po 'dzin pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-6: shin tu nad med par byed pas dug sman lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-7: 'dod pas dga' ba'i dug med par byed pas dug gi gnyen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-8: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i dug thams cad 'byang bar byed pas sngags dang gzungs lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-9: sgrib pa dang bar chad kyi rtsva thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-10: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i gling lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-11: chos dkar po thams cad 'byung bas rigs lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-12: yon tan gyi chos thams cad skye ba'i sgor gyur pas 'byung gnas lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:267b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i tshong pa thams cad kyis spyod pas tshong dus lta bu'o; ;las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang dri ma thams cad yongs su sbyong bas chu'i khams lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sbrang @268a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-3: chos dkar po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas snod lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-4: nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad mi snang bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad ston pas gnas lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-6: nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba dang mi 'dra bas rdo ba khab len lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-7: rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pas bee d'urya lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-8: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-9: 'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad zil du brlag pa dang zil gyis non par byed pas aindra n'i la lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-10: nyon mongs pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pas mtho ris kyi rnga lta bu'o; ;rnyog pa med pas chu dvangs pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-11: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zil du rlag par byed pas dzambu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lta bu'o; ;'jig rten gsum las mngon par 'phags pas ri'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-12: skyabs tshol ba yongs su mi gtong bas skyabs lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-13: don ma yin pa 'joms pas don lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-14: snying dga' bar byed pas dbyig lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268a-15: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas mchod sbyin gyi yo byad lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-0: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi gtso @268b bo dang thu bor gyur pas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pas gleng gzhi lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad sdud pas mdo lta bu'o; ;'jig rten thams cad skyong bas rdzi'u lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-4: sdig to thams cad rnam par zlog pas srung ma lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-5: nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin 'dren pas dbang po'i mig 'phrul lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-6: 'dul ba 'dren pas chu'i zhags pa lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-7: bag chags dang bag la nyal ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhob tu rlog pas dbang po'i me lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-8: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la mchod rten lta bu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-10: de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-12: yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-16: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de snyed du byang chub kyi sems la yon tan dang legs pa yod par blta'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'byung ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-22: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-25: gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:268b-26: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-0: @269a *// lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu bzung bas yon tan tshang med pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-4: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-13: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes mi 'tshig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-14: yul gyi dug gis mi tshugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-15: nyon mongs pa'i mtshon gyis mi chod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-17: yongs su rtog pa'i du bas mi 'chi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-21: rnam par mi gtong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-23: gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-24: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes kyi rtsi 'chang ba'ang 'khor ba'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-28: mchu zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269a-30: dri tshor ba tsam gyis sprul thams cad 'byer ro //
