K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi dri tsam gyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i sbrul thams @269b cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-4: skyes bu gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-5: dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba yang bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis thub par dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-9: rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-11: zug rdu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par sel ba 'chang ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-15: gti mug gi zug rngu thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-19: rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-21: nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-22: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa 'chang ba yang nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-23: mi shes pa'i nad thams cad rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-27: rtsi'i shing chen po sbyor ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-28: de'i shun pas rma la reg ma thag tu rma thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:269b-29: gang nas bshus pa de'i shun phrags kyang phyir skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-0: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon las skyes pa'i shing thams cad mkhyen @270a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-1: pa nyid du sbyor ba yang mthong ma thag tu rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rma yongs su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing de la yang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rma dbyung ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-7: rtsi chen po'i rnam par tsa ba ma grugs pa zhes bya ba yod de; de'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing thams cad kyang yan lag thams cad rnam par 'phel lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-8: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems rtsa ba ma grugs pa'i rtsi chen po'i mthus kyang slob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi shing rnams rnam par 'phel lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-13: dper na; dga' ba 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-14: de su'i lus la thogs pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-16: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dga' ba 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-17: sems nad med pa yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-21: dran pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270a-23: sems kyi dran pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-0: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dran pa thob par byed pa'i @270b yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-4: padma chen po zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-5: de zos pa tsam gyis tshe'i tshad bskal par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-6: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems padmo chen po'i rtsi zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa grangs med pa'i tshe la dbang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-10: mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-12: mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-13: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi mi snang bar 'gyur bar bcangs te 'dres pas rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud kyi yul thams cad du mi snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-17: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-18: de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:270b-19: rgya mtsho chen po la bsal pa tshig pa'i me thams cad kyis kyang ta la tsam yang skam par nus pa'i gnas med skabs med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po bsam pa dang sems kyi rgyud la @271a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-1: yod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par chud za bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yongs su btang ba zhig tu gyur na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang skam par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-9: nor bu rin po che chen po 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-11: nor bu rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-12: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'i rin po che chen po bsam pa'i rgyan du thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-13: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-17: nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'dang zhes bya ba yod de; de chur bcug na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-18: 'dam dang rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-19: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chu 'dang gi nor bu rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-20: rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271a-24: nor bu rin po che chen po chu dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba thogs pa'i nya pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-0: @271b de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems chu dang 'grogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du mi 'chi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-4: nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-6: nya pa la sogs pa chu las 'tsho ba rnams klu'i gnas thams cad du dong yang klu'i sbrul thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-7: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i nor bu'i go cha 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i gnas kyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-11: nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa thogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-12: lha'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-13: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brgya byin mngon par chags pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po smon lam gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-17: nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i mi ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:271b-18: 'phongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-0: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yid @272a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-1: bzhin gyi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang yo byad dang 'tsho ba'i bag tsha ba thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-5: nor bu rin po che nyi mas mdzes pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-8: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu rin po che yang shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-13: nor bu rin po che zla bas mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-15: de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zla bas mdzes pa'i rin po che chen po yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi chu'i rgyun 'byin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-20: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-21: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po'i nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang ngan song dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272a-22: ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-1: nor bu rin po che chen po 'gro ba'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-2: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-3: de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-8: rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-9: mun pa thams cad yongs su sel cing 'gro ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-10: khyim gyi nang na gnas na yang rab tu snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-11: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-12: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas na yang ye shes kyi snang ba chen po rab tu 'gyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-16: nor bu rin po che chen po aindra n'i la'i 'od kyis phog pa de dag thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-17: nor bu rin po che chen po aindra n'i la'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:272b-18: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po aindra n'i la'ang chos gang dang gang la rnam par spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bsngos pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-7: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-8: lo brgya phrag stong du mi gtsang ba'i nang zhig na 'dug kyang dri mi zhim pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-9: de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-10: de bzhin du gsal zhing shin tu dri ma med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-11: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che bee d'urya yang bskal pa brgya phrag stong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gnas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-12: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-13: de bzhin du shin tu dag par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-17: nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-18: rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273a-19: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyang so so'i skye bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-0: rang sangs @273b rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-4: rin po che chen po me 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-5: gcig pu gnas kyang mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-6: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che me 'byung ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig pu yang tshul bzhin yid la bya bas mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-10: rgya mtsho chen po nas grus blangs pa'i nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa tshong pa'i lag tu 'ongs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-12: nor bu mching bu brgya phrag stong yang kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-13: rin thang gi zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-14: de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po na gnas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa smon lam gyi grur bcug pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud la 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du ma phyin kyang rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du phyin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-18: rang sangs rgyas nor bu mching bu lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:273b-22: nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-1: na gnas kyang dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu na gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to; ;de bzhin du yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po yang 'khor ba'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul las rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi zla dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-6: ji srid du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-8: rin po che'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-15: longs spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-16: de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274a-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa yod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-0: zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag @274b thams cad kyis kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-4: nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-6: rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-7: de bzhin du byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-11: nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par 'phags pa gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-12: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-16: klu'i tshogs grub par 'gyur ba'i sprul 'dul ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-17: klu dang sprul thams cad la dbang sgyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:274b-18: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nan tan gyi klu'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul 'dul ba yang nyon mongs pa'i klu dang sprul thams cad la dbang sgyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-1: dpa' bo lag cha dang ldan pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-3: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lag cha dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub par dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-7: lha rdzas kyi tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i phye ma srang gcig gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-8: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-9: de zho gcig tsam la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su gang bas rin du mi chog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-10: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi tsandan sprul gyi snying po lhag pa'i bsam pa gcig la gnas pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-13: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi sems kyang zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-17: tsandan rin po che chen po kha ba'i tsandan zhes bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-18: gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275a-19: lus thams cad kyang rab tu bsil bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-0: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i kha ba'i tsandan rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i kun tu @275b rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-3: gti mug gi gdung ba thams cad kyang rab tu sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-4: ye shes kyi lus kyang rab tu sim par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-7: dper na; ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du ji snyed cig nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-8: de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-12: shing sus kyang mi tshugs pa dang kun nas 'du ba'i shun phrags kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-13: 'dzambu'i gling gi me tog par shi ka dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-15: me tog su ma na la sogs pa me tog gi rnam pa thams cad la'ang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i smon lam gyi shing gi yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-17: ye shes kyi shun phrags kyi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi me tog par shi ka dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:275b-22: me tog su ma na'i tshul khrims pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-2: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa thams cad la'ang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-6: shing sus kyang mi thub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-7: kun nas 'du ba kha 'bus par gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-8: me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur par shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-9: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i shing kun nas 'du ba dge ba'i rtsa bas kha 'bus par gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-10: lha dang mi grangs med pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-11: zag pa med pa'i skye gnas su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-15: shing kun nas 'du ba'i me tog gis nyi ma gcig tu bsgos pa'i gos sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-16: til mar las dri zhim pa'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu yang me tog tsam pa ka dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-17: me tog su ma nas nyi ma brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i gos sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-18: til mar las kyang mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-19: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud tshe gcig tu yongs su bsgos ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-20: ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i ngad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi drung du ldang ba de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276a-21: bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i nyen thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-0: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems las kyang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa @276b ba dang chos kyi ye shes kyi dri zhim po mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-4: shing gi rigs na li ke re zhes bya ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skye ba yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-5: de'i rtsa ba yan chad me tog gi bar du yang dus thams cad du nam yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-6: de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-7: smon lam gyi rtsa ba yang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin chad dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i mthar thug gi bar du nam yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-11: dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-12: de ni; srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du sgyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-13: dngul chu srang gcig po de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-14: lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-15: lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-16: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:276b-17: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-0: chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i khams gcig po de @277a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-1: ni; las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-6: ji tsam du chung du zin kyang rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam gyi me lce yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-7: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me ji tsam du chung du zin kyang dmigs pa rgya chen po'i tshogs kyi rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu dgye bas rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-11: me mar gcig las me mar bye ba brgya phrag stong zhig bus kyang me mar de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-12: de snyed byung bas mi zad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-14: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig las 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-16: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thugs bskyed pa'i me mar mang po 'bar yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig po de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-17: de snyed kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar byung bas mi zad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277a-22: me mar gcig cig khyim mam khang bu ji lta bur bcug kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-0: @277b bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags bsags pa'i mun pa yang rnam par sel cing snang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-1: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyim thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ci lta bu yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-3: de phyin ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong brjod du med par bsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-4: mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su skyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-9: snying po ji tsam pa de'i rkyen tsam du snang bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-10: mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-11: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar yang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi snying po'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyings yongs su snang bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-12: snying rje chen pos spyod pa'i me mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du sems can gdul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-13: zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-14: sangs rgyas kyi sku don sgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-15: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-16: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-17: sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:277b-18: bam po brgya bcu gsum pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-0: lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lha'i @278a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-1: rgyal po dbang sgyur ba'i mgo la thogs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-2: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis mi 'phrog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-3: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan nan tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-4: yon tan la rab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po'i mgo la thogs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-5: byis pa tha dad pa'i skye bo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-12: ri dvags kyi rgyal po sengge'i nga ros ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-13: sengge'i phru gu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'ang nyams su bde zhing rta'i ri dvags thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i sengge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nga ro byang chub kyi sems yongs su brjod pa phyung bas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-16: las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i phru gu rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis nyams su bde zhing rta'i dmigs pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-20: sengge'i rgyus pa las rgyud du byas pa'i pi wang gi sgras ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278a-21: pi wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i pha rol @278b tu phyin pa'i sku mnga' ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgras 'dod pa'i rgyud kyi dga' ba'i pi wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-3: yon tan gyi gtam thams cad kyang yongs su 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-7: rgya mtsho chen po pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-9: ra'i 'o mas yongs su gang ba'i nang du sengge'i 'o ma thigs gcig blugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-10: 'o ma de dag thams cad 'gyes par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-12: de bzhin du bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa kun gyi 'o ma'i rgya mtshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i sengge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i 'o ma thigs pa gcig blugs pas thams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-13: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi gnas mi 'du'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-16: bya ka la phingka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs nas ma byung ba la nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:278b-17: gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i bya'i tshogs mthu dang shugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad la yang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ka la pingka'i phru gu las dang po pa 'khor ba'i sgo @279a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-1: nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa la snying rje chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-2: byang chub kyi sems kyi nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-4: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-8: nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-10: mig yongs su dag pa'i yon tan yod pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-11: de ma yin pa'i bya lus tshad du phyin pa gzhan thams cad la'ang med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lding chen po'i rigs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-13: rgyud du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu sems dang po bskyed pa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-16: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mig yongs su dag pa'i yon tan yod pa'i nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-17: rang sangs rgyas bskal pa brgya stong tshang bas byung ba thams cad la med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-21: skyes bu chen po'i lag nas spyad pa'i mde'u thung gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279a-22: go cha ji tsam du sra yang brtol to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan po dang ldan pa'i lag nas spyad pa'i thams @279b cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mde'u thung gis kyang lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-1: bag la nyal ba'i go cha thams cad mi brtol ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-5: mthu bo che chen po khros te rngam pa'i 'phral ba la thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che chen po snying rje chen pos rngam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i gdong la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-7: bdud kyi las thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-11: 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchan bu ma byang ba 'phong gi thabs la ma goms pa la 'phong gi gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-13: khyad par bdog pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-14: thams cad la byang yang 'phong mi shes pa rnams la med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-15: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' cad shes las dang po pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma goms pa la smon lam gyi ye shes dang mos pas spyod pa'i mthu'i khyad par ci bdog pa de lta bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-16: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:279b-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-2: 'phong slob pa'i 'phong gi rgyus thams cad la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-3: dang por rkang pa'i stangs la goms par bya ba sngon du 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la slob pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la yang dang por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa sngon du 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-8: sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-9: yul thams cad yongs su ston pa'i bya ba thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-10: dang por sngags kyi dngos grub mngon par sgrub pa yid la byas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-13: rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la yang dang po sems bskyed pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-15: yongs su grub pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-21: gzugs med la bstan du med pa yin yang sems bskyed pas sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280a-22: gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-0: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yang gzugs med la @280b bstan du med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-1: chos kyi dbyings thams cad sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyis rnam par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-5: byi la'i mig gis bltas pa tsam gyis byi ba thams cad kun tu 'byer ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba tsam gyis las dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-11: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan btags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-12: rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan thogs pa yang nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-14: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-15: zil tu rlags par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-19: rdo ba khab long gi rgyal po khams ji tsam du chung yang lcags sgrog sra ba thams cad zhig par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-20: de bzhin du sems thag pa nas bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams ji tsam du chung yang lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:280b-22: sred pa'i sgrog thams cad zhig par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-2: gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der lcags phal ba thams cad 'gyes shing mi gnas la mi 'du'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-3: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams kyang las sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba gang dang gang du byung ba de dang de dag gi las dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad kyang 'byer zhing mi 'khong mi 'du'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-12: chu srin gyi tshal gyi zegs ma gcig zos pa'i nya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-13: chu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-14: chu srin gyis sos btab kyang lus la mi tshugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-15: de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyi cha gcig zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i las dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-16: nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-18: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'dug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ba'i lam gol bar ltung bas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281a-22: bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa'i skyes bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-0: gzhan gyis @281b gnod par bya ba thams cad kyis mi 'chi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-1: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa yang nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar mi 'chi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-7: bsku ba grub pa'i skyes bu ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-8: mi'i gnas thams cad rnam par spyod kyang mi kun gyis mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i shes rab dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:281b-10: smon lam gyis nye bar brtan pa bdud kyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:287b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying po byang chub la bzhugs shing bdud rgol du gzhug pa mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:287b-22: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams kyi gdan ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:287b-23: gzhan du na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i lte ba'i sa'i gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag @288a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-5: sa thob par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-7: lung bstan pa yongs su nod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad nye bar ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-10: chos kyi sprin chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-12: drag shul de dag kyang gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa smon lam thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje sra ba'i lte ba can ma gtogs par sems gzhan gyis yongs su gzung bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-14: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-16: gzhan tshad med pa nas yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-17: sems can gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288a-21: de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-0: @288b yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-1: khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-5: ji ltar nan tan du bya zhes zer ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-7: khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi nang du song ste ltos shig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-8: der khyod kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-9: bslab nas kyang yon tan ji lta bu yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba shes par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces smras so; ;'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-11: pho brang brtsegs pa'i chab sgo dbyer gsol nang du mchi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo drung du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-13: lag pa g-yas pas se gol gtogs te sgra byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-14: de'i sgo de'ang rang bye bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-17: da khang pa brtsegs pa 'dir song zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-18: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ngo mtshar chen po thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:288b-19: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du phyin pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-2: des mthong ba khang pa brtsegs pa de shin tu rgya che zhing yangs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-3: rgyar dpag tshad brgya stong mang po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad kyis gzhal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-5: 'khor thams cad du nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-8: ba dan gyi rgyan grangs med pas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-9: rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-10: mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-11: rin po che'i phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-13: sengge'i mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu dpyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289a-21: gser gyi lcags bod rin po ches spras pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-1: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba bskyod na yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-2: lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-3: lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par dpyangs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-5: gser gyi phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-6: pu shu'i dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-7: skar khung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-8: rta babs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-9: ba gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa; me long gi dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-10: rin po che'i pha gu grangs med pa gtams pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-11: rin po che'i rtsig pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-12: rin po che'i ka ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-13: rin po che'i gos kyi sprin grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-14: rin po che'i shing grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa; rin po che'i khri 'phang grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:289b-15: rin po che'i lam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-2: rin po che'i khri grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-3: rin po che'i bu mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-4: rin po che'i snam bu grangs med pa bting ba'i 'chag sa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa; 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi chu shing gi ka ba shin tu rnam par phye ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-5: rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-7: bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-8: rin po che'i padmo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-9: rin po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-10: rdzing bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-11: me tog punda r'i ka grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-12: rin po che'i them skas grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-13: rin po che'i stegs bu rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa; rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas spras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290a-14: nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-0: rin po @290b che thams cad rnam par phye ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-1: yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-2: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang na yang khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan brgya stong 'di lta bu'i rgyan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-6: lha'i bdag grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa nas yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i bar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gang bar mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-7: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-8: de ltar tshad med de nam mkha'i mdzod du gyur pa kun nas shin tu spa bar 'khod par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-9: des khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba de dag thams cad kyang dmigs pa gcig la phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-11: phan tshun sa la gsal bor 'dug par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du de la snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-12: dmigs pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la'ang snang bar mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:290b-13: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-0: rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa de lta bu dag mthong nas dga' ba'i thugs dpag tu med pa rnam par @291a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-2: mos pa chen pos lus dang sems mngon par brlan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-3: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bsal pa'i yid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-4: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-5: rmongs pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-6: 'khrul pa med pa'i phyogs la rab tu gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-7: thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i dran pas rnam par dmigs pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-8: yid la bya ba'i rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-9: rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-10: dmigs pa thams cad la sgrib pa med par mig rab tu 'gro bar gyur nas phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad la mngon du bltas pa'i lus kyis phyag bya bar mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs thams cad du khyab pa dang ldan pa'i lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291a-11: de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis phyag byas ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du bdag nyid phyin par shes par gyur to; ;khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad du'ang rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang mthong bar gyur to /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-0: @291b khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-1: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma rigs ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-3: ming ci zhes bya bar gyur pa zhig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-4: yongs su bskul ba gang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yang dag par bskul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-13: ji lta bu zhig dang ldan pa'i zhing du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-16: smon lam gyi khyad par ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-17: ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gyi sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-19: khong du chud par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-20: de'i tshe sems can de dag dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-22: tshe'i tshad ji srid gcig tu gyur pa de tsam gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par yang shes par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-23: bya ba de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:291b-26: dus gang nas bzung ste de'i ming byams pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292a-7: gang du sa non pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292a-13: gang du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292a-15: gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292a-25: 'jig rten gyi mgon por gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292a-27: bde ba thams cad kyis sems can rnams la nye bar sdud pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292b-7: lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:292b-8: lha'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su ston pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310a-18: phyi rol na gnas pa yang ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310a-25: bshig kyang gang du yang 'gro ba med de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310a-30: gang du yang phung por gyur ba med mod kyi /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-5: shul ji srid cig nas gshegs /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-9: g-yo ba dang gnas pa med par 'gro'o; ;gnas dang rten med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-10: shi 'pho dang skye ba med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-11: gnas pa dang 'pho ba med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-12: g-yo ba dang ldang ba med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-13: ltos pa dang gnas med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-14: las dang rnam par smin pa med par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-15: mi skye ba dang mi 'gag par 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:310b-16: rtag pa med pa dang chad pa med par 'gro'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311a-19: khyim bdag gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par bskul nas 'dir 'ongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311a-21: 'phags pa; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa gang lags /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-14: thabs mkhas pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-15: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-16: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-17: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:311b-20: chos thams cad kyi nan tan ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312a-10: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312a-16: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312a-20: byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su yang dag par byung ba yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312b-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312b-17: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:312b-19: bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu'i nang na rigs la smos pa'i skyon thams cad kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-3: chos thams cad bdag med par khong du chud pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-7: 'khor ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su rtogs pas bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-8: phung po thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pas skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-10: 'chi ba yongs su bstan pa thams cad kyis dub par mi 'gyur ro; ;khams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-11: skye mched chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin tu rab tu rtogs pas yul thams cad kyis rma mi 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313a-12: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shin tu bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis mos par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-0: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la rnam par rtse bas bdud kyi yul @313b thams cad kyis mi gos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-1: chos kyi lus su byung bas nyon mongs pa thams cad du smos su med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-2: skye ba la dbang rab tu thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-6: 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i kha dog gi khyad par dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-7: sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig gi bye brag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-8: 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ming rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-9: sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod lam dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-12: rigs su skye ba yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-13: byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-14: sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-15: mnyam pa'i yongs su shes par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sprul pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus yongs su bstan cing brjod pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:313b-17: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-0: sngon skal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa'i sems @314a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-1: can byang chub kyi sems stor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-2: 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes pa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-3: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di'i yul phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-4: pha ma dang gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams rnam par gdul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-5: bram ze'i rigs dang rgyud kyi khyad par gyis rigs kyi nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal med par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'i don du 'dir skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-8: de ltar nga lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di na thabs rnam pa 'di lta bus sems can bsam pa'i tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-9: rnam pa ji lta bus 'dul ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314a-11: khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di na 'dug go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-3: 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i sred pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-4: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-5: lhar skyes pa thams cad kyang mthar rgud par 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-6: ye shes chen po'i chos kyi sgo 'chi 'pho'i rnam pa zhes bya ba tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang dag par bgro bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-7: lhan cig yongs su smin par gyur pa rnams der skye bar yongs su bsdu bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas bkye ba'i padmo rnams kyang kha dbye ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba yongs su ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-9: dus la bab la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-11: ngas byang chub mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par bcas pas da dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-14: da dung yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-16: ji ltar kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-17: ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:314b-18: ji ltar smon par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:315a-2: ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:315a-3: ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:315a-4: ji ltar khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:315a-5: ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:315a-9: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la yang med do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327a-4: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327a-7: des mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mi chen po'i mtshan re re las sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327b-0: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi @327b sngon gyi mtha' dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327b-2: mi chen po'i mtshan re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327b-3: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:327b-5: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga nas sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du shar phyogs na'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i dpal na rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston cing 'dug par mthong ngo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328a-1: las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po thon te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328a-4: spyi po dang phrag pa'i lhun gnyis dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328a-5: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kyang spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa mang po mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328a-6: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328a-7: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re las kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi sprin mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas spos kyi shing gi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te spos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-0: bdug pa'i mdzod zad mi @328b zhes pa'i char rab tu 'gyed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gos sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po mngon par thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-3: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad kun nas yog par byas nas brgyan par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-4: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dar sna tshogs kyi lda ldi'i sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-5: phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-6: mu tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-7: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:328b-8: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo'i re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i phyir rin po che'i shing gi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas rin po che'i shing las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329a-1: pas phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs te chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329a-2: chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329a-4: sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa yongs su sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329a-5: skad cig gcig la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329a-6: de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste bzhag par gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329b-1: de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang tshogs su gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:329b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rnam par 'phel ba 'gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-13: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-14: rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-15: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-16: de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-17: gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-18: byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes; ;mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-19: 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-20: mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-21: 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-22: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337a-23: bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-0: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa @337b dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-1: rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-2: dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-3: thams cad bdag gi byang chub phyir bsngo 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-4: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-5: 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-6: gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-7: bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-8: phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-9: de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-10: byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-11: sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-12: phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-13: de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-14: 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-15: mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-16: byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-17: 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-18: tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-19: rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-20: rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-21: bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-22: tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-23: rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-24: lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-25: grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:337b-26: 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-2: des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-3: byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-4: sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par 'gyur ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-5: de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-6: las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-7: grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-8: ji ltar padmo rgyus mi chags pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-9: nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-10: zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-11: ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed; ;bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-12: 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-13: byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-14: sems can dag gi spyod dang mthun par 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-15: bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-16: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-17: bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-18: de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-19: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-20: spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-21: bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-22: bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-23: de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338a-24: de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-0: sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po @338b rnams; ;mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-1: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-2: de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-3: rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-4: byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-5: bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyod pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-6: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-7: srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-8: bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-9: thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-10: yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-11: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-12: zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-13: sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-14: byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-15: de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-16: skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-17: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-18: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-19: gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-20: rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-21: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-22: sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-23: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-24: 'khor lo tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-25: de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:338b-26: blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-1: bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-2: skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-3: gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-4: skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-5: dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi sengge dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-6: de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-7: rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-8: sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-9: gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-10: de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par sgrub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-11: de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-12: rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-13: gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-14: de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-15: mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-16: mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-17: kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-18: kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-19: kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-20: kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-21: kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-22: chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-23: shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-24: byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339a-25: las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-0: nyon mongs stobs @339b rnams kun tu 'joms par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-1: bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-2: bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-3: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-4: sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-5: chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-6: ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-7: spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-8: smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-9: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-10: bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-11: gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-12: byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-13: bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-14: de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-15: rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-16: gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya; ;mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-17: dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-18: lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-19: spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-20: bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-21: de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-22: kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-23: 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-24: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-25: de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-26: spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:339b-27: yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-2: de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-3: nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-4: sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te; ;ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-5: bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-6: gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-7: rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul; ;lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-8: zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-9: gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-10: byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-11: lan gcig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-12: bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-13: gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-14: des ni ngan song thams cad spong bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-15: des ni grogs po ngan pa'ang spangs pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-16: snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-17: de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-18: mi tsho 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs; ;kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-19: de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-20: mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-21: gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-22: de yis bzang po'i spyod pa 'di brjod na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-23: myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340a-24: ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-0: rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par @340b 'gyur; ;bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-1: 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-2: byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-3: song nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste; ;byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-4: bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-5: gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-6: 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog na yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-7: de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-8: byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-9: 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-10: kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-11: de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-12: dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-13: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-14: bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-15: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-16: bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-17: bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-18: sgrib pa thams cad bdag ni phyir bsal te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-19: mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-20: bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-21: der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-22: thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-23: de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bkang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-24: 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-25: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-26: padmo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:340b-27: snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-1: yang bdag gis der thob shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-2: der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-3: sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-4: blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-5: sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-6: gang gis bzang po spyod pa ston pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-7: dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-8: des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams; ;skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor par shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-9: gang yang bzang po spyod pa bsngos pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-10: bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-11: 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-12: 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab 'gro bar shog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-13: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-14: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang nas sdong pos brgyan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs chen po las nor bzang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i spyod pa phyogs gcig pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-046-001:341a-17: /lotstsha ba bee ro tsan rakshi tas zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa'o ////
